Settings.Description_ENG: This is the file "ja2_options.ini" which is the general settings file for the current selected "Data" folder.
Settings.Description_GER: Dies hier ist die Datei "Ja2_Options.ini", welche die standard Einstellungsdatei für den aktuell gewählten "Data" Ordner ist.
Settings.Description_RUS: Это файл "ja2_options.ini", который содержит все основные настройки для выбранной папки "Data"
Settings.Description_CHI: 这里用来调整在“Data”文件夹里的“Ja2_Options.ini”文件，对游戏进行综合设定。

Section.name: System Limit Settings
Section.Description_ENG: These settings control some program limits. Changing any of these settings AFTER starting a new campaign IS NOT RECOMMENDED.
Section.Description_CHI: 这些设定控制一些程序限制。在开始一个新的游戏后最好不要修改这些选项。

Property.name: MAX_NUMBER_PLAYER_MERCS
Property.Description_ENG:
This is the max number of mercs you can recruit. Player mercs, valid values 16 through 32, default is 24.
PLEASE NOTE: Changing these settings may cause your savegames to become UNLOADABLE. Remember to change them before starting a new game! To load any "broken" savegames, simply revert to your original settings.
Property.Description_CHI:
玩家可以雇佣的最大佣兵数量，支持16到32之间的值，默认24。
请注意：改变这些设置可能导致之前的存档不可用。要继续之前的存档，把设置改回原值即可。

Property.name: MAX_NUMBER_PLAYER_VEHICLES
Property.Description_ENG:
This is the max number of vehicles you can recruit. Player vehicles, valid values 2 through 6, default is 2.
PLEASE NOTE: Changing these settings may cause your savegames to become UNLOADABLE. Remember to change them before starting a new game! To load any "broken" savegames, simply revert to your original settings.
Property.Description_CHI:
玩家最多可以拥有的车辆数。支持2到6之间的值，默认2。
请注意：改变这些设置可能导致之前的存档不可用。要继续之前的存档，把设置改回原值即可。

Property.name: MAX_NUMBER_ENEMIES_IN_TACTICAL
Property.Description_ENG: Use this to adjust the numbers of enemies that can appear in the same sector in TACTICAL mode. Enemies (i.e., soldiers), valid values 16 through 64, default is 32.
Property.Description_CHI: 这个值控制在一个战术地图内可同时出现的最大敌人数量。支持16到64之间的值，默认32。

Property.name: MAX_NUMBER_CREATURES_IN_TACTICAL
Property.Description_ENG: Use this to adjust the numbers of creatures that can appear in the same sector in TACTICAL mode. Creatures (i.e., bloodcats and crepitus), valid values 16 through 40, default is 32.
Property.Description_CHI: 这个值控制在一个战术地图内可同时出现的最大非人生物数量。支持16到40之间的值，默认为32。

Property.name: MAX_NUMBER_MILITIA_IN_TACTICAL
Property.Description_ENG: Use this to adjust the numbers of militia that can appear in the same sector in TACTICAL mode. Militia, valid values 16 through 64, default is 32.
Property.Description_RUS: Устанавливает максимальное количество ментов на одной локации. Варьируется от 16 до 64, по умолчани = 32
Property.Description_CHI: 这个值控制在一个战术地图内可同时出现的民兵数量。支持16到64之间的值，默认为32。

Property.name: MAX_NUMBER_CIVS_IN_TACTICAL
Property.Description_ENG: Use this to adjust the numbers of civilians that can appear in the same sector in TACTICAL mode. Civilians, valid values 16 through 40, default is 32.
Property.Description_CHI: 这个值控制在一个战术地图可同时出现的平民数量。支持16到40之间的值，默认为32。

Property.name: MAX_STRATEGIC_ENEMY_GROUP_SIZE
Property.Description_ENG: DO NOT LOWER ***MAX_STRATEGIC_ENEMY_GROUP_SIZE*** BELOW 20 This is used to determine how large a single group of enemies can be at any time, while moving on the strategic map. Please note that if reinforcements are allowed (ALLOW_REINFORCEMENTS=TRUE), several such groups can combine together for an attack. However, they will split up at the first opportunity, trying to return to no more than this size.
Property.Description_CHI: 注意不要将***MAX_STRATEGIC_ENEMY_GROUP_SIZE***值设置低于20。 这个用来调整在战略界面上行动的单个敌人团队的人数。 请注意如果允许跨地图支援（ALLOW_REINFORCEMENTS=TRUE），几个这样的团可以集结在一起攻击。然而，战斗后他们会很快分散开来，以保证单个团队人数不会过多。

Property.name: MAX_ITEM_SIZE
Property.Description_ENG: This is the maximum item size you can use in the game. It is possible, with enough attachments that lower a weapon size to change the weapon size to a huge number, since 0-1 = 255. If any item with a size between 0 and MAX_WEAPON_SIZE s adjusted to a number bigger than MAX_ITEM_NUMBER, the item size will be 0. If the adjusted number is greater than MAX_WEAPON_SIZE but bigger than MAX_ITEM_NUMBER, MAX_WEAPON_SIZE will be set. Values 0-250, default is 34.

Property.name: MAX_WEAPON_SIZE
Property.Description_ENG: This is the maximum item size you want to use for weapons. All weapons will be between size 0 and MAX_WEAPON_SIZE regardless of attachments. Values 0-100, default is 9.

Property.name: OLD_INVENTORY_ITEM_NUMBER
Property.Description_ENG: This is used for items that will not appear in NIV. Values 0-255, default is 99.

Section.name: Data File Settings
Section.Description_ENG: In this section you can tell the program which Data Files to read. Mostly you can tell the program whether to use internal (hard-coded) settings, or external (XML) settings.
Section.Description_CHI: 这个部分控制程序选择读取哪个 Data 文件。一般你可以让程序选择内置（hard-codad）设定，或者扩展（xml）设定。

Property.name: USE_DIFFICULTY_BASED_PROF_DAT
Property.Description_ENG:
Difficulty-based PROF.DAT
If FALSE, the game reads its profile data from the file called simply "PROF.DAT". If TRUE, the game reads its profile data from one of four different "PROF.DAT" files that are specific to the difficulty level of your current game. This allows using different character profiles depending on difficulty level.
Property.Description_CHI:
按照难度选择使用不同的 PROF.DAT 。
选择 False，游戏将单独用“PROF.DAT” 选择 True，游戏将根据不同的难度选择对应的“PROF.DAT”

Property.name: READ_PROFILE_DATA_FROM_XML
Property.Description_ENG:
PROFEX (profile externalization) These settings allow data about character profiles to be read (and written) from XMLs instead of PROF.DAT. These XMLs are called "MercProfiles.XML" and "MercOpinions.XML". Unlike PROF.DAT, they can be edited by hand.
If TRUE, reads "MercProfiles.XML" and "MercOpinions.XML" for profile data. If FALSE, reads profile data from PROF.DAT.
!!! Attention !!! If you want to play with the new trait system you have to set this to TRUE.
Property.Description_CHI: 这个选项控制通过读取XML文件还是 PROF.DAT 中的佣兵信息。这两个XML文件是“MercProfiles.XML”和“MercOptions.XML”。

Property.name: WRITE_PROFILE_DATA_TO_XML
Property.Description_ENG:
PROFEX (profile externalization) These settings allow data about character profiles to be read (and written) from XMLs instead of PROF.DAT. These XMLs are called "MercProfiles.XML" and "MercOpinions.XML". Unlike PROF.DAT, they can be edited by hand.
When TRUE, this setting writes profile data from memory to XML before the game's Main Menu is reached. This can be used to write all data from PROF.DAT directly into XML format. Make sure that READ_PROFILE_DATA_FROM_XML is set to FALSE before doing this, otherwise you're simple creating a duplicate of an XML you already have.
Property.Description_CHI: 这个选项允许对控制佣兵信息的XML文件进行读写。

Property.name: USE_EXTERNALIZED_ENEMY_ITEM_DROPS
Property.Description_ENG:
0 = Use default drop item system for enemies (and possibly also militia). 1 = Use the new drop item system from XML-Files (EnemyWeaponDrops.xml, EnemyAmmoDrops.xml, EnemyArmourDrops.xml, EnemyExplosiveDrops.xml, EnemyMiscDrops.xml) for enemies (and militia).
INFO: This drop system only takes effect, if you have not choosen "Enemies Drop All Items" in the start new game screen.
Property.Description_CHI: 是否使用控制敌人掉落的XML。注意，如果在游戏开始的选项中勾选“掉落所有物品”，则没有效果。

Section.name: Recruitment Settings
Section.Description_ENG: In this section you can control various options regarding the recruitment of A.I.M, M.E.R.C, I.M.P and RPC mercenaries.
Section.Description_CHI: 这个部分你可以控制有关雇佣 A.I.M. 、M.E.R.C. 和RPC佣兵的选项。

Property.name: MAX_IMP_CHARACTERS
Property.Description_ENG: The maximum number of I.M.P. characters, the player can have simultaneously (Range: 0 - 6).
Property.Description_CHI: 可拥有的I.M.P.角色上限（0-6之间）。

Property.name: IMP_MALE_CHARACTER_COUNT
Property.Description_ENG: The maximum male I.M.P characers that are available. The total number is still limited by MAX_IMP_CHARACTERS.
Property.Description_GER: Die maximale Zahl an männlichen B.S.E. Charakteren, die erstellt werden können. Total wird ihre Anzahl dennoch durch MAX_IMP_CHARACTERS begrenzt.
Property.Description_RUS: Максимальное количество мужских персонажей, создаваемых через I.M.P. Общее число ограничивается параметром MAX_IMP_CHARACTERS
Property.Description_CHI: 男性I.M.P. 角色数量上限。这个数量受到 MAX_IMP_CHARACTERS 限制。

Property.name: IMP_FEMALE_CHARACTER_COUNT
Property.Description_ENG: The maximum female I.M.P characers that are available. The total number is still limited by MAX_IMP_CHARACTERS.
Property.Description_GER: Die maximale Zahl an weiblichen B.S.E. Charakteren, die erstellt werden können. Total wird ihre Anzahl dennoch durch MAX_IMP_CHARACTERS begrenzt.
Property.Description_RUS: Максимальное количество женских персонажей, создаваемых через I.M.P. Общее число ограничивается параметром MAX_IMP_CHARACTERS
Property.Description_CHI: 女性I.M.P. 角色数量上限。这个数量受到 MAX_IMP_CHARACTERS 限制

Property.name: IMP_MALE_1
Property.Description_ENG: The first male I.M.P character in the file "prof.dat".
Property.Description_GER: Der erste männliche B.S.E. Charakter in der Datei Prof.dat
Property.Description_RUS: Первый мужской персонаж в файле "prof.dat"
Property.Description_CHI: “prof.dat”文件中第一个男性 I.M.P. 角色。

Property.name: IMP_MALE_2
Property.Description_ENG: The second male I.M.P character in the file "prof.dat".
Property.Description_GER: Der zweite männliche B.S.E. Charakter in der Datei Prof.dat
Property.Description_RUS: Второй мужской персонаж в файле "prof.dat"
Property.Description_CHI: “prof.dat”文件中第二个男性 I.M.P. 角色。

Property.name: IMP_MALE_3
Property.Description_ENG: The third male I.M.P character in the file "prof.dat"
Property.Description_GER: Der dritte männliche B.S.E. Charakter in der Datei Prof.dat
Property.Description_RUS: Третий мужской персонаж в файле "prof.dat"
Property.Description_CHI: “prof.dat”文件中第三个男性 I.M.P. 角色。

Property.name: IMP_MALE_4
Property.Description_ENG: This additional male I.M.P character can be used, but does not have full voice set available.
Property.Description_GER: Dieser zusätzliche männliche B.S.E. Charakter kann verwendet werden, jedoch ist die Sprachausgabe beschränkt.
Property.Description_RUS: Этот дополнительный мужской персонаж может быть использован, но для него будет недоступна полная поддержка озвучки
Property.Description_CHI: “prof.dat”文件中额外第四个男性 I.M.P. 角色，但是没有完整的声音可用。

Property.name: IMP_MALE_5
Property.Description_ENG: This additional male I.M.P character can be used, but does not have full voice set available.
Property.Description_GER: Dieser zusätzliche männliche B.S.E. Charakter kann verwendet werden, hjedoch ist die Sprachausgabe beschränkt.
Property.Description_RUS: Этот дополнительный мужской персонаж может быть использован, но для него будет недоступна полная поддержка озвучки
Property.Description_CHI: “prof.dat”文件中额外第五个男性 I.M.P. 角色，但是没有完整的声音可用。

Property.name: IMP_MALE_6
Property.Description_ENG: This additional male I.M.P character can be used, but does not have full voice set available.
Property.Description_GER: Dieser zusätzliche männliche B.S.E. Charakter kann verwendet werden, jedoch ist die Sprachausgabe beschränkt.
Property.Description_RUS: Этот дополнительный мужской персонаж может быть использован, но для него будет недоступна полная поддержка озвучки
Property.Description_CHI: “prof.dat”文件中额外第六个男性 I.M.P. 角色，但是没有完整的声音可用。

Property.name: IMP_MALE_7
Property.Description_ENG: This additional male I.M.P character can be used, but does not have full voice set available.
Property.Description_GER: Dieser zusätzliche männliche B.S.E. Charakter kann verwendet werden, jedoch ist die Sprachausgabe beschränkt.
Property.Description_RUS: Этот дополнительный мужской персонаж может быть использован, но для него будет недоступна полная поддержка озвучки
Property.Description_CHI: “prof.dat”文件中额外第七个男性 I.M.P. 角色，但是没有完整的声音可用。

Property.name: IMP_MALE_8
Property.Description_ENG: This additional male I.M.P character can be used, but does not have full voice set available.
Property.Description_GER: Dieser zusätzliche männliche B.S.E. Charakter kann verwendet werden, jedoch ist die Sprachausgabe beschränkt.
Property.Description_RUS: Этот дополнительный мужской персонаж может быть использован, но для него будет недоступна полная поддержка озвучки
Property.Description_CHI: “prof.dat”文件中额外第八个男性 I.M.P. 角色，但是没有完整的声音可用。

Property.name: IMP_FEMALE_1
Property.Description_ENG: The first female I.M.P charcter in the file "prof.dat".
Property.Description_GER: Der erste weibliche B.S.E. Charakter in der Datei Prof.dat
Property.Description_RUS: Первый женский персонаж в файле "prof.dat"
Property.Description_CHI: “prof.dat”文件中第一个女性 I.M.P. 角色。

Property.name: IMP_FEMALE_2
Property.Description_ENG: The second female I.M.P charcter in the file "prof.dat".
Property.Description_GER: Der zweite weibliche B.S.E. Charakter in der Datei Prof.dat
Property.Description_RUS: Второй женский персонаж в файле "prof.dat"
Property.Description_CHI: “prof.dat”文件中第二个女性 I.M.P. 角色。

Property.name: IMP_FEMALE_3
Property.Description_ENG: The third female I.M.P charcter in the file "prof.dat".
Property.Description_GER: Der dritte weibliche B.S.E. Charakter in der Datei Prof.dat
Property.Description_RUS: Третий женский персонаж в файле "prof.dat"
Property.Description_CHI: “prof.dat”文件中第三个女性 I.M.P. 角色。

Property.name: IMP_PROFILE_COST
Property.Description_ENG: This is the cost for creating an IMP character.
Property.Description_GER: Dies ist der Preis für die Erstellung eines IMP Charakters.
Property.Description_CHI: 建立一个 I.M.P. 角色的花费。

Property.name: DYNAMIC_IMP_PROFILE_COST
Property.Description_ENG: If this is set to TRUE, the IMP profile cost is multiplied by how many IMP characters you have generated (i.e. the price of the second IMP character is doubled, of third character tripled etc.)
Property.Description_GER: Wenn diese Option eingeschaltet ist, dann werden die Kosten für einen IMP Charakter mit der Anzahl generierter IMPs multipliziert. Der zweite kostet also doppelt soviel wie der erste. Der dritte kostet dreimal soviel usw.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果设置为True，建立每个 I.M.P. 的花费将变化。第二个2倍，第三个3倍价格等。

Property.name: IMP_INITIAL_POINTS
Property.Description_ENG: This is a TOTAL amount of points distributable between the attributes. This value reflects how good IMP character you will be able to create. Default (vanilla) value is 500. Note that in the game, this value will be reduced by 5 * imp_min_attribute + 5 * imp_bonus_points_for_zero_attribute.
Property.Description_GER: Das ist die Gesamtmenge an Punkten, die man für einen IMP Charakter vergeben kann. Standardwert bei JA2 ist 500. Im Spiel wird dieser Wert noch nach folgender Formel reduziert: 5 * imp_min_attribute + 5 * imp_bonus_points_for_zero_attribute
Property.Description_CHI: 这是建立I.M.P.角色时可分配属性点数的总量。这个值可将决定你能建立多牛B的角色。默认（Vanilla）值为500。注意，在游戏中，这个值将减少为 5 * imp_min_attribute + 5 * imp_bonus_points_for_zero_attribute。

Property.name: IMP_INITIAL_ATTRIBUTES
Property.Description_ENG: This is the initial value all of I.M.P stats at the beginning of the IMP creation process.
Property.Description_GER: Dies ist der Wert, auf den alle Eigenschaften zu Beginn der Charaktererstellung gesetzt werden.
Property.Description_RUS: Стартовое значение всех ваших параметров и скилов
Property.Description_CHI: 这是建立I.M.P.角色时的所有属性的起始值。

Property.name: IMP_INITIAL_POINTS
Property.Description_ENG: This is the amount of extra points you start out with when all of your stats and skills are set to START_ATTRIBUTE.
Property.Description_GER: Dies ist die Menge an zusätzlichen Eigenschaftspunkten, mit der Sie starten, wenn alle Eigenschaften auf den Wert START_ATTRIBUTE gesetzt werden.
Property.Description_RUS: Количество дополнительных статпоинтов, с которыми вы начинаете, когда ваши параметры и скилы выставлены в параметре START_ATTRIBUTE
Property.Description_CHI: 这是当你设置所有状态和技能为 START_ATTRIBUTE 时的所有额外点数。（不太明白和另一个IMP_INITIAL_POINTS有啥差）

Property.name: IMP_MIN_ATTRIBUTE
Property.Description_ENG: This is the lowest skill value you can have before it drops straight to 0.
Property.Description_GER: Dies ist der Minimalwert, zu dem eine Eigenschaft gesenkt werden darf, bevor sie auf 0 gesetzt wird.
Property.Description_RUS: Это минимальное значение параметра, которое вы можете иметь, выставлено в 0
Property.Description_CHI: 把某个属性降到0之前的最低数值。

Property.name: IMP_BONUS_POINTS_FOR_ZERO_ATTRIBUTE
Property.Description_ENG: This is the amount of points that you receive when you a skill drops from IMP_MIN_ATTRIBUTE to 0.
Property.Description_GER: Dies ist die Menge an Eigenschaftspunkten, die Sie erhalten, wenn Sie eine Eigenschaft vom IMP_MIN_ATTRIBUTE auf 0 senken.
Property.Description_RUS: Количество статпоинтов, которые вы получаете, устанавливая параметр или скил со значения IMP_MIN_ATTRIBUTE в 0
Property.Description_CHI: 当你把某个属性从最低降到0时可返还的属性点。

Property.name: IMP_MAX_ATTRIBUTE
Property.Description_ENG: This is the highest skill value you can get, for any skill, during IMP creation.
Property.Description_GER: Dies ist der Maximalwert, auf den eine Eigenschaft erhöht werden darf.
Property.Description_RUS: Это максимальное значение параметра, которое вы можете иметь
Property.Description_CHI: 这是建立I.M.PM角色时属性值的上限。

Property.name: IMP_STARTING_LEVEL_COST_MULTIPLIER
Property.Description_ENG: This value determines how many points you need to pay in order to increase your starting EXP Level during IMP creation. It works as a multiplier for the EXP level you're trying to reach. The caluculation is: EXP Level you want to reach * IMP_STARTING_LEVEL_COST_MULTIPLIER = points to pay. You must pay separately for each increase! (So if the value is 5: 1st to 2nd level costs 10 points, 2nd to 3rd level costs another 15 points, etc.)
Property.Description_CHI: 建立角色时，每提高1级需要多少点。它的计算方法是 所达到的级数 * IMP_STARTING_LEVEL_COST_MULTIPLIER = 需要的点数。

Property.name: IMP_BONUS_POINTS_FOR_DISABILITY
Property.Description_ENG: This value is how many points you get if you choose any disability for your IMP character (e.g. nonswimmer, claustrophobic).
Property.Description_RUS: Количество статпоинтов, получаемых вами за выбор любого из недостатков (неумения плавать, клаустрофобии етс.)
Property.Description_CHI: I.M.P.的缺陷（比如怕水、怕虫、怕热等）可以提供多少自由分配的点数。

Property.name: IMP_BONUS_POINTS_PER_SKILL_NOT_TAKEN
Property.Description_ENG: You get this many bonus attribute points for every skill trait not taken at IMP creation time (e.g. TEACHER, KNIFING).
Property.Description_GER: Diese Option definiert die Anzahl Bonuspunkte, welche Du für jeden nicht genommenen Fertigkeitenplatz bekommst, wenn Du einen IMP Charakter erstellst.
Property.Description_RUS: Количество бонусных статпоинтов, получаемых вами в случае отказа от выбора умений при создании персонажа в I.M.P.
Property.Description_CHI: 少选取一个特技能给佣兵提供多少属性点。

Property.name: EXPERTS_GET_DIFFERENT_CHOICES
Property.Description_ENG: If set to "TRUE", IMPs with expert traits will get different items than without expert traits. There are additional entries for expert traits in the "TableData\IMPItemChoices.xml" file.
Property.Description_CHI: 选“True”，I.M.P.角色的专家技能和非专家技能将有不同起始的物品。在文件“TableData\IMPItemChoices.xml”中对额外天赋、技能都有配置。

Property.name: MERC_WEBSITE_IMMEDIATELY_AVAILABLE
Property.Description_ENG: Should the MERC website be available immediately at game-start?
Property.Description_GER: Sollen M.E.R.C. Charaktere vom ersten Tag an verfügbar sein?
Property.Description_RUS: Доступность наемников из MERC с начала игры
Property.Description_CHI: 在游戏一开始的时候就开启MERC佣兵网站么？

Property.name: MERC_WEBSITE_ALL_MERCS_AVAILABLE
Property.Description_ENG: This will allows you to hire any of the M.E.R.C characters as soon as the M.E.R.C website becomes available. It will also include any future MERC characters that are added.
Property.Description_GER: Dies erlaubt Ihnen, jeden M.E.R.C. Charakter anzuwerben, sobald die M.E.R.C. Website erreichbar ist. Das beinhaltet auch alle M.E.R.C. Charaktere, die in Zukunft beigefügt werden.
Property.Description_RUS: Дает доступ ко всем наемникам MERC сразу после открытия доступа к сайту. Будет включать в себя любых добавленных в будущем наемников MERC
Property.Description_CHI: 这个控制在MERC网站刚开张的时候是否可雇佣所有的MERC佣兵。同样包括所有附加的佣兵（比如MOD添加的）

Property.name: MERCS_CAN_BE_ON_ASSIGNMENT
Property.Description_ENG: Mercs can be on assignment at the start of the game? Set to 1 and all the AIM mercs will be available to hire, set to 2 and all mercs will always be available. Set to 0 and you have JA2 Default behaviour.
Property.Description_CHI: 在游戏刚开始的时候，佣兵会不会进行别的任务。设置1，所有的AIM佣兵都可用，设置2，所有的包括MERC都可用。

Property.name: MERCS_CAN_DIE_ON_ASSIGNMENT
Property.Description_ENG: If TRUE, allows a chance for A.I.M. and M.E.R.C. mercs to die while away on another assignment.
Property.Description_CHI: 选“true”则所有的AIM和MERC佣兵在进行别的任务时都可能死。

Property.name: MAX_MERC_DEATHS_EASY
Property.Description_ENG: If MERCS_CAN_DIE_ON_ASSIGNMENT is set to TRUE, this defines how many AIM/MERC characters (in total) can die while on another assignment. This setting controls NOVICE difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果“MERCS_CAN_DIE_ON_ASSIGNMENT”设置成“true”，这个选项控制最多会有AIM/MERC佣兵在别的任务中死掉。这是新手难度的选项。

Property.name: MAX_MERC_DEATHS_EXPERIENCED
Property.Description_ENG: If MERCS_CAN_DIE_ON_ASSIGNMENT is set to TRUE, this defines how many AIM/MERC characters (in total) can die while on another assignment. This setting controls EXPERIENCED difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果“MERCS_CAN_DIE_ON_ASSIGNMENT”设置成“true”，这个选项控制最多会有AIM/MERC佣兵在别的任务中死掉。这是有经验的难度的选项。

Property.name: MAX_MERC_DEATHS_EXPERT
Property.Description_ENG: If MERCS_CAN_DIE_ON_ASSIGNMENT is set to TRUE, this defines how many AIM/MERC characters (in total) can die while on another assignment. This setting controls EXPERT difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果“MERCS_CAN_DIE_ON_ASSIGNMENT”设置成“true”，这个选项控制最多会有AIM/MERC佣兵在别的任务中死掉。这是砖家难度的选项。

Property.name: MAX_MERC_DEATHS_INSANE
Property.Description_ENG: If MERCS_CAN_DIE_ON_ASSIGNMENT is set to TRUE, this defines how many AIM/MERC characters (in total) can die while on another assignment. This setting controls INSANE difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果“MERCS_CAN_DIE_ON_ASSIGNMENT”设置成“true”，这个选项控制最多会有AIM/MERC佣兵在别的任务中死掉。这是疯狂难度的选项。

Property.name: SLAY_STAYS_FOREVER
Property.Description_ENG: If set to TRUE you can have Slay the terrorist for an unlimited time in your team. You also have to set ENABLE_ALL_TERRORISTS = TRUE. For easy recruiting, just give Slay the disc you got from Carmen.
Property.Description_GER: Wenn diese Einstellung auf TRUE gesetzt wird, können Sie Slay den Terroristen für unbestimmte Zeit in ihrem Team haben. Weiters muss noch ENABLE_ALL_TERRORISTS = TRUE gesetzt werden. Um Slay nun rekrutieren zu können, muss man Slay die Diskette geben, welche man von Carmen erhalten hat.
Property.Description_RUS: При включении позволяет нанять Убийцу навсегда.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果选择“true”，通缉犯Slay将永久留在你的队伍里。同时需要设定ENABLE_ALL_TERRORISTS = TRUE才能让这个选项有效果。（否则可能不出现）

Property.name: EARLY_REBELS_RECRUITMENT
Property.Description_ENG: Early Recruitment of Rebels - This enables recruiting Rebels earlier without the need to alter their .npc files. Valid values are from 1 to 3 where: 1 = immediately after liberating Omerta 2 = having liberated 1, 2 or 3 towns depending on the "FACT_PLAYER_OWNS_x_TOWNS_INCLUDING_OMERTA" setting in the RPCs .npc file. If you use vanilla .npc files Miguel and Carlos will join after 3 towns liberated including Omerta 3 = vanilla behaviour - you must have liberated 3, 4, 5 towns including Omerta 4 = must have liberated Omerta and solved the "Deliver Food Quest" for Miguel
Property.Description_CHI: 早期就可招募反叛军F4。这个选项可以在早期就招募反叛军而不用修改他们的 .npc文件。 1到3是可选的： 1 = 解放Omerta后就可以 2 = 解放1～3个城镇后，取决于“FACT_PLAYER_OWNS_x_TOWNS_INCLUDING_OMERTA” 3 = 原版设定，你必须解放3、4、5个城镇（包括Omerta）后 4 = 必须解放Omerta并且完成给反叛军送粮食的任务之后。

Section.name: Financial Settings
Section.Description_ENG: These settings adjust the various money-related features of the game, including mine income and militia costs.
Section.Description_CHI: 这个部分控制各种与资金有关的选项。

Property.name: STARTING_CASH_NOVICE
Property.Description_ENG: This is how much cash you get at the start of the campaign, when playing on NOVICE difficulty.
Property.Description_GER: Das Anfangsgeld für den Schwierigkeitsgrad Einsteiger.
Property.Description_RUS: Стартовая сумма на легком уровне игры.
Property.Description_CHI: 新手难度游戏开始时提供多少资金。

Property.name: STARTING_CASH_EXPERIENCED
Property.Description_ENG: This is how much cash you get at the start of the campaign, when playing on EXPERIENCED difficulty.
Property.Description_GER: Das Anfangsgeld für den Schwierigkeitsgrad Profi.
Property.Description_RUS: Стартовая сумма на среднем уровне игры.
Property.Description_CHI: 有经验的难度游戏开始时提供多少资金。

Property.name: STARTING_CASH_EXPERT
Property.Description_ENG: This is how much cash you get at the start of the campaign, when playing on EXPERT difficulty.
Property.Description_GER: Das Anfangsgeld für den Schwierigkeitsgrad Alter Hase.
Property.Description_RUS: Стартовая сумма на тяжелом уровне игры.
Property.Description_CHI: 砖家难度游戏开始时提供多少资金。

Property.name: MERC_LEVEL_UP_SALARY_INCREASE_PERCENTAGE
Property.Description_ENG: The percentage that a merc's salary rises each they go one experience level up, 0 = no raise, 100 is double salary
Property.Description_CHI: 佣兵升级时，薪水提高多少。0 = 不提高，100 = 2倍即提高100%。

Property.name: MINE_INCOME_PERCENTAGE
Property.Description_ENG:
Increases or decreases (by percentage) the amount of cash that mines generate every day.
100% = normal JA2 profits. This value can be set as low as 1%. Setting it to 0 will automatically default to 1%, as otherwise it'll crash your game. This value goes all the way up to 65535%, but that's not recommended.
Property.Description_CHI: 提高或减少矿厂每天的收益。 100% = 标准JA2收益 这个值最低必须为1%，如果设置成0%将自动调整为1%，否则游戏将崩溃。 这个值最高可设置为65535%，不过不建议调这么高。

Property.name: STARTING_CASH_INSANE
Property.Description_ENG: This is how much cash you get at the start of the campaign, when playing on INSANE difficulty.
Property.Description_GER: Das Anfangsgeld für den Schwierigkeitsgrad WAHNSINNIG.
Property.Description_RUS: Стартовая сумма на невозможном уровне игры.
Property.Description_CHI: 疯狂难度游戏开始时提供多少资金。

Property.name: SELL_ITEMS_WITH_ALT_LMB
Property.Description_ENG: If set to TRUE, this enables the ability to sell items from the sector inventory screen with ALT+LMB.
Property.Description_GER: Wenn dieser Wert auf TRUE gesetzt wird, können Gegenstände im Sektorinventar mit [ALT]+LMB (Left Mouse Button/Linke Maustaste) verkauft werden.
Property.Description_RUS: Если включено, вы получаете возможность продавать предметы из стратегической карты нажатием ALT+LMB
Property.Description_CHI: 选择true时，可以用ALT+鼠标左键卖掉战略界面地图物品。

Property.name: SELL_ITEMS_PRICE_MODIFIER
Property.Description_ENG: If SELL_ITEMS_WITH_ALT_LMB is set to TRUE, this value is a divisor of the items value when you sell it with ALT+LMB. For example, if you set this value to 4, you will sell the item for 25% of its original value (1/4). Setting a value of 20 would mean 5% of the items value, and a value of 10 would mean 10%. Valid ranges for PRICE_MODIFIER are -1 - 100. 0 = forces the system to dynamically adjust the Price Modifier based on game progress with greater progress resulting in a larger modifier. -1 = works the opposite of 0. Greater game progress causes a smaller modifier resulting in greater income from selling later in the game.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果 SELL_ITEMS_WITH_ALT_LMB 选择 True，这个值将控制卖掉的物品折价率。 比如，如果设置为4，则物品卖价为原价的25%。 可选的范围为-1～100. 0 = 强制系统依据游戏进度调整卖价，游戏进度越深入，则折价率越高。 -1 = 这个和0刚好相反，游戏进度越深入，折价率越低，将会卖到更多钱。

Property.name: MILITIA_BASE_TRAINING_COST
Property.Description_ENG: This is the cost of a single Town Militia (Green / Rookie) training session.
Property.Description_CHI: 单个城中初级民兵训练需要的经费。

Property.name: MILITIA_COST_MULTIPLIER_REGULAR
Property.Description_ENG: This is a multiplier for MILITIA_BASE_TRAINING_COST, used when promoting Green Militia to Regular Militia (Light-Blue Shirts).
Property.Description_CHI: 普通民兵训练经费倍数。

Property.name: MILITIA_COST_MULTIPLIER_ELITE
Property.Description_ENG: This is a multiplier for MILITIA_BASE_TRAINING_COST, used when upgrading Regular Militia to Elite Militia (Dark-Blue Shirts). ALLOW_TRAINING_ELITE_MILITIA must be set to TRUE for such an upgrade to even be possible.
Property.Description_CHI: 精英民兵训练经费倍数。

Property.name: MILITIA_COST_MULTIPLIER_MOBILE
Property.Description_ENG: This is a multiplier for MILITIA_BASE_TRAINING_COST, used for the cost of a single Mobile Militia training session. ALLOW_MOBILE_MILITIA and MUST_TRAIN_MOBILE_MILITIA must both be set to TRUE for this to even be possible.
Property.Description_CHI: 移动民兵的训练费用倍数。 必须选择“ALLOW_MOBILE_MILITIA and MUST_TRAIN_MOBILE_MILITIA”为True才能使这个选项有效果。

Property.name: DAILY_MILITIA_UPKEEP_TOWN_GREEN
Property.Description_ENG: This is a daily upkeep cost for maintaining a single Town Militia man of Green level. This cost is paid every midnight. If you can't afford to pay the whole amount, some (or all) militia will leave your service. Only militia who have been in your service for 24 hours are paid!
Property.Description_CHI: 这是每日维护一个城镇里绿色等级民兵的费用。午夜的时候自动扣除。如果你无法全额支付，部分或者全部的民兵会自动离开。民兵在为你服务24小时才会要求支付报酬。

Property.name: DAILY_MILITIA_UPKEEP_TOWN_REGULAR
Property.Description_ENG: This is a daily upkeep cost for maintaining a single Town Militia man of Regular level. This cost is paid every midnight. If you can't afford to pay the whole amount, some (or all) militia will leave your service. Only militia who have been in your service for 24 hours are paid!
Property.Description_CHI: 这是每日维护一个城镇里老兵等级民兵的费用。午夜的时候自动扣除。如果你无法全额支付，部分或者全部的民兵会自动离开。民兵在为你服务24小时才会要求支付报酬。

Property.name: DAILY_MILITIA_UPKEEP_TOWN_ELITE
Property.Description_ENG: This is a daily upkeep cost for maintaining a single Town Militia man of Elite level. This cost is paid every midnight. If you can't afford to pay the whole amount, some (or all) militia will leave your service. Only militia who have been in your service for 24 hours are paid!
Property.Description_CHI: 这是每日维护一个城镇里精英等级民兵的费用。午夜的时候自动扣除。如果你无法全额支付，部分或者全部的民兵会自动离开。民兵在为你服务24小时才会要求支付报酬。

Property.name: DAILY_MILITIA_UPKEEP_MOBILE_GREEN
Property.Description_ENG: This is a daily upkeep cost for maintaining a single Mobile Militia man of Green level. This cost is paid every midnight. If you can't afford to pay the whole amount, some (or all) militia will leave your service. Only militia who have been in your service for 24 hours are paid!
Property.Description_CHI: 这是每日维护一个格子里游击绿色等级民兵的费用。午夜的时候自动扣除。如果你无法全额支付，部分或者全部的民兵会自动离开。民兵在为你服务24小时才会要求支付报酬。

Property.name: DAILY_MILITIA_UPKEEP_MOBILE_REGULAR
Property.Description_ENG: This is a daily upkeep cost for maintaining a single Mobile Militia man of Regular level.
Property.Description_CHI: 这是每日维护一个格子里游击老兵等级民兵的费用。

Property.name: DAILY_MILITIA_UPKEEP_MOBILE_ELITE
Property.Description_ENG: This is a daily upkeep cost for maintaining a single Mobile Militia man of Elite level. This cost is paid every midnight. If you can't afford to pay the whole amount, some (or all) militia will leave your service. Only militia who have been in your service for 24 hours are paid!
Property.Description_CHI: 这是每日维护一个格子里游击精英等级民兵的费用。午夜的时候自动扣除。如果你无法全额支付，部分或者全部的民兵会自动离开。民兵在为你服务24小时才会要求支付报酬。

Property.name: HELICOPTER_BASE_COST_PER_GREEN_TILE
Property.Description_ENG: Determines how much money Skyrider (the helicopter pilot) charges PER SECTOR, when flying through "free" airspace (green in the strategic airspace map).
Property.Description_CHI: 决定直升机每飞一安全的绿格需要多少钱。

Property.name: HELICOPTER_BASE_COST_PER_RED_TILE
Property.Description_ENG: Determines how much money Skyrider (the helicopter pilot) charges PER SECTOR, when flying through "dangerous" airspace (red in the strategic airspace map).
Property.Description_CHI: 决定直升机每飞一危险的红格需要多少钱。

Section.name: Troubleshooting Settings
Section.Description_ENG: In this section you can activate some features that may prevent bugs, or help overcome problems.
Section.Description_CHI: 激活这个选项你可以防止游戏的Bug，或者解决一些Bug问题。

Property.name: DEAD_LOCK_DELAY
Property.Description_ENG: If an AI-controlled character becomes stuck, this is how many seconds will pass before the game decides to skip that character completely. Do not set this too low, or you may end up skipping legitimate AI movement! Time in seconds for DeadLock delay, default 30.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果AI角色卡住了，这里可以选择游戏决定在多少秒之后跳过它，别把它设得太低，否则你可能错过一些合理的AI动作。AI防锁死时间，默认30秒。

Property.name: ENABLE_EMERGENCY_BUTTON_NUMLOCK_TO_SKIP_STRATEGIC_EVENTS
Property.Description_ENG: Skip global strategic events. This can be used to prevent game crashes. Press and hold NUMLOCK to skip the event.
Property.Description_GER: Drücken und halten Sie [NUMLOCK], um ein strategisches Ereignis zu überspringen. Diese Methode kann angewandt werden, um einen Spielabsturz zu vermeiden.
Property.Description_RUS: Пропуск глобальных событий. Может быть использовано для предотвращения крашей игры. Нажмите и держите NUMLOCK для пропуска событий
Property.Description_CHI: 跳过全球战略时间，这可以防止游戏崩溃，按住NUMLOCK键来跳过这些事件。

Property.name: AUTO_SAVE_ON_ASSERTION_FAILURE
Property.Description_ENG: Automatically try to save when an assertion failure occurs. Please submit the savegame with your bug-report.
Property.Description_CHI: 游戏崩溃是自动存盘，请将存盘和错误报告一并提交。

Property.name: AUTO_SAVE_EVERY_N_HOURS
Property.Description_ENG: Automatically save the game every N GAME-hours. 0 = disable.
Property.Description_CHI: 游戏时间自动存盘开关。0为关闭

Section.name: Graphics Settings
Section.Description_ENG: In this section you can change video and graphics settings. These setting have no influence on game-play, they are purely visual.
Section.Description_CHI: 这个选项你可以更改游戏图像设定，本选项对于游戏进程无影响，它纯粹是图像上的。

Property.name: VERTICAL_SYNC
Property.Description_ENG: If VERTICAL_SYNC is set to FALSE, the game will run faster.
Property.Description_GER: Wenn VERTICAL_SYNC auf FALSE gesetzt wird, läuft das Spiel schneller.
Property.Description_RUS: Отключение вертикальной синхронизации для ускорения игры
Property.Description_CHI: 如果垂直同步设为否，游戏速度会更快。

Property.name: PLAYER_TURN_SPEED_UP_FACTOR
Property.Description_ENG: Set the value to 1 for normal speed and 0 for maximum speed for the player's merc.
Property.Description_GER: Setzen Sie diesen Wert auf 1 für die normale und auf 0 für die höchste Animationsgeschwindigkeit der Spielercharaktere.
Property.Description_RUS: Установите значение равным 1 для обычной скорости или равным 0 для максимальной скорости мерка
Property.Description_CHI: 本选项设为1，则玩家佣兵正常速度，设为零则最快速度。

Property.name: ENEMY_TURN_SPEED_UP_FACTOR
Property.Description_ENG: Set the value to 1 for normal speed and 0 for maximum speed for the enemies.
Property.Description_GER: Setzen Sie diesen Wert auf 1 für die normale und auf 0 für die höchste Animationsgeschwindigkeit der Feindcharaktere.
Property.Description_RUS: Установите значение равным 1 для обычной скорости или равным 0 для максимальной скорости противников
Property.Description_CHI: 本选项设为1，则敌人正常速度，设为零则最快速度。

Property.name: CREATURE_TURN_SPEED_UP_FACTOR
Property.Description_ENG: Set the value to 1 for normal speed and 0 for maximum speed for the creatues.
Property.Description_GER: Setzen Sie diesen Wert auf 1 für die normale und auf 0 für die höchste Animationsgeschwindigkeit der Tiere und Monster.
Property.Description_RUS: Установите значение равным 1 для обычной скорости или равным 0 для максимальной скорости монстров
Property.Description_CHI: 本选项设为1，则动物正常速度，设为零则最快速度。

Property.name: MILITIA_TURN_SPEED_UP_FACTOR
Property.Description_ENG: Set the value to 1 for normal speed and 0 for maximum speed for the militia.
Property.Description_GER: Setzen Sie diesen Wert auf 1 für die normale und auf 0 für die höchste Animationsgeschwindigkeit der Milizionäre.
Property.Description_RUS: Установите значение равным 1 для обычной скорости или равным 0 для максимальной скорости милиции
Property.Description_CHI: 本选项设为1，则民兵正常速度，设为零则最快速度。

Property.name: CIVILIAN_TURN_SPEED_UP_FACTOR
Property.Description_ENG: Set the value to 1 for normal speed and 0 for maximum speed for the civilians.
Property.Description_GER: Setzen Sie diesen Wert auf 1 für die normale und auf 0 für die höchste Animationsgeschwindigkeit der Zivilisten.
Property.Description_RUS: Установите значение равным 1 для обычной скорости или равным 0 для максимальной скорости гражданских
Property.Description_CHI: 本选项设为1，则平民佣兵正常速度，设为零则最快速度。

Property.name: USE_EXTERNALIZED_LOADSCREENS
Property.Description_ENG: Should the game use the externalized sector loadscreens? If set to TRUE, the game will use the loadscreens defined in TableData\Map\SectorLoadscreens.xml. If set to FALSE, the game will use the default loadscreen for the sectors, like in Vanilla JA2.
Property.Description_GER: Soll das Spiel die externalisierten Ladebildschirme benutzen? Wenn die Einstellung auf TRUE gesetzt wird, wird JA2 die Ladebildschirme benutzen, die im Ordner TableData\Map\SectorLoadscreens.xml hinterlegt wurden. Wenn die Einstellung auf FALSE gesetzt wird, wird JA2 die klassischen Ladebildschirme benutzen.
Property.Description_RUS: Позволяет игре использовать внешние экраны загрузки. Если TRUE, игра использует экраны определенные в TableData\Map\SectorLoadscreens.xml. Если FALSE, игрв будет использовать экраны секторов, как в Vanilla JA2.
Property.Description_CHI: 是否使用外加读取界面，设为是，则用TableData\Map\SectorLoadscreens.xml.设定的读取界面，设为否，则用默认的。

Property.name: USE_NEW_STARTING_GEAR_INTERFACE
Property.Description_ENG: Use new starting gear interface on the AIM website, including 21 item view and up to 5 gearkits selection, if disabled classic style is used.
Property.Description_CHI: 在AIM网站上可以选择初始配备的物品，包括21种物品和5种工具箱。设为否则使用默认。

Property.name: RESTRICT_FEMALE_ENEMIES_EXCEPT_ELITE
Property.Description_ENG: Should the queen's army avoid recruiting Female soldiers? If set to TRUE, female enemies will only occur as Elites in the army.
Property.Description_CHI: 王后部队无女性士兵选项。（性别歧视你伤不起啊。）如果选是，则王后部队中只有精英部队有女兵。

Property.name: SMALL_SIZE_PB
Property.Description_ENG: Default: FALSE New thin progress bar in tactical interface for turns is drawn instead of the default one.
Property.Description_CHI: 默认设为否，战术画面上的进度条设为新的细细的进度条。

Section.name: Sound Settings
Section.Description_ENG: In this section you can change sounds settings.
Section.Description_GER: In dieser Sektion können Sie die Audioeinstellungen verändern.
Section.Description_RUS: Этот раздел отвечает за звуковые настройки
Section.Description_CHI: 这里你可以改动声音选项。

Property.name: WEAPON_SOUND_EFFECTS_VOLUME
Property.Description_ENG:
Change this value to increase the volume for weapon sounds.
0 = No volume change for the weapon sounds 1 = Maximum volumne for the weapon sounds
Property.Description_GER:
Verändern Sie diesen Wert, um die Lautstärke der Waffengeräusche zu erhöhen.
0 = Keine Veränderung der Waffengeräusche 1 = Maximale Lautstärke der Waffengeräusche
Property.Description_RUS:
Измените это значения для увеличения громкости озвучки оружия.
0 = без изменений 1 = максимальная громкость звуков оружия.
Property.Description_CHI: 这里设定你的武器声音大小。 0= 武器无声。 1= 武器最大声音

Section.name: Tactical Interface Settings
Section.Description_ENG: In this section you can adjust the user-interface in TACTICAL screen. Some of the new/altered interface may make the game easier or harder, depending on the settings you choose.
Section.Description_CHI: 这个选项你可以调整用户战术画面。有些新界面选项可能会使游戏更容易或者更难，取决于你的设定。

Property.name: REVEAL_DROPPED_ENEMY_ITEMS_AFTER_COMBAT
Property.Description_ENG: If this is set to TRUE, all items dropped by enemies during a battle will automatically be revealed at the end of combat (when all enemies are dead). Otherwise, you have to actually walk past the dead enemy bodies for their equipment to be revealed.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果这里设为True，战斗结束后敌人掉落的所有物品都会自动显现。否则，你需要经过敌人的尸体，才能发现这些物品。

Property.name: SHIFT_F_UNLOAD_WEAPONS
Property.Description_ENG: Set this to FALSE to keep weapons loaded when SHIFT+F is pressed. Note that loaded weapon can be stolen by militia or enemy.
Property.Description_GER: Setzen Sie diesen Wert auf FALSE, um Waffen nicht zu entladen. Geladenen Waffen können von Feinden oder der Miliz gestohlen werden.
Property.Description_RUS: Set this to FALSE to keep weapons loaded. Loaded weapon can be stolen by militia or enemy.
Property.Description_CHI: 本选项设为 Flase 则按下 SHIFT+F 武器装满弹，注意装满弹的武器可能会被敌人或民兵捡走。

Property.name: SHIFT_F_REMOVE_ATTACHMENTS
Property.Description_ENG: Set this to FALSE to keep item attachments when SHIFT+F is pressed. Unseparable attachments will not be removed.
Property.Description_GER: Setzen Sie diesen Wert auf FALSE, um Anbauten nicht zu entfernen. Nichtabtrennbare Anbauten können selbst mit TRUE nicht entfernt werden.
Property.Description_RUS: Установите параметр в FALSE для сохранения атачментов. Неотделимые атачменты не могут быть удалены
Property.Description_CHI: 本选项设为 Flase 则按下 SHIFT+F 时武器上不可分离的附件会被保留，

Property.name: SMART_GOGGLE_SWAP
Property.Description_ENG: If set to TRUE, Shift-N will switch to best night vision goggles at night, and best sunglasses during the day. If set to FALSE, whatever the merc is wearing will be switched with the best of the other kind (the "classic" behavior).
Property.Description_RUS: Если включено - по SHIFT-N одевает лучшие приборы ночного видения ночью и очки днем
Property.Description_CHI: 本选项设为 True 则按下 SHIFT+N会让佣兵在晚上换上最好的夜视仪，白天换上最好的太阳镜（Gucci？Nikon？）否则，佣兵换上的是其他种类最好的装备。

Property.name: GOGGLE_SWAP_AFFECTS_ALL_MERCS_IN_SECTOR
Property.Description_ENG: If set to TRUE, any automatic goggle swap (SHIFT-N or CTRL-SHIFT-N) will swap goggles for EVERY MERC IN THE SECTOR. If set to FALSE, only mercs in the currently-selected squad are affected.
Property.Description_CHI: 本选项设为 True 自动护目镜切换会对于本区所有佣兵起效，否则只对当前小队佣兵起效。

Property.name: AUTOMATICALLY_FLAG_MINES_WHEN_SPOTTED
Property.Description_ENG: If set to TRUE, when a character finds a mine they will automatically put a blue flag there without asking. If set to FALSE, when a character finds a mine they will ask whether to put a blue flag there (the "classic" behavior).
Property.Description_RUS: Если включено, при нахождении мины персонаж автоматически ставит флаг.
Property.Description_CHI: 本选项设为 True 则佣兵角色会在发现地雷的时候自动插个蓝旗子，否则他们会先问是否要插。

Property.name: MINES_SPOTTED_NO_TALK
Property.Description_ENG: If set to TRUE, when a character finds a mine they will not say anything and only put a blue flag there or ask if they should do so. (depends on the setting of "AUTOMATICALLY_FLAG_MINES_WHEN_SPOTTED") If set to FALSE, when a character finds a mine they will tell you with a comment (the "classic" behavior).
Property.Description_GER: Setzen Sie diesen Wert auf TRUE, damit Söldner einen Minenfund nicht mehr kommentieren. Bei FALSE gibt der Söldner wie früher einen Kommentar ab.
Property.Description_CHI: 本选项设为 True ，则佣兵在发现地雷时不说话，自动插旗，否则他们会吭一声。

Property.name: ITEMS_SPOTTED_NO_TALK
Property.Description_ENG: If this is "TRUE" your merc won't says anything and want stop when spotting an item in turn based mode.

Property.name: STAND_UP_AFTER_BATTLE
Property.Description_ENG: If this is "TRUE", all mercs will stand up after the battle, which is the JA2 default behaviour. If set to "FALSE", the mercs will not stand up after the battle.
Property.Description_CHI: 本选项设为 True ，所用佣兵在结束战斗时会自动起身，否则则不会。

Property.name: ALLOW_TACTICAL_MILITIA_COMMAND
Property.Description_ENG: If set to TRUE, allows giving abstract orders to Militia in tactical mode. You can give commands to single militia by talking to them. If your merc is wearing a headphone with whom you talk to the militia, you can give commands to ALL militia.
Property.Description_CHI: 本选项设为 True 则允许你给民兵战术命令，你可以跟一个民兵对话，给他发指令，如果你的佣兵戴着耳麦，你可以给所有民兵指令。

Property.name: USE_ENHANCED_DESCRIPTION_BOX
Property.Description_ENG: This determines where the Enhanced Description Box is used, instead of the "Classic" Description Box. 0 = Both Strategic and Tactical 1 = Strategic only 2 = Tactical only You can switch EDB on and off using the in-game Options Menu.
Property.Description_CHI: 这个决定是否使用 Enhanced Description Box（物品描述加强版）来代替原来的物品描述窗口 0 = 既在战术界面下又在战略界面下 1 = 只在战略界面下 2 = 只在战术界面下 你还可以在游戏的设置菜单那里却换【开启】和【关闭】EDB

Property.name: USE_NEW_BURST-AUTO_TARGETING_CURSORS
Property.Description_ENG: Enables new and improved "Chance-to-Hit" targeting cursors for Burst Fire and Auto Fire. Also adds "targeted bodypart" indicators to both. 0 = Use normal JA2 1.13 cursors. 1 = Use new Autofire and Burstfire cursors 2 = Use new Burstfire cursor only 3 = Use new Autofire cursor only
Property.Description_RUS: Позволяет выбрать курсор для стрельбы очередями и залпом. Также добавляется выбор частей тела в обоих режимах. 0 = Использовать обычный JA2 1.13 курсор. 1 = Использовать новые Autofire и Burstfire курсоры 2 = Использовать только Burstfire курсор 3 = Использовать только Autofire курсор
Property.Description_CHI: 点射和扫射时启用新改进的 "Chance-to-Hit" 瞄准框，并且增加“瞄准的身体部位”。 0 = 使用 JA2 1.13 标准的瞄准框 1 = 既在点射时又在扫射时使用新的瞄准框 2 = 只在点射时使用新的瞄准框 3 = 只在扫射时使用新的瞄准框

Property.name: INACCURATE_CTH_READOUT
Property.Description_ENG: When this is set to TRUE, it will change the way that the CTH Bar and "F" key feedback report our CTH. Based on the characters' Experience Level, Wisdom, Marksmanship and Sniper Skill (if any), the program will decide how accurate our CTH feedback would be. An untrained character will see CTH jump between fewer "stations" than 100 (the normal). A very trained character will see the exact results.
Property.Description_CHI: 当设置为 TRUE 时，会改变 CTH 系统工具条和“F”键的信息反馈方式。 CTH 系统反馈的信息准确性取决于佣兵的等级、智力、枪法和有无狙击手技能。未经训练的角色将看到 CTH 在较少的“stations”和100（正常）跳动。一个训练有素的角色将看到确切的结果。

Property.name: HIDE_BULLET_COUNT_INTENSITY
Property.Description_ENG: If this is set above 0, characters may sometimes forget how many bullets are left in their gun. Depending on the character's Wisdom, Dexterity and Experience Level, he/she may be able to give an educated guess. Otherwise, the number of bullets left is completely hidden. Increasing this value will make it harder to give an accurate bullet count during battle. This feature only works when in turn-based TACTICAL mode. If the game switches to real-time, the true bullet count is displayed as normal.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果设为大于0，佣兵有时会无法准确估计枪里剩余的子弹数。 根据佣兵的等级、智力、敏捷综合能力的不同，有可能估算出剩余子弹数。否则，将隐藏剩余子弹数（无法估算）。 这一项的数值调得越高，佣兵越难估算剩余的子弹数。 此功能仅当在战术回合制模式。如果游戏切换到实时模式，正常显示子弹数量。

Property.name: MAXIMUM_MESSAGES_IN_TACTICAL
Property.Description_ENG: Set how many messages can be displayed on-screen at the same time, in TACTICAL screen. The default is 6. PLEASE NOTE: The actual maximum is based on your screen resolution: 640x480: Maximum is 20 lines. 800x600: Maximum is 26 lines. 1024x768: Maximum is 36 lines. If the value is set higher than allowed for your current resolution, it is automatically decreased.
Property.Description_CHI: 战术界面下最多能同时显示多少条信息，默认是6 请注意：实际的最大值基于你的屏幕分辨率： 640x480: 最大20行. 800x600: 最大26行. 1024x768: 最大36行. 如果设置的值高于你的当前分辨率将自动减少。

Property.name: NO_AUTO_FOCUS_CHANGE_IN_REALTIME_SNEAK
Property.Description_ENG: When set to TRUE, prevents the game from automatically selecting a merc when he/she spots an enemy in Real Time mode. This only works if ALLOW_REAL_TIME_SNEAK is turned on. If for any reason turn-base mode is triggered when spotting the enemy, the character will be selected as normal regardless of this setting.
Property.Description_CHI: 当设为 TRUE，在实时模式下看到敌人时屏幕不会自动切换到看到敌人的那个佣兵，而是停留在当前画面。这只能工作在 ALLOW_REAL_TIME_SNEAK 开启的情况下。 当侦查敌人时不管任何原因触发回合制模式，画面将切换到看到敌人的那个佣兵而忽视此设置。

Property.name: TACTICAL_FACE_ICON_STYLE
Property.Description_ENG: If "Show Face gear graphics" is enabled in the option screen, you can choose from 4 different icon styles (Range: 0 - 3). 0 = Data\Interface\PORTRAITICONS_A.STI 1 = Data\Interface\PORTRAITICONS_B.STI 2 = Data\Interface\PORTRAITICONS_C.STI 3 = Data\Interface\PORTRAITICONS_D.STI
Property.Description_CHI: 如果设置界面里的“显示脸部装备图片”开启，你可以选择4中不同的图标样式（排列：0 - 3） 0 = Data\Interface\PORTRAITICONS_A.STI 1 = Data\Interface\PORTRAITICONS_B.STI 2 = Data\Interface\PORTRAITICONS_C.STI 3 = Data\Interface\PORTRAITICONS_D.STI

Property.name: SHOW_CAMOUFLAGE_FACES
Property.Description_ENG: If enabled, you see camouflaged portraits of your merc if they were any camo. If no camouflaged portrait is available (Data\Faces\xxxCAMO folders), you see the standard face portrait.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果开启，佣兵使用迷彩时你可以在佣兵头像看到伪装效果。 如果 Data\Faces\xxxCAMO 文件夹里面没有伪装头像，你看到的是一般头像。

Property.name: HIDE_ENEMY_HEALTH_TEXT
Property.Description_ENG: If enabled, you do not see the health text when hovering the mouse over an enemy / creature.

Property.name: ENEMY_HIT_COUNT
Property.Description_ENG: How should the game display the enemy hit counter? 0 = Show damage inflicted as used to 1 = Show "?" as indicator if you scored a hit 2 = Do not show anything at all (If you scored a hit you need to tell by target's reaction)

Property.name: STAMINA_HIT
Property.Description_ENG: Default: 10000 Regulates the bullet hit impact to stamina. The lower is the value, the more stamina is taken out. With the value of 6900 it takes 3-4 hits to take all the breath away.
Property.Description_CHI: 默认: 10000 Regulates the bullet hit impact to stamina. The lower is the value, the more stamina is taken out. With the value of 6900 it takes 3-4 hits to take all the breath away.

Property.name: ENABLE_EXT_MOUSE_KEYS
Property.Description_ENG: Additional mouse keys (and the "scrolling wheel") are enabled. Now we can use the mouse wheel to aim the weapon, toggle between merc-s or auto fire length. Middle mouse button is used to look (= "L" key), alt + middle mouse button changes firing modes, alt + wheel change the stance. 4-th mouse button enables/disables the stealth mode. Alt + 4-th mouse button reloads the weapon. Mouse button 5 switches the cursor to roofs, alt + mouse button 5 enables climbing to roofs.
Property.Description_CHI: Additional mouse keys (and the "scrolling wheel") are enabled. Now we can use the mouse wheel to aim the weapon, toggle between merc-s or auto fire length. Middle mouse button is used to look (= "L" key), alt + middle mouse button changes firing modes, alt + wheel change the stance. 4-th mouse button enables/disables the stealth mode. Alt + 4-th mouse button reloads the weapon. Mouse button 5 switches the cursor to roofs, alt + mouse button 5 enables climbing to roofs.

Property.name: ALT_AIMING_ENABLED
Property.Description_ENG: Default: FALSE Alternative aiming-levels for targets.
Property.Description_CHI: 默认：FALSE Alternative aiming-levels for targets.

Property.name: USE_AIMED_BURST
Property.Description_ENG: Default: FALSE The merc can now perform aimed burst fire and aimed auto fire. Due to the reworked auto and burst penalties aimed auto-fire is less efficient then aimed burst for all guns. There is simply no use in firing more then 3 rounds due to low CtH od the last bullets. Aiming is performed by the mouse scrolling wheel. ENABLE_EXT_MOUSE_KEYS must be set to TRUE for this option.
Property.Description_CHI: 默认：FALSE The merc can now perform aimed burst fire and aimed auto fire. Due to the reworked auto and burst penalties aimed auto-fire is less efficient then aimed burst for all guns. There is simply no use in firing more then 3 rounds due to low CtH od the last bullets. Aiming is performed by the mouse scrolling wheel. ENABLE_EXT_MOUSE_KEYS must be set to TRUE for this option.

Property.name: AIMING_BURST_PENALTY
Property.Description_ENG: Default: 2 The value is a multiplier for the auto fire penalty and burst penalty. Is needed to balance the aimed burst and aimed auto fire. 2 is an optimal recommended value.
Property.Description_CHI: 默认：2 The value is a multiplier for the auto fire penalty and burst penalty. Is needed to balance the aimed burst and aimed auto fire. 2 is an optimal recommended value.

Property.name: WE_SEE_WHAT_MILITIA_SEES_AND_VICE_VERSA
Property.Description_ENG: Default: TRUE Disable visibility of enemy, if they see militia but don't see our mercs.
Property.Description_CHI: 默认: TRUE Disable visibility of enemy, if they see militia but don't see our mercs.

Property.name: ALLOW_WEAR_SUPPRESSOR
Property.Description_ENG: Default: FALSE Enable\disable damageable gun suppressor. Damage of suppressor is depend on bReliability in Items.xml. It make sense to make it lower for silencer and to make it higher for suppressor.
Property.Description_CHI: 默认: FALSE Enable\disable damageable gun suppressor. Damage of suppressor is depend on bReliability in Items.xml. It make sense to make it lower for silencer and to make it higher for suppressor.

Property.name: ALLOW_LAZY_CIVILIANS
Property.Description_ENG: Default: FALSE Unnamed civils don't make much actions when you fire. For faster civils turns.
Property.Description_CHI: 默认: FALSE Unnamed civils don't make much actions when you fire. For faster civils turns.

Property.name: CHANCE_SAY_ANNOYING_PHRASE
Property.Description_ENG: Default: 100 Chance to say annoying phrase. 1. when merc see item. 2. when battle turns to real time 3. when merc see enemy 4. approve action
Property.Description_CHI: 默认：100 说烦人短语的时机 1. 当佣兵看到物品时 2. 当战斗切换到实时 3. 当佣兵看到敌人 4. 批准行动

Property.name: NEW_AI_TACTICAL
Property.Description_ENG: Default: FALSE Elite don't go to light place at night, enemy don't run on the dead body, if enemy find a killed soldier (radius 5 tiles) he turn on RED ALERT alarm.
Property.Description_CHI: 默认：FALSE 精英晚上不会跑到光亮处，敌兵不会跑到尸体上，如果敌兵发现被杀士兵（半径5格）将打开红色警戒警报。

Property.name: SHOT_HEAD_PENALTY
Property.Description_ENG: Default: 3 Penalty (in %) on tile when you shot in head (for enemy and mercs).
Property.Description_CHI: 默认：3 （%）格内打头加惩罚（包括敌兵和佣兵）。

Property.name: SHOT_HEAD_DIVISOR
Property.Description_ENG: Default: 2 Modifer of damage when hit in head (for enemy and mercs).
Property.Description_CHI: 默认：2 Modifer of damage when hit in head (for enemy and mercs).

Property.name: SHOOT_UNSEEN_PENALTY
Property.Description_ENG: Default: 0 Penalty on shoot when you don't see targets (when other merc\militia see enemy). Enabled only for mercs.
Property.Description_CHI: 默认：0 Penalty on shoot when you don't see targets (when other merc\militia see enemy). Enabled only for mercs.

Section.name: Tactical Difficulty Settings
Section.Description_ENG: In this section you can adjust game-difficulty in TACTICAL mode (combat).
Section.Description_CHI: 这个部分你可以调节战术（战斗）模式下的游戏难度。

Property.name: ENEMY_AP_BONUS_NOVICE
Property.Description_ENG: This gives bonus APs for enemy soldiers in NOVICE difficulty. Please note, this number is NOT automatically adjusted based on your selected AP system (25 / 100).
Property.Description_CHI: 新手难度下敌人行动点数加成。 Please note, this number is NOT automatically adjusted based on your selected AP system (25 / 100).

Property.name: ENEMY_AP_BONUS_EXPERIENCED
Property.Description_ENG: This gives bonus APs for enemy soldiers in EXPERIENCED difficulty. Please note, this number is NOT automatically adjusted based on your selected AP system (25 / 100).
Property.Description_CHI: 老手难度下敌人行动点数加成

Property.name: ENEMY_AP_BONUS_EXPERT
Property.Description_ENG: This gives bonus APs for enemy soldiers in EXPERT difficulty. Please note, this number is NOT automatically adjusted based on your selected AP system (25 / 100).
Property.Description_CHI: 专家难度下敌人行动点数加成

Property.name: ENEMY_AP_BONUS_INSANE
Property.Description_ENG: This gives bonus APs for enemy soldiers in INSANE difficulty. Please note, this number is NOT automatically adjusted based on your selected AP system (25 / 100).
Property.Description_CHI: 疯狂难度下敌人行动点数加成

Property.name: PLAYER_AP_BONUS
Property.Description_ENG: This gives bonus APs for the player's merc. Works almost exactly like the enemy AP bonus. Do not set this higher than 50.
Property.Description_CHI: 玩家行动点数加成。 工作方式和敌人AP的加成完全一样。 不要高于 50

Property.name: ADMIN_CTH_BONUS_PERCENT
Property.Description_ENG: Enemy CtH bonus - Admins This setting determines percentual multiplier of enemy Chance To Hit with guns or in close combat. "0" means 'no change', 100 means the CtH will be doubled every time (so if the enemy would have 30% CtH on the current shot, he has 60% instead).
Property.Description_CHI: 黄衣敌人的命中率加成。 This setting determines percentual multiplier of enemy Chance To Hit with guns or in close combat. "0" means 'no change', 100 means the CtH will be doubled every time (so if the enemy would have 30% CtH on the current shot, he has 60% instead).

Property.name: REGULAR_CTH_BONUS_PERCENT
Property.Description_ENG: Enemy CtH bonus - Regulars This setting determines percentual multiplier of enemy Chance To Hit with guns or in close combat. "0" means 'no change', 100 means the CtH will be doubled every time (so if the enemy would have 30% CtH on the current shot, he has 60% instead).
Property.Description_CHI: 红衣敌人的命中率加成。 This setting determines percentual multiplier of enemy Chance To Hit with guns or in close combat. "0" means 'no change', 100 means the CtH will be doubled every time (so if the enemy would have 30% CtH on the current shot, he has 60% instead).

Property.name: ELITE_CTH_BONUS_PERCENT
Property.Description_ENG: Enemy CtH bonus - Elite This setting determines percentual multiplier of enemy Chance To Hit with guns or in close combat. "0" means 'no change', 100 means the CtH will be doubled every time (so if the enemy would have 30% CtH on the current shot, he has 60% instead).
Property.Description_CHI: 黑衣敌人的命中率加成。 This setting determines percentual multiplier of enemy Chance To Hit with guns or in close combat. "0" means 'no change', 100 means the CtH will be doubled every time (so if the enemy would have 30% CtH on the current shot, he has 60% instead).

Property.name: ADMIN_DAMAGE_RESISTANCE
Property.Description_ENG: Enemy damage resistance bonus - Admins This setting allows you to set a damage resistance of the enemies. All damage from bullets, explosives, blades and punches will be reduced by as many percent as you set here. The setting also reduce the breath (aka energy) damage inflicted. The setting can go from -50 to 95. (Negative value will actually amplify the damage inflicted.)
Property.Description_CHI: 黄衣敌人的伤害抵抗加成。 This setting allows you to set a damage resistance of the enemies. All damage from bullets, explosives, blades and punches will be reduced by as many percent as you set here. The setting also reduce the breath (aka energy) damage inflicted. The setting can go from -50 to 95. (Negative value will actually amplify the damage inflicted.)

Property.name: REGULAR_DAMAGE_RESISTANCE
Property.Description_ENG: Enemy damage resistance bonus - Regulars This setting allows you to set a damage resistance of the enemies. All damage from bullets, explosives, blades and punches will be reduced by as many percent as you set here. The setting also reduce the breath (aka energy) damage inflicted. The setting can go from -50 to 95. (Negative value will actually amplify the damage inflicted.)
Property.Description_CHI: 红衣敌人的伤害抵抗加成。 This setting allows you to set a damage resistance of the enemies. All damage from bullets, explosives, blades and punches will be reduced by as many percent as you set here. The setting also reduce the breath (aka energy) damage inflicted. The setting can go from -50 to 95. (Negative value will actually amplify the damage inflicted.)

Property.name: ELITE_DAMAGE_RESISTANCE
Property.Description_ENG: Enemy damage resistance bonus - Elite This setting allows you to set a damage resistance of the enemies. All damage from bullets, explosives, blades and punches will be reduced by as many percent as you set here. The setting also reduce the breath (aka energy) damage inflicted. The setting can go from -50 to 95. (Negative value will actually amplify the damage inflicted.)
Property.Description_CHI: 黑衣敌人的伤害抵抗加成。 This setting allows you to set a damage resistance of the enemies. All damage from bullets, explosives, blades and punches will be reduced by as many percent as you set here. The setting also reduce the breath (aka energy) damage inflicted. The setting can go from -50 to 95. (Negative value will actually amplify the damage inflicted.)

Property.name: ASSIGN_SKILL_TRAITS_TO_ENEMY
Property.Description_ENG:
This option determines if the game skill traits should also be available to enemies.
The system of assigning traits is rather sofisticated. It ensures the soldier's equipment match his skill traits, so an enemy with LMG will most probably have Auto Weapons trait (no way he can be a sniper for instance). The actual chance the enemies/militia will gain a skill trait is based on: 1) Type of soldier (admin/regular/elite) 2) Current game progress 3) Special equipment (for certain traits only) 4) ASSIGNED_SKILL_TRAITS_RARITY setting 5) Random factor
Allowing the enemies to have traits can make the game signifficially harder (especially if using new trait system), as they will be more efficient with their weapons
Property.Description_CHI:
此选项确定是允许敌人拥有技能。
The system of assigning traits is rather sofisticated. It ensures the soldier's equipment match his skill traits, so an enemy with LMG will most probably have Auto Weapons trait (no way he can be a sniper for instance). The actual chance the enemies/militia will gain a skill trait is based on: 1) Type of soldier (admin/regular/elite) 2) Current game progress 3) Special equipment (for certain traits only) 4) ASSIGNED_SKILL_TRAITS_RARITY setting 5) Random factor
Allowing the enemies to have traits can make the game signifficially harder (especially if using new trait system), as they will be more efficient with their weapons

Property.name: ASSIGN_SKILL_TRAITS_TO_MILITIA
Property.Description_ENG:
This option determines if the game skill traits should also be available to militia.
The system of assigning traits is rather sofisticated. It ensures the soldier's equipment match his skill traits, so an enemy with LMG will most probably have Auto Weapons trait (no way he can be a sniper for instance). The actual chance the enemies/militia will gain a skill trait is based on: 1) Type of soldier (admin/regular/elite) 2) Current game progress 3) Special equipment (for certain traits only) 4) ASSIGNED_SKILL_TRAITS_RARITY setting 5) Random factor
Allowing the enemies to have traits can make the game signifficially harder (especially if using new trait system), as they will be more efficient with their weapons
Property.Description_CHI:
此选项确定是允许民兵拥有技能。
The system of assigning traits is rather sofisticated. It ensures the soldier's equipment match his skill traits, so an enemy with LMG will most probably have Auto Weapons trait (no way he can be a sniper for instance). The actual chance the enemies/militia will gain a skill trait is based on: 1) Type of soldier (admin/regular/elite) 2) Current game progress 3) Special equipment (for certain traits only) 4) ASSIGNED_SKILL_TRAITS_RARITY setting 5) Random factor
Allowing the enemies to have traits can make the game signifficially harder (especially if using new trait system), as they will be more efficient with their weapons

Property.name: ASSIGNED_SKILL_TRAITS_RARITY
Property.Description_ENG: This option reduces/increases percentually the chance an enemy/militia will gain a skill trait. You can enter values from -100 to 100. Negative values represent lesser chance of assigning traits to non-merc soldiers. Possitive values represent bigger chance for traits to appear. Zero keeps the chance quite balanced. (Recommended values are from -50 to 25)
Property.Description_CHI: 10表示敌人或民兵获得技能的几率提高10%。（因为敌人或民兵并不是一定能获得技能的，这取决于他的种类（黄衣红衣黑衣）、游戏进度、特殊装备、此项设置项、随机因素。） 数值：-100 到 100 Negative values represent lesser chance of assigning traits to non-merc soldiers. Possitive values represent bigger chance for traits to appear. Zero keeps the chance quite balanced. (推荐 -50 到 25)

Property.name: MILITIA_DROP_EQUIPMENT
Property.Description_ENG: Can Militia drop equipment when they die? Please note that the "Drop All" in-game option works the same on militia as it does on enemies. 0 = Militia cannot drop equipment when they die, ever (JA2 default). 1 = Militia may drop equipment, but only if killed by anyone OTHER than the player-characters. 2 = Militia may drop equipment when killed by anyone.
Property.Description_RUS: Определяет, должно ли выпадать воворужение из ополчения. 0 = не дропается. 1 = Дропается,е сли убит врагом. 2 = Дропается всегда.
Property.Description_CHI: 民兵掉落装备？ 注意：游戏选项里面的“全部掉落”同样影响民兵的装备掉落。 0 = 民兵不掉落装备（JA2 默认） 1 = 只有被敌人、平民、其他民兵杀死时才掉落 2 = 无论谁杀死民兵，都掉落装备

Property.name: HEALTH_SUBPOINTS_TO_IMPROVE
Property.Description_ENG: Determines how many total "sub-points" a character must acquire before his Health goes up one point. Double the value, and progression will become twice as slow. Halve the value, you'll gain points twice as fast. Please note that an ExpLevel value of more than 6500 will be counted as 6500!!
Property.Description_GER: Dies legt fest, wieviele "Sub-Punkte" ein Charakter benötigt, um seine Lebensenergie um einen Punkt zu steigern.
Property.Description_RUS: Определяет, как много подпунктов должен получить персонаж, прежде чем его здоровье повысится на 1
Property.Description_CHI: 生命提升的速度。增大的话提升得越慢。

Property.name: STRENGTH_SUBPOINTS_TO_IMPROVE
Property.Description_ENG: Determines how many total "sub-points" a character must acquire before his Strength goes up one point. Double the value, and progression will become twice as slow. Halve the value, you'll gain points twice as fast. Please note that an ExpLevel value of more than 6500 will be counted as 6500!!
Property.Description_GER: Dies legt fest, wieviele "Sub-Punkte" ein Charakter benötigt, um seine Stärke um einen Punkt zu steigern.
Property.Description_RUS: Определяет, как много подпунктов должен получить персонаж, прежде чем его сила повысится на 1
Property.Description_CHI: 强壮提升的速度。增大的话提升得越慢。

Halve the value, you'll gain points twice as fast. Please note that an ExpLevel value of more than 6500 will be counted as 6500!!
Property.Description_GER: Dies legt fest, wieviele "Sub-Punkte" ein Charakter benötigt, um seine Geschicklichkeit um einen Punkt zu steigern.
Property.Description_RUS: Определяет, как много подпунктов должен получить персонаж, прежде чем его ловкость повысится на 1
Property.Description_CHI: 灵巧提升的速度。增大的话提升得越慢。

Halve the value, you'll gain points twice as fast. Please note that an ExpLevel value of more than 6500 will be counted as 6500!!
Property.Description_GER: Dies legt fest, wieviele "Sub-Punkte" ein Charakter benötigt, um seine Beweglichkeit um einen Punkt zu steigern.
Property.Description_RUS: Определяет, как много подпунктов должен получить персонаж, прежде чем его проворность- повысится на 1
Property.Description_CHI: 敏捷提升的速度。增大的话提升得越慢。

Property.Description_RUS: Определяет, как много подпунктов должен получить персонаж, прежде чем его мудрость повысится на 1
Property.Description_CHI: 智慧提升的速度。增大的话提升得越慢。

Property.Description_GER: Dies legt fest, wieviele "Sub-Punkte" ein Charakter benötigt, um seine Zielgenauigkeit um einen Punkt zu steigern.
Property.Description_RUS: Определяет, как много подпунктов должен получить персонаж, прежде чем его меткость повысится на 1
Property.Description_CHI: 枪法提升的速度。增大的话提升得越慢。

Property.name: MEDICAL_SUBPOINTS_TO_IMPROVE
Property.Description_ENG: Determines how many total "sub-points" a character must acquire before his Medical goes up one point. Double the value, and progression will become twice as slow. Halve the value, you'll gain points twice as fast.
Property.Description_GER: Dies legt fest, wieviele "Sub-Punkte" ein Charakter benötigt, um seine Medizienfähigkeit um einen Punkt zu steigern.
Property.Description_RUS: Определяет, как много подпунктов должен получить персонаж, прежде чем его медицина повысится на 1
Property.Description_CHI: 医疗提升的速度。增大的话提升得越慢。
