Property.Description_GER: Dies legt fest, wieviele "Sub-Punkte" ein Charakter benötigt, um seine handwerkliche Fähigkeit um einen Punkt zu steigern.
Property.Description_RUS: Определяет, как много подпунктов должен получить персонаж, прежде чем его механика повысится на 1
Property.Description_CHI: 机械提升的速度。增大的话提升得越慢。

Property.name: EXPLOSIVES_SUBPOINTS_TO_IMPROVE
Property.Description_ENG: Determines how many total "sub-points" a character must acquire before his Explosives goes up one point. Double the value, and progression will become twice as slow. Halve the value, you'll gain points twice as fast.
Property.Description_GER: Dies legt fest, wieviele "Sub-Punkte" ein Charakter benötigt, um seine Explosionsfähigkeit um einen Punkt zu steigern.
Property.Description_RUS: Определяет, как много подпунктов должен получить персонаж, прежде чем его взрывные работы повысится на 1
Property.Description_CHI: 爆破提升的速度。增大的话提升得越慢。

Property.name: LEADERSHIP_SUBPOINTS_TO_IMPROVE
Property.Description_ENG: Determines how many total "sub-points" a character must acquire before his Leadership goes up one point. Double the value, and progression will become twice as slow. Halve the value, you'll gain points twice as fast.
Property.Description_GER: Dies legt fest, wieviele "Sub-Punkte" ein Charakter benötigt, um seine Führungsfähigkeit um einen Punkt zu steigern.
Property.Description_RUS: Определяет, как много подпунктов должен получить персонаж, прежде чем его лидерство повысится на 1
Property.Description_CHI: 领导提升的速度。增大的话提升得越慢。

Property.name: LEVEL_SUBPOINTS_TO_IMPROVE
Property.Description_ENG: Determines how many total "sub-points" a character must acquire (in any skill/attribute), before his Experience Level goes up one point. This value only determines the number of sub-points required to go from Experience Level 1 to Level 2. As Experience Level increases, the number of sub-points you must accumulate is multiplied. EXAMPLE: If X is the value you set here, then: To go from EXPLevel 1 to EXPLevel 2, you need X sub-points. To go from EXPLevel 2 to EXPLevel 3, you need X*2 sub-points. To go from EXPLevel 3 to EXPLevel 4, you need X*3 sub-points. And so on. Please note that an ExpLevel value of more than 6500 will be counted as 6500!!
Property.Description_RUS: Определяет, как много подпунктов должен получить персонаж (в любых умениях/параметрах) , прежде чем его уровень повысится на 1. Устанавливаемое число - множитель. Для каждого следующего уровня количество подпунктов увеличивается в арифметической прогресии.
Property.Description_CHI: 等级提升的速度。增大的话提升得越慢。 例如：X 为你设定的值 等级1 升 等级2，你需要 X sub-points. 等级2 升 等级3，你需要 X*2 sub-points. 等级3 升 等级4，你需要 X*3 sub-points. ... Please note that an ExpLevel value of more than 6500 will be counted as 6500!!

Property.name: SLOW_PROGRESS_FOR_ENEMY_ITEMS_CHOICE
Property.Description_ENG: If set to TRUE, this will remove the "equipment level" bonus given to Redshirts and Blackshirts, making them less likely to carry advanced weapons. It also reduces the importance of distance from Sector P3 on choosing equipment for enemies. In general, this makes all enemies carry weapons that are more or less suitable for your current "Game Progress". This can be switched in the middle of your campagin, but will break weapon balance in such case. It is better to change this before starting a new game.
Property.Description_CHI: If set to TRUE, this will remove the "equipment level" bonus given to Redshirts and Blackshirts, making them less likely to carry advanced weapons. It also reduces the importance of distance from Sector P3 on choosing equipment for enemies. In general, this makes all enemies carry weapons that are more or less suitable for your current "Game Progress". This can be switched in the middle of your campagin, but will break weapon balance in such case. It is better to change this before starting a new game.

Property.name: ALLOW_REAL_TIME_SNEAK
Property.Description_ENG: Real-Time Mode: Allows the player to stay in real time while unnoticed by the enemy. While observing enemies in real time, the player may enter turn-based at will. Ctrl-x: While observing enemies in real time, enter turn-based mode. Does not work if no enemies are seen, inactive if RT sneaking is disabled. Shift-Ctrl-x: Toggle the real-time sneaking mode on/off. Enters turn-based if the player can see an enemy. Toggling it back on in turn-based, while stil unseen by the enemy does NOT revert to real-time, turn-based will continue until the player no longer sees any enemies.
Property.Description_GER: Real-Time Mode: Allows the player to stay in real time while unnoticed by the enemy. While observing enemies in real time, the player may enter turn-based at will. Ctrl-x: While observing enemies in real time, enter turn-based mode. Does not work if no enemies are seen, inactive if RT sneaking is disabled. Shift-Ctrl-x: Toggle the real-time sneaking mode on/off. Enters turn-based if the player can see an enemy. Toggling it back on in turn-based, while stil unseen by the enemy does NOT revert to real-time, turn-based will continue until the player no longer sees any enemies.
Property.Description_RUS: Real-Time Mode: Позволяет оставаться в реал-тайме до тех пор, пока противник не заметил вас. Когда игрок видит врага он может войти в пошаговый режим. Ctrl-x: Переход в пошаговый режим, если есть видимые противники. Не работает, если нет видимых врагов, неактивен, если RT sneaking отключен. Shift-Ctrl-x: Переключает real-time sneaking mode. Переводит в пошаговый режим, если игрок может видеть врагов. Переключение назад в пошаговом режиме НЕ возвращает игркоа в реал-тайм, пока в поле зрения находится хоть один враг, даже если он вас не видит.
Property.Description_CHI: 实时模式：玩家未被敌人发现时保持实时模式。 当在实时模式下侦查敌人时，玩家可以自己切换到回合制模式。 Ctrl+x：当在实时模式下侦查敌人时，切换到回合制模式。Does not work if no enemies are seen, inactive if RT sneaking is disabled. Shift-Ctrl-x：实时模式切换开关。Enters turn-based if the player can see an enemy. Toggling it back on in turn-based, while stil unseen by the enemy does NOT revert to real-time, turn-based will continue until the player no longer sees any enemies.

Property.name: QUIET_REAL_TIME_SNEAK
Property.Description_ENG: Disables certain potentially-annoying messages while in Real-Time Sneaking mode.
Property.Description_CHI: 在即时潜行模式下不在屏幕上显示特定的消息。

Property.name: NO_AUTO_FOCUS_CHANGE_IN_REALTIME_SNEAK
Property.Description_ENG: Turn this on to avoid the game automatically switching your selected soldier when enemies are spotted.
Property.Description_CHI: 打开此设置项时，佣兵在看到敌人时屏幕不会自动切换到看到敌人的那个佣兵，而是停留在当前画面。 关掉此设置项时，佣兵在看到敌人时屏幕会自动切换到看到敌人的那个佣兵。

Property.name: REINFORCEMENTS_ARRIVE_WITH_ZERO_AP
Property.Description_ENG: This feature controls reinforcements that appear on the map edge during tactical combat. If set to TRUE, those reinforcements will arrive with 0 APs, meaning that they can't act on their first turn (but CAN be shot at!). This makes reinforcements less murderous. You can set this so that it affects enemies, militia, or both. 0 = Disabled (JA2 default). 1 = All reinforcements (militia and enemy) arrive with 0 APs. 2 = Only Enemy reinforcements arrive with 0 APs. 3 = Only Militia reinforcements arrive with 0 APs.
Property.Description_CHI: 支援部队进入战区时行动点数为 0？ 0 = 支援部队进入战场的那个回合立刻就能行动 2 = 敌人的支援部队进入战场的那个回合不能行动，下个回合才能行动 3 = 民兵的支援部队进入战场的那个回合不能行动，下个回合才能行动 1 = 敌人和民兵的支援部队进入战场的那个回合都不能行动，下个回合才能行动

Property.name: MILITIA_CAN_PLACE_FLAGS_ON_MINES
Property.Description_ENG: When activated, militia will place blue flags on landmines whenever they spot them, so that no one else will accidentally step on that mine.
Property.Description_CHI: 民兵可以在探测到地雷时插旗吗？

Property.name: ENABLE_CHANCE_OF_ENEMY_AMBUSHES_ON_INSANE_DIFFICULT
Property.Description_ENG: Enable a chance of ambushes by enemy forces in non-city sectors, on INSANE difficulty & game progress > 25% & enemy outnumbers the player. This behaves the same as Bloodcat Ambushes: The mercs are placed in the center of the map, with enemies (bloodcats) closing in from all sides.
Property.Description_CHI: Enable a chance of ambushes by enemy forces in non-city sectors, on INSANE difficulty & game progress > 25% & enemy outnumbers the player. This behaves the same as Bloodcat Ambushes: The mercs are placed in the center of the map, with enemies (bloodcats) closing in from all sides.

Property.name: CAN_TRUE_CIVILIANS_BECOME_HOSTILE
Property.Description_ENG:
If FALSE, civilians who cannot hold a weapon will never trigger Combat Mode when attacked, even if other civilians are killed. Use this to prevent situations where you have to kill all civilians if you unintentionally hurt one civilian.
Note that as far as the game is concerned, a character walking into a cloud of gas you created will be considered "attacked".
Property.Description_CHI:
If FALSE, civilians who cannot hold a weapon will never trigger Combat Mode when attacked, even if they are killed. Use this to prevent situations where hurting a civilian forces you to kill all of them!
Note that as far as the game is concerned, a character walking into a cloud of gas you created will be considered "attacked".

Property.name: CAN_MILITIA_BECOME_HOSTILE
Property.Description_ENG: This determines the conditions in which Militia become hostile to you. 0 = Militie never become hostile, even if you kill them. 1 = Militia become hostile if one is killed. 2 = Militia become hostile if attacked (JA2 default).
Property.Description_CHI: 民兵在什么情况下会成为敌对？ 0 = 民兵永远不会成为敌对，无论你对他们做什么 1 = 只有当你杀死一个民兵时，他们才会跟你成为敌对 2 = 只要你对一个民兵动武——不管他有没有死——民兵就会跟你成为敌对

Property.name: MERCS_OFFENSE_IN_AUTORESOLVE_BATTLES_BONUS
Property.Description_ENG: Mercs offensive strength during autoresolve. With this setting you can make mercs more effective in autoresolve combats. By increasing offense, the mercs will more likely deal a hit and make larger damage to enemy soldiers. This setting partially simulates the fact, that mercs controlled by the player would be much more capable of surviving and killing.
Property.Description_CHI: 佣兵在自动战斗中能比以往发挥更大作用？ 调高第一项的话，佣兵在自动战斗中的攻击力比以往更为突出。佣兵更容易击中敌人、更容易造成更大的伤害。 调高第二项的话，佣兵在自动战斗中的防御力比以往更为突出。佣兵更不容易被击中、如果被击中也只会造成比以往更小的伤害。

Property.name: MERCS_DEFFENSE_IN_AUTORESOLVE_BATTLES_BONUS
Property.Description_ENG: Mercs defensive strength during autoresolve. With this setting you can make mercs more effective in autoresolve combats. By increasing the defense, the mercs will not likely be hit and if so, then they suffer lesser damage. This setting partially simulates the fact, that mercs controlled by the player would be much more capable of surviving and killing.
Property.Description_CHI: 佣兵在自动战斗中能比以往发挥更大作用？ 调高第一项的话，佣兵在自动战斗中的攻击力比以往更为突出。佣兵更容易击中敌人、更容易造成更大的伤害。 调高第二项的话，佣兵在自动战斗中的防御力比以往更为突出。佣兵更不容易被击中、如果被击中也只会造成比以往更小的伤害。

Property.name: ENABLE_CHANCE_OF_ENEMY_AMBUSHES
Property.Description_ENG:
Enemy Ambushes This setting allows a chance an enemy group ambushes player's squad. The chance is based on many factors: * Game difficulty. * Whether you know if the enemy is there or not. * How big the enemy group is (very large groups will not likely ambush you, smaller groups can ambush you more likely). * Number of your mercs (meaning how easily the enemy can detect you soon enough to prepare for you. More mercs mean higher chance). * Highest level amongst the mercs in your squad. * Some other small circumstances. * Finally the calculated chance is percentually multiplied by ENEMY_AMBUSHES_CHANCE_MODIFIER
If you play with new traits, the "Scouting" trait in your squad can prevent these ambushes. If you like to play vanilla JA2 style, set this to FALSE.
Property.Description_CHI: 敌人可能会在战略模式下伏击你？

Property.name: ENEMY_AMBUSHES_CHANCE_MODIFIER
Property.Description_ENG: With this setting, you can make the chance for enemy ambushes bigger (by positive value) or smaller (by negative) (Setting this to -50 means the precalculated chance will be reduced to half. Values from -100 to 100 are allowed.)
Property.Description_CHI: 敌人伏击你的几率调整（在正常几率基础上增加或减少）。

Property.name: SPECIAL_NPCS_STRONGER
Property.Description_ENG: This option can bring a little role-play to the game, so if you encounter those special characters, you actually "feel" they are special. The setting can be from 0 to 200. (100 is recommended for good effect.)
Property.Description_CHI: 特殊NPC增强幅度 特殊NPC包括：女王、Mike、Joe、赏金猎人Carmen、General、恐怖分子、混混头子Kingpin和他主要的几个保镖 提高的效果（假设这一项设置的值为n） 额外的行动点数：n/4的额外行动点数 命中率加成：新命中率=原命中率*n/100 伤害抵抗加成：提高（n/2）% 减少精力损耗：n% 杀死他们时能得到更多经验值 数值：0 - 200.（推荐100比较好）

Section.name: Tactical Vision Settings
Section.Description_ENG: In this section you can adjust sight-range and other sight-related settings.
Section.Description_CHI: 这个部分你能够调节视野范围和其它视野相关的设置。

Property.name: BASE_SIGHT_RANGE
Property.Description_ENG: Base sight range for every person in the game. This value is automatically multiplied by 2!
Property.Description_GER: Der Basissichtradius für jeden Charakter im Spiel. Dieser Wert wird in Tiles berechnet, ein Tile sind 2 Felder im Spiel.
Property.Description_RUS: Базовая дальность видения для всех в игре
Property.Description_CHI: 基础视野距离。（这个值自动乘于 2）

Property.name: ALLOW_TUNNEL_VISION
Property.Description_ENG: Enable/disable tunnel vision: characters (friend and foe) cannot see behind, and have limited vision to the sides. Some scopes and headgear may make vision even narrower. If set to FALSE, will use JA2 behavior (equal sight distance in all directions, no modifiers from scopes/headgear).
Property.Description_CHI: 开启隧道视野？

Section.name: Tactical Tooltip Settings
Section.Description_ENG: In this section you can adjust game-difficulty in TACTICAL mode.
Section.Description_CHI: 这个部分你能够调节战术模式下的游戏难度

Property.name: SOLDIER_TOOLTIP_DETAIL_LEVEL
Property.Description_ENG:
To use this option, tooltips must be enabled in the game options screen. This value indicates the minimum amount of information that soldier tooltips will display.
1 = Limited: Are the enemies wearing any armor (but not where), general type of weapon (but no mention of attachments), do they have a gas mask or NVG. 2 = Basic: Do the enemies wear a helmet, or a vest, or pants, general type of weapon and visible weapon attachments, do they have a gas mask or NVG. 3 = Full: Includes exact types of armor, model of weapon and all attachments, and type of NVG. 4 = Debug: Same information than Full, but also includes APs, Health, and other info for modders.
Property.Description_GER:
Um diese Funktion zu nutzen, muss Tooltips anzeigen in den Spieloptinen aktiviert werden. Dieser Wert spiegelt die Mindestmenge an Informationen wieder, die durch Feindtooltips angezeigt werden.
1 = Begrenzt: Ob der Feind Körperschutz trägt (aber nicht wo), genereller Waffentypus (ohne Anbauten zu erwähnen), trägt der Feind eine Gasmaske oder ein Nachtsichtgerät. 2 = Normal: Trägt der Feind Körperschutz und welchen (Helm/Rüstung/Leggins), genereller Waffentypus und sichtbare Anbauten, trägt der Feind eine Gasmaske oder ein Nachtsichtgerät. 3 = Komplett: Beinhaltet exakten Typ des Körperschutzes, Modell der Waffe, sowie alle Anbauten und den Typ des Nachtsichtgeräts. 4 = Debug: Es sind dieselben Informationen wie im Komplettmodus verfügbar, hinzu kommen APs, Lebensenergie und weitere Informationen für Modder.
Property.Description_RUS:
To use this option, tooltips must be enabled in the game options screen. Это значение указывает, какой объем информации можно увидеть в подсказке.
1 = Ограниченный: Что одето на противнике, общий тип оружия в руках, наличие противогаза/очков. 2 = Базовый: Показывает наличие шлема/броника/поножей, оружие с видимыми атачами, наличие противогаза/прибора ночного видения. 3 = Полный: Показывает всю броню, полную информацию об оружии со всеми атачами, наличие и тип прибора ночного видения. 4 = Debug: Полная информация , включающая АР и здоровье. Для моддеров.
Property.Description_CHI: 当对着敌人按下alt时显示的敌人装备的详细程度 1 = 是否穿着防弹装备（但不会显示是头盔还是防弹衣还是裤子），武器的种类（不包括附件），有没有戴防毒面具或夜视仪 2 = 是否穿着头盔、防弹衣、裤子，武器的种类、附件，有没有戴防毒面具或夜视仪 3 = 显示头盔、防弹衣、裤子具体型号，武器的具体型号和全部附件，夜视仪的型号 4 = 在3的基础上再提供敌人的剩余行动点数、生命、技能等信息

Property.name: DYNAMIC_SOLDIER_TOOLTIPS
Property.Description_ENG:
To use this option, tooltips must be enabled in the game options screen. Should the tooltips only be available, if the enemy is in line of sight of the current selected merc?
If you have not choosen Full or Debug tooltip level (SOLDIER_TOOLTIP_DETAIL_LEVEL), tooltips will only be displayed on the enemy, if you are not more than 13 tiles away and the enemy is in line of sight of the current selected merc.
Property.Description_GER:
Um diese Funktion zu nutzen, muss Tooltips anzeigen in den Spieloptinen aktiviert werden. Sollen die Tooltips nur dann verfügbar sein, wenn der Gegner sich in direkter Sichtline des gewählten Söldners befindet?
Falls Sie nicht den Modus Komplett oder Debug im SOLDIER_TOOLTIP_DETAIL_LEVEL gewählt haben, werden Tooltips nur dann angezeigt, wenn der Feind in direkter Sichtline des gewählten Söldners und nicht weiter als BASE_SIGHT_RANGE vom ihm entfernt steht.
Property.Description_RUS:
To use this option, tooltips must be enabled in the game options screen. Делает подсказку доступной, только если противник находится в поле зрения выбранного мерка
Если вы не выбрали Полный или Debug уровень подсказки (SOLDIER_TOOLTIP_DETAIL_LEVEL), подсказка будет видна только для противников, только если они не далее 13 тайтлов и находятся в поле зрения выбранного мерка.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果SOLDIER_TOOLTIP_DETAIL_LEVEL你选择的是1或2，并且如果你关掉这个设置项，那么只有当你和敌人的距离不超过13格并且敌人在你当前佣兵的视野内时，你才能看到他的装备信息。

Property.name: ALLOW_DYNAMIC_TOOLTIP_RANGE
Property.Description_ENG: If set to TRUE, the range at which tooltips are allowed is dynamic.

Property.name: DYNAMIC_TOOLTIP_RANGE_MODIFIER
Property.Description_ENG: If ALLOW_DYNAMIC_TOOLTIP_RANGE is set to TRUE, this value determines the distance (compared to sight-range) at which tooltips are allowed. 100 = Tooltips are allowed at normal sight-range. 50 = (Default) Tooltips are allowed at half sight-range. etc.
Property.Description_CHI: 射程修正信息显示在士兵的装备信息里？

Property.name: ALLOW_DYNAMIC_TOOLTIP_DETAIL_LEVEL
Property.Description_ENG: If set to TRUE, the amount of information shown by the tooltips increases gradually as you get closer to your target.
Property.Description_CHI: 等级信息显示在士兵的装备信息里？

Section.name: Tactical Gameplay Settings
Section.Description_ENG: The settings in this section alter the rules of the TACTICAL game, equally for enemies and mercs. They have the potential to radically change the WAY THE GAME IS PLAYED, rather than simply changing the actual difficulty.
Section.Description_CHI: 这里的设置改变游戏战术规则（包括敌兵和佣兵）。 他们有可能从根本上改变了该游戏的玩法，而不是简单地改变实际困难。

Property.name: ALLOW_WALKING_WITH_WEAPON_RAISED
Property.Description_ENG: Allow walking and sidesteps with raised weapons?

Property.name: INITIAL_MERC_ARRIVAL_LOCATION
Property.Description_ENG: Set the grid number location where new hired merc arrive in the destination sector after you hired them. The JA2 default grid number is 4870.
Property.Description_CHI: Set the grid number location where new hired merc arrive in the destination sector after you hired them. The JA2 default grid number is 4870.

Property.name: MAXIMUM_POSSIBLE_CTH
Property.Description_ENG: Set the maximum possible "Chance to Hit" with any shot.
Property.Description_RUS: Устанавливает максимальный возможный "шанс на попадание"
Property.Description_CHI: 命中率最高为百分之多少？（再nb的人，还是会有1%的可能射失。）

Property.name: MINIMUM_POSSIBLE_CTH
Property.Description_ENG: Set the minimum possible "Chance to Hit" with any shot.
Property.Description_RUS: Устанавливает минимальный возможный "шанс на попадание"
Property.Description_CHI: 命中率最低为百分之多少？ （注意：此项设为0时，理论上最低命中率为0%。但事实上，即使你打出一发理论上命中率为0的子弹，你依然有百分之零点几的可能能击中目标——你可以把它归结为RP问题。这个百分之零点几到底为多大呢？参考下一项。）

Property.name: MINIMUM_CTH_DIVISOR
Property.Description_ENG: Use this to set the minimum CTH of any shot to a value between 0 and 1. "MINIMUM_POSSIBLE_CTH" must be set to 0 for this to work. The minimum CTH is: 1 in every (x*100) bullets, where X is the value you set here.
Property.Description_CHI: 最低命中率公约数。（"MINIMUM_POSSIBLE_CTH" 必须设为 0 才有效） 这一项设为10时，表示你有1/(10*100)的可能打中一发理论上命中率为0的子弹。 默认为100，表示你有1/(100*100)的可能打中一发理论上命中率为0的子弹。

Property.name: REALISTIC_TRACERS
Property.Description_ENG: Set the behaviour of the new Tracer Bullet system. 0 = JA2 1.13 Default. Tracer magazines reduce the gun's auto/burst penalty. Every bullet in a Tracer magazine causes a lightpath. 1 = Realistic Tracers. Only specific bullets in the magazine will show a lightpath, and they will "bump" the Chance-to-Hit up for all subsequent bullets in the same attack. Loading the tracer magazine into the gun does NOT reduce its burst/auto penalty. 2 = Semi-Realistic Tracers. Same as option #1, but the tracer magazine also reduces the gun's auto/burst penalty.
Property.Description_RUS: Устанавливает поведение новой системы трассеров. 0 = ja2 1.13. По умолчанию - трассеры уменьшают штраф за стрельбу очередями. 1 = Реалистичные трассеры. Только отдельные патроны в магазине являются трассерами, они увеличивают шанс на попадание в последующих атаках, но не уменьшают штраф на стрельбу очередями. 2 = Полу-реалистичные трассеры. И то и другое.
Property.Description_CHI: 曳光弹模式： 0 = 关闭曳光弹模式。 1 = 真实模式。弹夹中混杂着曳光弹。碰到曳光弹那一发命中率为提升一段。 2 = 相当于每一发都是曳光弹。命中率提升，并且减少武器的连射惩罚。

Property.name: NUM_BULLETS_PER_TRACER
Property.Description_ENG: Determine the ratio between tracer bullets and normal bullets, in a Tracer Magazine. The ratio is 1 tracer to every X normals, where X is the value you set here. Requires REALISTIC_TRACERS to be set to 1 or 2.
Property.Description_RUS: Определяет частоту трассеров в магазине.
Property.Description_CHI: 正常子弹和曳光弹的比例 0 表示无曳光弹 1 表示每发子弹都是曳光弹 2 表示每两发当中有一发为曳光弹

Property.name: CTH_BUMP_PER_TRACER
Property.Description_ENG: Set the "Chance-to-Hit" bonus that a tracer bullet bestows on ALL other bullets that follow it, in a single autofire volley.
Property.Description_RUS: Устанавливает бонус к шансу на попадание для ВСЕХ последующих пуль в отдельной очереди.
Property.Description_CHI: 发射曳光弹时命中率提升多少？

Property.name: MIN_RANGE_FOR_TRACER
Property.Description_ENG: Controls the minimum range at which tracers will improve our CTH. Listed in Tiles.
Property.Description_CHI: Controls the minimum range at which tracers will improve our CTH. Listed in Tiles.

Property.name: RANGE_EFFECT_ON_MAX_TRACER_CTH_BONUS
Property.Description_ENG: Determine the effect of range to target on calculating how high your CTH can go above its original value when using tracer ammo. Increase this value to make tracers less useful at long range. Decrease to make tracers more useful at long range. 0 = Tracers can increase CTH indefinitely. The more you fire, the more accurate you are. 3 = HAM Default. At a range of about 30 tiles, tracers can only increase your CTH back to its original value. See also REALISTIC_TRACERS.
Property.Description_CHI: 距离对曳光弹的影响。数值越大，在相同距离上你通过曳光弹得到的命中率提升最大值就越小。 打个比方本来在30格距离上我通过曳光弹最大能得到100%的命中率提升，调大这个数值后同样距离上我可能最大只能得到70%的命中率提升。

Property.name: INCREASE_AIMING_COSTS
Property.Description_ENG: If set to TRUE, adding Extra Aiming to a single shot costs more APs than normal. The extra cost is based on the type of scope (if any) you are using, and the number of "aiming levels" you want to add. If set to FALSE, the game defaults to 4AP normal, 6AP with a Battle Scope (7x), and 8AP with a Sniper Scope (10x). Both can be completely toggled off using the in-game Options Menu. In that case, all aiming levels cost 4AP.
Property.Description_CHI: 设为TRUE，精瞄时比平常耗费更多的AP。这个基于你所用的瞄准镜类型和你所增加的“瞄准等级”数。 设为FALSE，游戏默设为一般 4AP，7倍镜为 6AP，10倍镜为 8AP。 这两项可以在游戏选项设置里完全关闭。在这种情况下，所有瞄准等级耗费 4AP。

Property.name: ALLOW_EXTRA_AIM_LEVELS
Property.Description_ENG: Basic setting to allow more than 4 aiming clicks for any gun
Property.Description_CHI: 允许每把枪都精瞄4次以上？

Property.name: FIRST_AIM_READY_COST_DIVISOR
Property.Description_ENG: When INCREASE_AIMING_COSTS = TRUE, this setting determines what fraction of your gun's "Ready Time" must be paid whenever you want to take an aimed shot. This setting is a divisor, so the amount of APs you must pay equals READY TIME / X, where X is the value you set here. 0 = No extra aiming charge based on ready time. 1 = Pay the full ready time for every aimed shot. 2 = Pay half the ready time for every aimed shot. And so on. Please note: results are rounded down. The actual costs for each level are defined in APBPConstants.INI.
Property.Description_CHI: 当 INCREASE_AIMING_COSTS = TRUE，第一次精瞄耗费4+举枪AP的一部分。 0 表示不加举枪AP 1 表示每次射击都加举枪AP 2 表示举枪AP除以2 以此类推。注意：结果四舍五入。 游戏从APBPConstants.ini读取每次精瞄耗费的行动点数。

Property.name: AUTOFIRE_TOHIT_BONUS_MULTIPLIER
Property.Description_ENG: Converts the AutoFireToHitBonus of an item into a percentage reduction which is applied against a weapon's AutoPenalty value. Setting this value to 0 will result in the AFTHB modifiers being applied directly to a weapon's AutoPenalty value (Vanilla style). This multiple is applied to the AFTHB modifier, so we get a reasonable percentage value by which to alter AutoPenalty. As an example, if a weapon has AutoPenalty 7 and an attachment has AutoFireToHitBonus of 5, setting this value to 3 will result in the weapons AutoPenalty being reduced by 15% per round fired. If you set this value to 0, you use the Vanilla system which results in a flat -2CTH against only the first rounds penalty.
Property.Description_CHI: Converts the AutoFireToHitBonus of an item into a percentage reduction which is applied against a weapon's AutoPenalty value. Setting this value to 0 will result in the AFTHB modifiers being applied directly to a weapon's AutoPenalty value (Vanilla style). This multiple is applied to the AFTHB modifier, so we get a reasonable percentage value by which to alter AutoPenalty. As an example, if a weapon has AutoPenalty 7 and an attachment has AutoFireToHitBonus of 5, setting this value to 3 will result in the weapons AutoPenalty being reduced by 15% per round fired. If you set this value to 0, you use the Vanilla system which results in a flat -2CTH against only the first rounds penalty.

Property.name: DYNAMIC_AIMING_LIMITS
Property.Description_ENG: When set to TRUE, the number of "extra aiming levels" possible is determined by the weapon type, scope type, and whether or not a bipod is being used. In general, pistols allow no more than 2 extra aiming levels. Only scoped sniper rifles with a bipod in prone stance allow 8 aiming levels! Note: You must have set ALLOW_EXTRA_AIM_LEVELS to TRUE for this to be used.
Property.Description_CHI: 动态限制精瞄次数？ 设为TRUE时，不同类型的枪有不同的基础精瞄次数，然后根据有没有加瞄准镜、有没有加支架又能得到额外的精瞄机会。 手枪在不加瞄准镜的情况下只能精瞄一次，是最少的。加了超大威力瞄准镜和支架的狙击枪能精瞄8次，最多。自动步枪不加瞄准镜和支架能精瞄两次。 设为FALSE时，每把枪都至少能精瞄4次。加瞄准镜能精瞄更多。 注意：使用此项必须把“ALLOW_EXTRA_AIM_LEVELS”设为TRUE。

Property.name: AIM_LEVELS_DEPEND_ON_DISTANCE
Property.Description_ENG: If set to "TRUE", the AIM Levels you can spend depends on the distance. If set to "FALSE", the AIM Levels you can spend does not depend on the distance (old behavior).
Property.Description_CHI: If set to "TRUE", the AIM Levels you can spend depends on the distance. If set to "FALSE", the AIM Levels you can spend does not depend on the distance (old behavior).

Property.name: AIM_LEVELS_COMPATIBILITY_OPTION
Property.Description_ENG: If set to 0, the number of aim levels will be calculated based on aimbonus attributes (default). If set to any other value, the calculation will use minrangeforaimbonus properties instead (compatibility option). In this case the following formula determines the total scope bonus that will be compared to scope thresholds: minrangeaimbonus (gun + attachments) * AIM_LEVELS_COMPATIBILITY_OPTION / BASE_SIGHT_RANGE Reasonable values include 10 and BASE_SIGHT_RANGE (13).
Property.Description_CHI: If set to 0, the number of aim levels will be calculated based on aimbonus attributes (default). If set to any other value, the calculation will use minrangeforaimbonus properties instead (compatibility option). In this case the following formula determines the total scope bonus that will be compared to scope thresholds: minrangeaimbonus (gun + attachments) * AIM_LEVELS_COMPATIBILITY_OPTION / BASE_SIGHT_RANGE Reasonable values include 10 and BASE_SIGHT_RANGE (13).

Property.name: VERY_HIGH_POWER_SCOPE_AIM_THRESHOLD
Property.Description_ENG:
From what aiming bonus a scope is considered very high power (Sniper Scope 10x).
This value determines to what group a scope belongs to. Scopes are separated in groups by the aimbonus they give per click.
With DYNAMIC_AIMING_LIMITS on TRUE, "Very High Power" scopes will get a maximum of 8 aimclicks. "Very High Power" scopes will get a maximum of 8 aimclicks. The final amount of aimclicks also depend on the gun type and wether or not you're using a bipod. High power scopes and upward will suffer from a To-Hit penalty when trying to aim while in prone position. You don't need to change this unless you change the aiming bonus that scopes give.
Property.Description_CHI:
From what aiming bonus a scope is considered very high power (Sniper Scope 10x).
This value determines to what group a scope belongs to. Scopes are separated in groups by the aimbonus they give per click.
当 DYNAMIC_AIMING_LIMITS 设为 TRUE, 超大威力瞄准镜能够提供最多8次精瞄。（当然还要考虑到武器种类和有无支架） High power scopes and upward will suffer from a To-Hit penalty when trying to aim while in prone position. You don't need to change this unless you change the aiming bonus that scopes give.

Property.name: HIGH_POWER_SCOPE_AIM_THRESHOLD
Property.Description_ENG:
From what aiming bonus a scope is considered high power (Battle Scope 7x).
This value determines to what group a scope belongs to. Scopes are separated in groups by the aimbonus they give per click.
With DYNAMIC_AIMING_LIMITS on TRUE, "Very High Power" scopes will get a maximum of 8 aimclicks. "High Power" scopes get a maxium of 7 aimclicks. The final amount of aimclicks also depend on the gun type and wether or not you're using a bipod. High power scopes and upward will suffer from a To-Hit penalty when trying to aim while in prone position. You don't need to change this unless you change the aiming bonus that scopes give.
Property.Description_CHI:
From what aiming bonus a scope is considered high power (Battle Scope 7x).
This value determines to what group a scope belongs to. Scopes are separated in groups by the aimbonus they give per click.
当 DYNAMIC_AIMING_LIMITS 设为 TRUE, 超大威力瞄准镜(Sniper Scope 10x)能够提供最多8次精瞄。 大威力瞄准镜(Battle Scope 7x)能够提供最多7次精瞄（当然还要考虑到武器种类和有无支架） High power scopes and upward will suffer from a To-Hit penalty when trying to aim while in prone position. You don't need to change this unless you change the aiming bonus that scopes give.

Property.name: MEDIUM_POWER_SCOPE_AIM_THRESHOLD
Property.Description_ENG:
From what aiming bonus a scope is considered medium power (ACOG 10x).
This value determines to what group a scope belongs to. Scopes are separated in groups by the aimbonus they give per click.
With DYNAMIC_AIMING_LIMITS on TRUE, "Very High Power" scopes will get a maximum of 8 aimclicks. "Medium Power" scopes get a maxium of 6 aimclicks. The final amount of aimclicks also depend on the gun type and wether or not you're using a bipod. You don't need to change this unless you change the aiming bonus that scopes give.
Property.Description_CHI:
From what aiming bonus a scope is considered medium power (ACOG 10x).
This value determines to what group a scope belongs to. Scopes are separated in groups by the aimbonus they give per click.
当 DYNAMIC_AIMING_LIMITS 设为 TRUE, 超大威力瞄准镜(Sniper Scope 10x)能够提供最多8次精瞄。 中威力瞄准镜(ACOG 10x)能够提供最多6次精瞄（当然还要考虑到武器种类和有无支架） You don't need to change this unless you change the aiming bonus that scopes give.

Property.name: AI_SNIPER_RESTRICT_TO_ELITE
Property.Description_ENG: If set to TRUE, the system will use the remaining criteria strictly for Elite soldiers. This will allow Elite soldiers to have more options to become snipers while all other soldiers will be restricted to using a sniper rifle.
Property.Description_CHI: If set to TRUE, the system will use the remaining criteria strictly for Elite soldiers. This will allow Elite soldiers to have more options to become snipers while all other soldiers will be restricted to using a sniper rifle.

Property.name: AI_SNIPER_MIN_RANGE
Property.Description_ENG: This is the minium weapon range for a weapon to be valid as a "sniper weapon".
Property.Description_CHI: This is the minium weapon range for a weapon to be valid as a "sniper weapon".

Property.name: AI_SNIPER_CHANCE
Property.Description_ENG: This is the percent chance that a soldier without a sniper rifle will be assigned the Sniper role assuming other criteria are met.
Property.Description_CHI: This is the percent chance that a soldier without a sniper rifle will be assigned the Sniper role assuming other criteria are met.

Property.name: AI_SNIPER_CHANCE_WITH_SR
Property.Description_ENG: This is the percent chance that a soldier with a sniper rifle will be assigned the Sniper role assuming other criteria are met.
Property.Description_CHI: This is the percent chance that a soldier with a sniper rifle will be assigned the Sniper role assuming other criteria are met.

Property.name: CTH_PENALTY_FOR_TARGET_MOVEMENT
Property.Description_ENG: How much Change to hit (CTH) is lost when firing at a target, for each tile the target has moved so far?
Property.Description_CHI: 对着跑动中的目标射击时，命中率会降低。降低多少取决于目标在本回合跑了多少格。目标每跑一格命中率降低2.5%

Property.name: MAX_CTH_PENALTY_FOR_MOVING_TARGET
Property.Description_ENG: How much Change to hit (CTH) can be lost in total due to the movement of your target?
Property.Description_CHI: 射击跑动中的目标时命中率最多降低多少？

Property.name: CHANCE_BLINDED_BY_HEADSHOT
Property.Description_ENG: This feature adds a certain chance that a critical headshot will also render the target blind for several turns. The chance is a percentage (of 100). Please note that the number of blindness turns is based on the damage done by the shot, at a rate of 1 turn of blindness per 10 damage points. 0 = Disabled. 50 = About half of all critical headshots will cause blindness. 100 = Every critical headshot causes blindness.
Property.Description_CHI: 被打中头部时多大可能会失明？ 0 = 关闭. 50 = 一半几率导致失明. 100 = 每一发都导致失明.

Property.name: CRITICAL_LEGSHOT_CAUSES_AP_LOSS
Property.Description_ENG: When activated, any character who is hit in the legs and knocked down will lose an additional number of APs, based on how much damage was done by the attack. Use the APBPConstants.INI value called "AP_LOSS_PER_LEGSHOT_DAMAGE" to determine how many APs are lost per 1 damage point. Please note that leg damage is usually very low (4-8 points is common) even when it does cause knock-downs.
Property.Description_CHI: 打开此项的话，打中腿部时严重的话会减少目标的行动点数。减少多少行动点数取决于造成的伤害。

Property.name: CAN_JUMP_THROUGH_WINDOWS
Property.Description_ENG: When activated, your mercs can jump through open windows by pressing 'j'.
Property.Description_CHI: 打开此项，佣兵能按“j”键翻窗户（窗户必须是打开的）。

Property.name: CAN_CLIMB_ON_WALLS
Property.Description_ENG: When activated, your mercs can climb on walls (that have 2 floors like buildings) by pressing 'j'.
Property.Description_CHI: 打开此项，佣兵能爬到墙上或篱笆上（在距离墙或篱笆2格时按“j”键）

Property.name: INDIVIDUAL_HIDDEN_PERSON_NAMES
Property.Description_ENG: When activated, you can set which person names should be hidden in Tactical in the file 'TableData\HiddenNames.xml'.
Property.Description_CHI: 现在你跟NPC对话之前，NPC的名字是显示为问号的。对话之后NPC头上才会显示他的名字。 打开此项的话，你可以在TableData\HiddenNames.xml中单独设置每个NPC头上在对话之前显示什么。

Property.name: INDIVIDUAL_ENEMY_NAMES
Property.Description_ENG: Turn this on, and the game uses individual enemy names (in tactical) defined in 'TableData\EnemyNames.xml'. If you set this to TRUE, then you have to set INDIVIDUAL_ENEMY_RANK = FALSE.
Property.Description_CHI: 打开此项，敌人头上会显示名称。你可以在 TableData\EnemyNames.xml 里设置某个地区的敌人头上显示什么名称。 如果你设置为TRUE，下一项的 INDIVIDUAL_ENEMY_RANK 必须设置为 FALSE

Property.name: INDIVIDUAL_ENEMY_RANK
Property.Description_ENG: Turn this on, and the game uses individual enemy names (in tactical) defined in 'TableData\EnemyRank.xml'. If you set this to TRUE, then you have to set INDIVIDUAL_ENEMY_NAMES = FALSE.
Property.Description_CHI: 打开此项，敌人头上会显示军衔。TableData\EnemyRank.xml里规定好了敌人等级和军衔的关系。 如果你设置为TRUE，上一项的 INDIVIDUAL_ENEMY_NAMES 必须设置为 FALSE

Property.name: INDIVIDUAL_CIVILIAN_NAMES
Property.Description_ENG: Turn this on, and the game uses individual civilian group names (in tactical) defined in 'TableData\CivGroupNames.xml'.
Property.Description_CHI: 打开此项的话，你可以在TableData\CivGroupNames.xml中设置平民头上显示的名称。

Property.name: CAMO_REMOVING
Property.Description_ENG: If this is set to TRUE, you can repaint one type of camouflage by using different type camo kit on self. You can also use rags to completely erase the camo. This is important for Camouflaged/Ranger traits.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果此项设置为TRUE，那你可以用一种迷彩油覆盖掉另一种不同的迷彩油（例如丛林迷彩油覆盖掉沙漠迷彩油）。 你也可以用破布来完全擦除身上的迷彩油。 这对有游侠技能的人很重要。

Property.name: ENHANCED_CLOSE_COMBAT_SYSTEM
Property.Description_ENG:
Enhanced Close Combat System
This option generally improves many things around the game's close combat system, like:
* HtH hit to head deal more damage but has lesser chance to hit. * HtH hit to legs do half damage but has much better chance to hit. * HtH damage on lying enemies increased. * HtH damage on surprising attacks(from behind, when enemy didn't seen or heard the merc) is increased. * Aimed HtH attack cost less APs. If you have MA or HtH trait, this is converted into "focused punch" - martial artists perform their spinning kick then. * Attributes used for HtH attacks or stealing slightly tweaked. * Experience recieved for certain actions in close combat tweaked to be more logiacal (gain agility for dodging etc..) * Stealing all items is now possible only when the enemy is knocked down. The APs you need to steal items are now based on number of items you want to take. The standard APs for pickup item are charged for every item you selected to take. If you select more items to take from the enemy than you have APs for, the rest will remain with the enemy and a message occures that you haven't taken all you wanted. * Several minor tweaks included.
Property.Description_CHI:
开启STOMP的肉搏系统？
STOMP的肉搏系统包括很多新特色，比如：
* 攻击头部时的命中率更低，但造成的伤害更大 * 攻击腿部时的命中率更高，但只造成一半的伤害 * 对躺倒在地的敌人造成更大的伤害 * 当你从背后攻击一个没有发现你的敌人时能造成更大的伤害 * 精瞄的近战攻击比之前耗费较少的行动点数。如果你有武术或肉搏技能，精瞄后的攻击为“会心一击”，拥有武术技能的人还会踢出回旋踢。 * Attributes used for HtH attacks or stealing slightly tweaked. * Experience recieved for certain actions in close combat tweaked to be more logiacal (gain agility for dodging etc..) * Stealing all items is now possible only when the enemy is knocked down. The APs you need to steal items are now based on number of items you want to take. The standard APs for pickup item are charged for every item you selected to take. If you select more items to take from the enemy than you have APs for, the rest will remain with the enemy and a message occures that you haven't taken all you wanted. * Several minor tweaks included.

Property.name: AWARD_SPECIAL_EXP_POINTS_FOR_COMPLETING_QUESTS
Property.Description_ENG:
When you complete any quest in game, every (conscious) merc in the sector will be awarded by a certain amount of experience points. This amount is counted as 'quest difficulty' * 'the value set here'. Setting this to zero will disable this feature. 100 is fine. You can go up to 5000, though you should know what you are doing.
( List of rewarded quests: Enrico's Letter, Food from Drassen, Kill Terrorits, Holy Chalice for Kingpin, Holy Chalice for Yanni, Kingpins Money, Find Joey, Rescue Maria, Imprisoned in Alma, Iinterrogated (in sector by Meduna), Hicks, Find Madlab, Robot, Bloodcat Lair, Find Gabby, Crepitus Queen, Chopper Pilot, Escort Skyrider, Free Dynamo, Escort Tourists, Free Children, Leather Shop Dream, Recruit Miguel, Impress Kingpin (win 3 box fights), Kill Deidranna!!! )
Property.Description_CHI:
当你完成游戏中的任务时，该地区中所有清醒的佣兵都会得到一定的经验值作为奖励。经验值等于任务难度乘以此项数值。 此项设为0的话相当于没有经验值。100是推荐的数值，最高可以设到5000。
（提供经验值的任务包括：Enrico的信，从Drassan要粮食，杀死恐怖分子，帮Kingpin抢圣杯，帮Yanni夺回圣杯，偷Kingpin藏起来的钱， 找到Joey，营救Maria，被囚禁在Alma（越狱？），在Meduna被审讯（这也算任务？），霰弹帮，找实验室，组装机器人，清理血猫巢穴， 找到Gabby，从异形女王身上取得生物胶，寻找直升机驾驶员，护送Skyrider，解救Dynamo，护送美国游客，解救 Drassan的孩子们， 实现那个谁的皮衣店梦，招募Miguel，打赢三场拳击赛给Kingpin留下印象，杀死女王。）

Property.name: SOLDIERS_ALWAYS_WEAR_ANY_ARMOR
Property.Description_ENG: Determines if soldiers (militia, enemies) should always have a helmet, vest and leggings. True = enabled, they always have all three items. False = disabled, classic behaviour.
Property.Description_CHI: 民兵和敌人是否一定会穿着头盔、防弹衣和防弹裤？ 打开此项的话，民兵和敌人一定会穿齐三样防弹装备。 关闭此项的话，像以往一样，有的民兵和敌人可能不穿防弹装备或只穿其中的一两件。

Property.name: IMPROVED_INTERRUPT_SYSTEM
Property.Description_ENG: Should the new improved interrupt system (IIS) be used?

Property.name: BASIC_PERCENTAGE_APS_REGISTERED
Property.Description_ENG: Basic percent amount of enemy used APs our merc percieves and is counted towards his reaction time (make it higher to get ; interrupts more frequent) INFO: IMPROVED_INTERRUPT_SYSTEM must be enabled.

Property.name: PERCENTAGE_APS_REGISTERED_PER_EXP_LEVEL
Property.Description_ENG: Percent added to basic percentage per soldier's experience level (BASIC_PERCENTAGE_APS_REGISTERED + PERCENTAGE_APS_REGISTERED_PER_EXP_LEVEL gives you the percent amount of APs registered, which is further adjusted by range to target). INFO: IMPROVED_INTERRUPT_SYSTEM must be enabled.

Property.name: BASIC_REACTION_TIME_LENGTH
Property.Description_ENG: A value controlling how often an interrupt can be triggered, lower = more interrupts (this is an amount of registered APs after which an interrupt occurs, this value is further adjusted by stats, injuries and such though). INFO: IMPROVED_INTERRUPT_SYSTEM must be enabled.

Property.name: ALLOW_COLLECTIVE_INTERRUPTS
Property.Description_ENG: Allow collective interrupts? I.e. a merc can "give" interrupt to nearby teammate if he gets an interrupt, depends on stats exp level and such. INFO: IMPROVED_INTERRUPT_SYSTEM must be enabled.

Property.name: ALLOW_INSTANT_INTERRUPTS_ON_SPOTTING
Property.Description_ENG: Should we still allow the instant interrupts on sight as in vanilla, even in IIS? (I wouldn't recommend). INFO: IMPROVED_INTERRUPT_SYSTEM must be enabled.

Section.name: Tactical Cover System Settings
Section.Description_ENG: These settings change the behavior of the new Cover Display System.
Section.Description_CHI: 战术隐蔽系统设置。

Property.name: COVER_SYSTEM_STEALTH_TRAIT_VALUE
Property.Description_ENG: For every level of the stealth trait, X points (to your standard stealth value + equipment) gets added.
Property.Description_CHI: 字面翻译：除了你佣兵自身的潜行值和装备提供的潜行值外，每一级潜行技能能提供多少点潜行值。默认是一级提供15点。至于佣兵自身的潜行值应该跟属性、等级有关吧（猜测） 简而言之：调高这个，潜行技能会更有效。

Property.name: COVER_SYSTEM_STEALTH_EFFECTIVENESS
Property.Description_ENG: This tell how much a stealth value of 100 will decrese the sight range of an enemy (in percentage). 50% means that at 100 stealth level you have reduced the enemies sight range by 50%.
Property.Description_CHI: 字面翻译：佣兵的“潜行值”达到100时，能减少敌人多少的视野？ 50表示一个“潜行值”为100的佣兵能将敌人的视野减少到50%。（具体效果在游戏中按end键可以查看敌人的视野） 简而言之：调高这个，潜行技能、夜行服等能提供潜行增幅效果的东西就更有效。

Property.name: COVER_SYSTEM_CAMOUFLAGE_EFFECTIVENESS
Property.Description_ENG: This is similar to the STEALTH_EFFECTIVENESS, 100% wood camoflague will reduce the enemies vision if you are on wooden terrain.
Property.Description_CHI: 字面翻译：与上一项类似。迷彩值为100%的佣兵在相应环境中能减少敌人多少的视野？简而言之：调高这个，迷彩服和迷彩油就更有效。

Property.name: COVER_SYSTEM_STANCE_EFFECTIVENESS
Property.Description_ENG: How much the stance influences the view range reduction. Prone will give you 10% (default) view reduction / cover.
Property.Description_CHI: 卧倒时减少10%你的视野。

Property.name: COVER_SYSTEM_LBE_EFFECTIVENESS
Property.Description_ENG: Dual welding the longest sniper rifles with full attachements, having a third backup sniper rifle, one combat pack and one backpack will give a 50% (default) sight penalty with the default settings.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果你背着战斗背包以及大背包、拿着两把装满附件的狙击枪、包里还放着第三把狙击枪时，你的视野会减少50%

Property.name: COVER_SYSTEM_MOVEMENT_EFFECTIVENESS
Property.Description_ENG: Running around crazy will give you a penalty of up to 50% (default).
Property.Description_CHI: 是指你跑来跑去的话会得到50%的惩罚。ini里写得比较笼统，但是根据我个人的经验，你跑来跑去的话，敌人会更容易看见你。 具体效果你可以打开敌人的视野，然后在他视野外面点的地方跑来跑去，你会发现本来是黄色或橙色的地方渐渐都变成红色了。 意思是本来你在这些地方蹲着或趴着的话敌人不会看见你，但你这么一跑，在这些地方敌人就能看见你了。

Property.name: COVER_SYSTEM_TREE_EFFECTIVENESS
Property.Description_ENG: The cover system automaticly calculates how dense an object it. This will tell you how much percent of vision should be decreased if the object is 100% dense, and the object is between you and the enemy of course, and is something like a tree or a rock (walls will always block full). If you put it to a realistic setting, where solid stuff always blocks enemy views, view ranges are too bad and on certain maps it gets hard to find people, so default is only a 50% vision decrease.
Property.Description_CHI: 这个参数举个例子可能比较好理解，一堵墙是100%的效果，也就是说这边的人完全看不到那边的人。那么默认的30就可以理解为一棵树相当于一堵30%透明度的墙在那里。

Property.name: COVER_SYSTEM_UPDATE_DELAY
Property.Description_ENG: If you let the display cover refresh via the 'END' key toggle, this is the refresh interval (in ms) used to redisplay the cover. The cover calculation is relativly hard on the cpu, so default are only two refreshes a second.
Property.Description_CHI: 表示cover display多久刷新一次，默认一秒钟刷新两次，这个就不要动它了。

Section.name: Tactical Suppression Fire Settings
Section.Description_ENG: These settings activate and control the HAM Suppression Fire system. With this system activated, bullets can cause a target to lose APs even if they don't hit. Depending on your settings, they can also cause the target to become useless in a firefight, but also harder to hit! The idea, in battle, is to suck out an enemy's APs so that he/she can't move at all during their next turn! This can also happen to your mercs, which necessitates using completely different tactics than in "vanilla" 1.13.
Section.Description_CHI: 战术火力压制设置

Property.name: SUPPRESSION_EFFECTIVENESS
Property.Description_ENG: Sets the overall power of suppression-fire. Basically determines how much AP loss is caused by suppression fire, which affects everything else as well. This is a percentage value. 0 = Suppression is completely disabled. 100 = Full effectiveness.
Property.Description_RUS: Устанавливает эффективность подавления в процентах. 0 = Подавление полностью отключено. 100 = Полностью эффективно.
Property.Description_CHI: 火力压制的总体效果。 0表示关闭火力压制系统。 100表示火力压制系统完全激活。

Property.name: SUPPRESSION_TOLERANCE_MAX
Property.Description_ENG: Maximum Suppression Tolerance value a character can have. Suppression Tolerance helps resist the effects of suppression. A high value here may allow some characters to become very resistant to suppression! NOTE: You'll cause problems if you set SUPPRESSION_TOLERANCE_MIN to a value greater then SUPPRESSION_TOLERANCE_MAX.
Property.Description_CHI: 佣兵对火力压制的最大抗性。 注意：如果你设置 SUPPRESSION_TOLERANCE_MIN 的值大于 SUPPRESSION_TOLERANCE_MAX 的值将产生问题！

Property.name: SUPPRESSION_TOLERANCE_MIN
Property.Description_ENG: Minimum Suppression Tolerance value a character can have. A low value here may allow some low-level characters to get "pinned down" by just a few bullets flying their way. NOTE: You'll cause problems if you set SUPPRESSION_TOLERANCE_MIN to a value greater then SUPPRESSION_TOLERANCE_MAX.
Property.Description_CHI: 佣兵对火力压制的最小抗性。 注意：如果你设置 SUPPRESSION_TOLERANCE_MIN 的值大于 SUPPRESSION_TOLERANCE_MAX 的值将产生问题！

Property.name: NEARBY_FRIENDLIES_AFFECT_TOLERANCE
Property.Description_ENG: When set to TRUE, a character's Suppression Tolerance will affected by the condition and leadership skill of nearby friendly combatants. High-leadership and/or high-level friendlies that are close enough will increase a character's tolerance, while nearby dead friendlies will reduce tolerance.
Property.Description_CHI: 对火力压制的抗性会受身边别的佣兵的领导、等级、技能的影响？

Property.name: TILES_MOVED_PER_BONUS_TOLERANCE_POINT
Property.Description_ENG: Determines how many tiles a character must move per +1 tolerance bonus. 0 = No tolerance bonus from movement.
Property.Description_CHI: 回合中佣兵每移动多少格会增加1点对火力压制的抗性？（大概觉得跑起来了不太容易被打中吧）

Property.name: SUPPRESSION_SHOCK_INTENSITY
Property.Description_ENG: This controls how much Suppression Shock is taken when under fire. 100 is the "normal" effect. Range is 0 (no suppression shock) to 65535 (65535% effect). 200 is a LOT.
Property.Description_CHI: 被火力压制得较猛时人物可能会处于Shock（恐慌）状态。这一项决定火力压制和Shock之间的关系。 100表示火力压制造成正常的100%的Shock效果。 增大这一项的话火力压制更容易让目标陷入Shock（恐慌）状态。 200表示很多了。

Property.name: MAX_SUPPRESSION_SHOCK
Property.Description_ENG: This is the absolute maximum number of shock points a character may have. (Shock negatively affects accuracy, but makes the character harder to hit) SUPPRESSION_SHOCK_EFFECTIVENESS must be set above 0 for this to have any effect.
Property.Description_CHI: 有一个Shock值用来衡量人物所处的Shock（恐慌）状态。被火力压制时目标最大能获得几点Shock值？

Property.name: CTH_PENALTY_PER_TARGET_SHOCK
Property.Description_ENG: When a character is shooting at a SHOCKED target, he/she loses CTH proportionally to how shocked the target is. The formula is: CTH LOST = Target Shock Points * X, where X is the value of this setting.
Property.Description_CHI: 目标处于Shock状态时，对你来说反倒难以打中。Shock值越高，越难以打中。每一点Shock值减少多少命中率？ 公式为：CTH LOST = Target Shock Points * X, where X is the value of this setting.

Property.name: MAX_CTH_PENALTY_FOR_TARGET_SHOCK
Property.Description_ENG: The maximum possible CTH you can lose when shooting at a Shocked target. See also CTH_PENALTY_PER_TARGET_SHOCK. 0 = No limit!.
Property.Description_CHI: 接上一项。命中率最多能下降多少？30表示最多能下降30%，0表示无限大。

Property.name: CTH_PENALTY_DIVISOR_FOR_PRONE_SHOCKED_TARGET
Property.Description_ENG: When shooting at a Prone, Shocked target, this value divides the shooter's CTH penalty. 1 = Full penalty! 2 = Half penalty. And so on.
Property.Description_CHI: hen shooting at a Prone, Shocked target, this value divides the shooter's CTH penalty. 1 = Full penalty! 2 = Half penalty. And so on.

Property.name: CTH_PENALTY_DIVISOR_FOR_CROUCHED_SHOCKED_TARGET_HEAD
Property.Description_ENG: When shooting at the HEAD of a Crouched, Shocked target, this value divides the shooter's CTH penalty. 1 = Full penalty! 2 = Half penalty. And so on.
Property.Description_CHI: When shooting at the HEAD of a Crouched, Shocked target, this value divides the shooter's CTH penalty. 1 = Full penalty! 2 = Half penalty. And so on.

Property.name: CTH_PENALTY_DIVISOR_FOR_CROUCHED_SHOCKED_TARGET_TORSO
Property.Description_ENG: When shooting at the TORSO of a Crouched, Shocked target, this value divides the shooter's CTH penalty. 1 = Full penalty! 2 = Half penalty. And so on.
Property.Description_CHI: When shooting at the TORSO of a Crouched, Shocked target, this value divides the shooter's CTH penalty. 1 = Full penalty! 2 = Half penalty. And so on.

Property.name: CTH_PENALTY_FOR_COWERING_CROUCHED_TARGET_LEGS_DIVISOR
Property.Description_ENG: When shooting at the LEGS of a Crouched, Shocked target, this value divides the shooter's CTH penalty. 1 = Full penalty! 2 = Half penalty. And so on.
Property.Description_CHI: When shooting at the LEGS of a Crouched, Shocked target, this value divides the shooter's CTH penalty. 1 = Full penalty! 2 = Half penalty. And so on.

Property.name: MIN_RANGE_FOR_FULL_COWERING_TARGET_PENALTY
Property.Description_ENG: The range (in METERS) at which a shooter receives the full penalty for firing at a Shocked target. As you get closer than this, the penalty gradually diminishes.
Property.Description_RUS: Расстояние в метрах, на котором стрелок получает полное пенальти при стрельбе по укрывшейся цели.
Property.Description_CHI: 命中率的下降还跟你和目标之间的距离有关。在100米（也就是游戏中的10格）以外，你受的影响如上所述。100米以内你受的影响开始变小，命中率开始回升。

Property.name: MAX_CTH_PENALTY_FROM_SHOCK
Property.Description_ENG: A Shocked character loses some accuracy on any ranged attack (proportional to his current Shock level). This is the absolute maximum CTH you can lose from this effect.
Property.Description_CHI: 处于Shock状态的人物虽然难以被击中，但他自己也难以打中别人。每一点Shock值都会让他的命中率下降5%（不管他距离目标多近）。此项决定处于Shock状态的人物的命中率最多会下降多少。

Property.name: SHOCK_REDUCES_SIGHTRANGE
Property.Description_ENG: When activated, this feature causes "Shocked" characters to lose some or all of their sight, based on exactly how much suppression shock they've accumulated. You can set them to lose sightrange, gain tunnel vision, or both. At full shock, the character will be next to blind until those shock points dissipate. 0 = Disabled. 2 = Shocked characters lose sight-range. 3 = Shocked characters get tunnel-vision. 1 = Shocked characters lose sightrange AND get tunnel-vision.
Property.Description_CHI: 处于Shock状态的人物的视野会受到影响。 0 = 不受影响 2 = 视野变近 3 = 视野变窄（出现隧道视野） 1 = 2和3同时生效

Property.name: COWERING_PENALTY_TO_SUPPRESSION_TOLERANCE
Property.Description_ENG: When characters reach a certain level of Suppression Shock, they are considered "Cowering". When this happens, they become even less resistant to suppression fire! This value determines how many Tolerance points are lost when a character is Cowering. 0 = Disable this effect.
Property.Description_CHI: 值为4时表示当人物处于Cowering状态（即完全Shock状态）时，人物对火力压制的抗性会减少4。火力压制对他的效果会更大。也就是说一旦被压制住，就很难翻身了。 NOTE: This is not a recommended setting unless you've activated HAM's Suppression Fire system.

Property.name: AI_SUPPRESS_MIN_MAG_SIZE
Property.Description_ENG: This tells the AI the minimum mag size of the weapon before suppression will be considered. Setting the magazine size to 0 will mean the AI will try to use suppression on every weapon which is the result you used to get when setting the AI Suppression flag to FALSE.
Property.Description_CHI: This tells the AI the minimum mag size of the weapon before suppression will be considered. Setting the magazine size to 0 will mean the AI will try to use suppression on every weapon which is the result you used to get when setting the AI Suppression flag to FALSE.

Property.name: AI_SUPPRESS_MIN_AMMO_REMAINING
Property.Description_ENG: This tells the AI minimum remaining ammo the weapon must have to be valid for suppression.
Property.Description_CHI: This tells the AI minimum remaining ammo the weapon must have to be valid for suppression.

Property.name: INCREASE_AI_WILLINGNESS_TO_SUPPRESS
Property.Description_ENG: Set this to TRUE to make AI characters more likely to use autofire, both within eyesight and from far away. Also decreases the chance of enemies running away from battle. NOTE: This is not a recommended setting unless you've activated HAM's Suppression Fire system.
Property.Description_RUS: При включении AI чаще использует автоматический огонь, в том числе издалека и не в прямой видимости. Также увеличивается шанс сбегания противника из боя. Не рекомендуется включать, если вы используете HAM's Suppression Fire system
Property.Description_CHI: 敌人会更多得采取火力压制？ NOTE: This is not a recommended setting unless you've activated HAM's Suppression Fire system.

Property.name: EXPLOSIVE_SUPPRESSION_EFFECTIVENESS
Property.Description_ENG: When this is set above 0, all blast-type explosives (Grenades, bombs, flashbangs, anything that has a blast effect) will cause suppression. This value controls how effective that suppression is, by percentage. 0 = JA2 Default. No suppression from explosives. 100 = Full Explosive Suppression. Note that suppression acts a little BEYOND the blast-radius!
Property.Description_CHI: 用爆炸物来进行火力压制的总体效果。 0 = JA2 默认. 爆炸物没有压制效果. 100 = Full Explosive Suppression. Note that suppression acts a little BEYOND the blast-radius!

Property.name: NOTIFY_WHEN_PINNED_DOWN
Property.Description_ENG: Suppression fire can suck out a character's APs so badly, that they start losing APs off their NEXT TURN. When this setting is TRUE, a message will appear whenever a character lost his entire AP supply for the next turn (usually this happens at -80 AP). Such a character will be unable to move or perform any action during his next turn, making it safer to approach and kill that character. The message displayed is "X is Pinned Down!" where X is the name of the character.
Property.Description_CHI: 当敌人的行动点数被压制到-80（也就是下回合无法行动）时，屏幕上要显示提醒信息吗？

Property.name: MIN_DISTANCE_FRIENDLY_SUPPRESSION
Property.Description_ENG: Determines the maximum distance (in METERS!) at which characters are immune to suppression effects from friendly fire. Beyond this distance, they will suffer suppression normally from shots fired by their own teammates. 30 = JA2 Default.
Property.Description_CHI: 决定佣兵在多少距离上可能被友军火力压制。30表示30米，也就是3格。 30 = JA2 默认值.

Section.name: Tactical Weather Settings
Section.Description_ENG: These settings change the appearance and gameplay effects of various weather conditions, like Rain and Lightning storms.
Section.Description_CHI: 天气设置

Property.name: ALLOW_RAIN
Property.Description_ENG: If this is set to TRUE, it enables the chance of rainfall and lightning storms. If set to FALSE, rain and lightning storms will never appear in the game.
Property.Description_CHI: 游戏中有下雨天吗？ 请注意，降雨强度是由程序随机决定。

Property.name: RAIN_CHANCE_PER_DAY
Property.Description_ENG: The chance per day (0 - 100%) for rain to occur. When a rain storm starts, it will rain in every sector on the map. Note that the intensity of rain is randomally decided by the program.
Property.Description_CHI: 下雨的几率

Property.name: RAIN_MIN_LENGTH_IN_MINUTES
Property.Description_ENG: The minimum length of a rain storm, in minutes.
Property.Description_GER: Dieser Wert bestimmt die minimale Dauer eines Wolkenbruchs (in Spielminuten).
Property.Description_RUS: Минимальная длительность дождя в минутах
Property.Description_CHI: 如果下雨，最短下多久？单位：分钟

Property.name: RAIN_MAX_LENGTH_IN_MINUTES
Property.Description_ENG: The maximum length of a rain storm, in minutes.
Property.Description_GER: Dieser Wert bestimmt die maximale Dauer eines Wolkenbruchs (in Spielminuten).
Property.Description_RUS: Максимальная длительность дождя в минутах
Property.Description_CHI: 如果下雨，最长下多久？单位：分钟

Property.name: MAX_RAIN_DROPS
Property.Description_ENG: The maximum number of rain drops. For slow CPUs decrase this value.
Property.Description_GER: Die maximale Zahl an Regentropfen. Verringern Sie diesen Wert auf langsamen Rechnern.
Property.Description_RUS: Максимальное количество капель. Для слабых процессоров рекомендуется снизить.
Property.Description_CHI: 雨滴的最大数量。

Property.name: WEAPON_RELIABILITY_REDUCTION_PER_RAIN_INTENSITY
Property.Description_ENG: While fighting in the rain, this is a percentage-based reduction of any GUN-type weapon's reliability value. If set to more than 0, GUN-type weapons will deteriorate more rapidly, and are more prone to jamming. Note that if ALLOW_LIGHTNING=TRUE, a lightning storm gives twice this penalty (Rain Intensity = 2).
Property.Description_CHI: 影响下雨天武器状态下降的速度以及故障率。越高越糟。

Property.name: BREATH_GAIN_REDUCTION_PER_RAIN_INTENSITY
Property.Description_ENG: While fighting in the rain, this is a percentage-based reduction to the speed of regaining one's breath points (stamina). If set to more than 0, characters will have trouble getting their breath points back quickly. Note that if ALLOW_LIGHTNING=TRUE, a lightning storm gives twice this penalty (Rain Intensity = 2).
Property.Description_CHI: 下雨天精力回复速度要慢上百分之多少？

Property.name: VISUAL_DISTANCE_DECREASE_PER_RAIN_INTENSITY
Property.Description_ENG: While fighting in the rain, this is a percentage-based reduction of every character's vision distance. If set to more than 0, characters fighting in rain will not see as far away as they normally do. It applies both during the day and the night! Note that if ALLOW_LIGHTNING=TRUE, a lightning storm gives twice this penalty (Rain Intensity = 2). 0 = No decrase of the visual distance. 100 = Characters are practically blind when it's raining!
Property.Description_CHI: 雨天减少百分之多少的视野？

Property.name: ALLOW_LIGHTNING
Property.Description_ENG: If set to TRUE, this allows a certain chance of lightning storms (Rain Intensity = 2). ALLOW_RAIN must be set to TRUE for this to work!
Property.Description_CHI: 允许闪电？ ALLOW_RAIN 必须设置为 TRUE 这个设置才有效！

Property.name: MIN_INTERVAL_BETWEEN_LIGHTNINGS_IN_REAL_TIME_SECONDS
Property.Description_ENG: This value sets the minimum interval between lightning strikes in real time seconds.
Property.Description_GER: Dieser Wert bestimmt das minimale Intervall zwischen Blitzen (in realen Sekunden).
Property.Description_RUS: Минимальный интервал между молниями в секундах реалтайма.
Property.Description_CHI: 两次闪电之间的最小间隔。单位：现实中的秒

Property.name: MAX_INTERVAL_BETWEEN_LIGHTNINGS_IN_REAL_TIME_SECONDS
Property.Description_ENG: This value sets the maximum interval between lightning strikes in real time seconds.
Property.Description_GER: Dieser Wert bestimmt das maximale Intervall zwischen Blitzen (in realen Sekunden).
Property.Description_RUS: Максимальный интервал между молниями в секундах реалтайма.
Property.Description_CHI: 两次闪电之间的最大间隔。单位：现实中的秒

Property.name: MIN_INTERVAL_BETWEEN_LIGHTNING_AND_THUNDERCLAPS_IN_SECONDS
Property.Description_ENG: This value sets the minimum interval between lightnings and thunderclaps in real time seconds.
Property.Description_GER: Dieser Wert bestimmt das minimale Intervall zwischen Blitzen und Donnergrollen (in realen Sekunden).
Property.Description_RUS: Минимальный интервал между молниями и громом в секундах реалтайма.
Property.Description_CHI: 闪电和雷声之间的最小间隔。对游戏其实完全没影响，只是为了符合闪电比雷声先到的自然规律。

Property.name: MAX_INTERVAL_BETWEEN_LIGHTNING_AND_THUNDERCLAPS_IN_SECONDS
Property.Description_ENG: This value sets the maximum interval between lightnings and thunderclaps in real time seconds.
Property.Description_GER: Dieser Wert bestimmt das maximale Intervall zwischen Blitzen und Donnergrollen (in realen Sekunden).
Property.Description_RUS: Минимальный интервал между молниями и громом в секундах реалтайма.
Property.Description_CHI: 闪电和雷声之间的最大间隔。对游戏其实完全没影响，只是为了符合闪电比雷声先到的自然规律。

Property.name: DELAY_IN_SECONDS_IF_SEEN_SOMEONE_DURING_LIGHTNING_IN_TURNBASED
Property.Description_ENG: When an enemy is spotted due to lightning in Turn-Based mode, this value determines the length of the pause (in seconds) that the game gives you to get an idea where that enemy is.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果在闪电中看到了敌人，敌人会显示个几秒钟让你看清楚位置。5表示显示5秒钟

Property.name: CHANCE_TO_DO_LIGHTNING_BETWEEN_TURNS
Property.Description_ENG: This value sets the chance that ligntning occurs between turns in percentage. 0 = Lightning does not occur in turn-based mode. 100 = Lightning occurs after every turn.
Property.Description_CHI: 在回合模式下，闪电只会在结束一个回合时发生。这一项决定回合结束后闪电的几率。

Section.name: Strategic Gamestart Settings
Section.Description_ENG: These settings control the situation at the very beginning of the game. You can set some important parameters here.
Section.Description_CHI: 游戏开局设置

Property.name: GAME_STARTING_TIME
Property.Description_ENG: This is the time when the game starts. This will always be on Day 1 + GAME_STARTING_TIME. The value is measured in seconds (3600 = 1 hour). For example, if you set GAME_STARTING_TIME to 3600, the game will start on Day 1, 01:00.
Property.Description_GER: Dies ist die Startzeit des Spiels. Sie wird immer Tag 1 + GAME_STARTING_TIME sein. Der Wert wird in Sekunden berechnet (3600 = 1 Stunde). Wenn Sie zum Beispiel GAME_STARTING_TIME auf 3600 setzen, wird das Spiel am Tag 1 um 01:00 Uhr beginnen.
Property.Description_RUS: Определяет время начала игры. Игра начинается в 1 День + GAME_STARTING_TIME(измеряется в секундах - 3600 = 1час) Например при GAME_STARTING_TIME = 3600 игра начнется в День1, 01:00 .
Property.Description_CHI: 游戏开始时的时间。通常是 Day 1 + GAME_STARTING_TIME 这个值单位为秒（1小时 = 3600 秒） 例如，你设置 GAME_STARTING_TIME 为 3600，那么游戏开始时间是 Day 1, 01:00

Property.name: FIRST_ARRIVAL_DELAY
Property.Description_ENG: This is the delay between the game start and the first merc arrival. This value is measured in seconds (3600 = 1 hour). For example, if you set GAME_STARTING_TIME to 3600 and FIRST_ARRIVAL_DELAY to 21600 you merc will arrive on Day 1, 07:00.
Property.Description_GER: Das ist die Verzögerung zwischen dem Spielstart und der Ankunft des ersten Söldners (bzw. der ersten Söldner) im Startsektor. Der Wert wird in Sekunden berechnet (3600 = 1 Stunde). Wenn Sie zum Beispiel GAME_STARTING_TIME auf 3600 setzen und FIRST_ARRIVAL_DELAY auf 21600, wird Ihr Anfangstrupp am Tag 1 um 07:00 Uhr ankommen.
Property.Description_RUS: Определяет задержку между стартом игры и прибытием наемников. Измеряется в секундах - (3600 = 1 час.) Например при GAME_STARTING_TIME = 3600 и FIRST_ARRIVAL_DELAY = 21600 наемники прибудут в День1, 07:00 .
Property.Description_CHI: 第一队佣兵到达时间。 这个值单位为秒（1小时 = 3600 秒） 例如，你设置 GAME_STARTING_TIME 为 3600，FIRST_ARRIVAL_DELAY 为 21600（6小时），那么第一队到达时间是 Day 1, 07:00

Property.name: DEFAULT_ARRIVAL_SECTOR_X
Property.Description_ENG: Determines the X location of your first arrival in Arulco. Use caution when changing this! Note that you may want to change the file SAMSites.XML, to enable "free airspace" over your intended landing zone. If the landing zone is not in free airspace at the start of the game, it will be automatically moved to a safe sector immediately after your first landing. You will not be able to land there again until you free the airspace above that sector. See also DEFAULT_ARRIVAL_SECTOR_Y.
Property.Description_CHI: 第一队佣兵到达地区的横向坐标值 Note that you may want to change the file SAMSites.XML, to enable "free airspace" over your intended landing zone. If the landing zone is not in free airspace at the start of the game, it will be automatically moved to a safe sector immediately after your first landing. You will not be able to land there again until you free the airspace above that sector. See also DEFAULT_ARRIVAL_SECTOR_Y.

Property.name: DEFAULT_ARRIVAL_SECTOR_Y
Property.Description_ENG: Determines the Y location of your first arrival in Arulco. Use caution when changing this! Note that you may want to change the file SAMSites.XML, to enable "free airspace" over your intended landing zone. If the landing zone is not in free airspace at the start of the game, it will be automatically moved to a safe sector immediately after your first landing. You will not be able to land there again until you free the airspace above that sector. See also DEFAULT_ARRIVAL_SECTOR_X.
Property.Description_CHI: 第一队佣兵到达地区的纵向坐标值 Note that you may want to change the file SAMSites.XML, to enable "free airspace" over your intended landing zone. If the landing zone is not in free airspace at the start of the game, it will be automatically moved to a safe sector immediately after your first landing. You will not be able to land there again until you free the airspace above that sector. See also DEFAULT_ARRIVAL_SECTOR_X.

Section.name: Strategic Interface Settings
Section.Description_ENG: With these settings you can change the user interface in the STRATEGIC screen. These settings have little to no effect on actual gameplay - they are mostly visual aids and optimized interface settings.
Section.Description_CHI: 战略界面设置

Property.name: ALLOW_DESCRIPTION_BOX_FOR_ITEMS_IN_SECTOR_INVENTORY
Property.Description_ENG: If set to TRUE, this allows right-clicking items in the sector inventory window to get an item's Description Box. Stack Pop-ups are also allowed. For this to work properly, you may need to actually load the sector into memory (by going down to TACTICAL mode and then back up to STRATEGIC mode).
Property.Description_CHI: 在战略界面下查看一个地区的物品时可以右键查看物品的属性？ 如果无法查看，试试看切到战术界面，然后再切回战略界面。

Property.name: STAT_PROGRESS_BARS_RED
Property.Description_ENG: Set the color of the "stat progress boxes" which are displayed behind your merc's attributes in the character info panel. This is done with three settings (RED/GREEN/BLUE). You can turn Stat Progress Bars on and off using the in-game Options Menu.
Property.Description_CHI: 设置人物升级状态条的RGB颜色的R值（你可以在游戏选项中打开人物升级状态条，这样你就可以看到人物的属性还要过多久才能升级。）

Property.name: STAT_PROGRESS_BARS_GREEN
Property.Description_ENG: Set the color of the "stat progress boxes" which are displayed behind your merc's attributes in the character info panel. This is done with three settings (RED/GREEN/BLUE). You can turn Stat Progress Bars on and off using the in-game Options Menu.
Property.Description_CHI: 设置人物升级状态条的RGB颜色的G值（你可以在游戏选项中打开人物升级状态条，这样你就可以看到人物的属性还要过多久才能升级。）

Property.name: STAT_PROGRESS_BARS_BLUE
Property.Description_ENG: Set the color of the "stat progress boxes" which are displayed behind your merc's attributes in the character info panel. This is done with three settings (RED/GREEN/BLUE). You can turn Stat Progress Bars on and off using the in-game Options Menu.
Property.Description_CHI: 设置人物升级状态条的RGB颜色的B值（你可以在游戏选项中打开人物升级状态条，这样你就可以看到人物的属性还要过多久才能升级。）

Property.name: INCLUDE_CONTRACTS_IN_PROJECTED_EXPENSES_WINDOW
Property.Description_ENG: Are merc salaries included in the new Prjected Daily Expenses window? 0 = Merc contracts are not included in your projected daily expenses. 1 = The salaries of mercs with a fixed daily salary (Hamous, Conrad, Iggy, M.E.R.C mercs, etc.) is included in the Projected Daily Expenses display. 2 = Include all salaries. A.I.M merc salaries are calculated based on their most recent contract.
Property.Description_CHI: 战略界面下日常支出栏目中应该包含哪些信息？ 0 = 不要包含佣兵的合同信息 1 = 只包含需要按日付款的佣兵的信息（从M.E.R.C招募的佣兵和在Arulco招募的Iggy、Conrad之类的佣兵） 2 = 包含所有佣兵的合同信息。（尽管A.I.M的佣兵是预付款的，但是还是会算出一个他的每日平均花费计入到日常支出栏中。）

Property.name: DISABLE_STRATEGIC_TRANSITION
Property.Description_ENG: If disabled, the transition from the strategy screen will be skipped before entering tactical screen.

Section.name: Strategic Progress Settings
Section.Description_ENG: In this section you can change how Game Progress is calculated, and various events and gameplay effects that are directly linked to progress.
Section.Description_CHI: 战略进度设置

Property.name: GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_KILLS
Property.Description_ENG:
This setting controls the maximum number of Progress Points you can get by killing enemies. Press 'V' in the game to see your current progress value. The ratio between kills and progress points is determined by other settings (NUM_KILLS_PER_PROGRESS_POINT, for each difficulty level). Be sure, that the sum of GAME_PROGRESS_KILLS, GAME_PROGRESS_CONTROL, GAME_PROGRESS_INCOME, GAME_PROGRESS_VISITED has to be exactly 100, otherwise the game will set them to defaut values.
Default Values: GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_KILLS = 25 GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_CONTROL = 25 GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_INCOME = 50 GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_EXPLORED_SECTORS = 0
Property.Description_CHI:
杀敌数，影响游戏进度的有四个因素（杀敌数、控制城镇/导弹基地数、矿井收入、区域探索度）之一 GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_KILLS、GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_CONTROL、GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_INCOME、GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_EXPLORED_SECTORS四项相加必须为100%
默认值: GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_KILLS = 25（即使杀敌数无限大，它也只能贡献25%的游戏进度。） GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_CONTROL = 25（控制所有城镇/导弹基地时，它能贡献25%的游戏进度。） GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_INCOME = 50（控制所有矿井并全力生产时，它能贡献50%的游戏进度。） GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_EXPLORED_SECTORS = 0（0 的话探索区域不能增加游戏进度。）

Property.name: GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_SECTOR_CONTROL
Property.Description_ENG:
This setting controls the maximum number of Progress Points you can get from controlling important sectors (City / SAM). Press 'V' in the game to see your current progress value. The number of progress points you get per "important" sector is directly adjusted by this value. You will only get all these points if you control ALL the important sectors. Be sure, that the sum of GAME_PROGRESS_KILLS, GAME_PROGRESS_CONTROL, GAME_PROGRESS_INCOME, GAME_PROGRESS_VISITED has to be 100, otherwise the game will set them to defaut values.
Default Values: GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_KILLS = 25 GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_CONTROL = 25 GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_INCOME = 50 GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_EXPLORED_SECTORS = 0
Property.Description_CHI:
控制城镇/导弹基地数，影响游戏进度的有四个因素（杀敌数、控制城镇/导弹基地数、矿井收入、区域探索度）之一 GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_KILLS、GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_CONTROL、GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_INCOME、GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_EXPLORED_SECTORS四项相加必须为100%
默认值: GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_KILLS = 25（即使杀敌数无限大，它也只能贡献25%的游戏进度。） GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_CONTROL = 25（控制所有城镇/导弹基地时，它能贡献25%的游戏进度。） GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_INCOME = 50（控制所有矿井并全力生产时，它能贡献50%的游戏进度。） GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_EXPLORED_SECTORS = 0（0 的话探索区域不能增加游戏进度。）

Property.name: GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_MINE_INCOME
Property.Description_ENG:
This setting controls the maximum number of Progress Points you can get from mine income. Press 'V' in the game to see your current progress value. The number of points you get is determined by comparing how much money you're making from mines to the MAXIMUM possible amount of money that can be made. Depleted/Abandoned mines don't count. Please remember that loyalty determines how much money a mine can make, so to get the maximum points you need 100% loyalty in all mining towns. Be sure, that the sum of GAME_PROGRESS_KILLS, GAME_PROGRESS_CONTROL, GAME_PROGRESS_INCOME, GAME_PROGRESS_VISITED has to be 100, otherwise the game will set them to defaut values.
Default Values: GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_KILLS = 25 GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_CONTROL = 25 GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_INCOME = 50 GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_EXPLORED_SECTORS = 0
Property.Description_CHI:
矿井收入数，影响游戏进度的有四个因素（杀敌数、控制城镇/导弹基地数、矿井收入、区域探索度）之一 GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_KILLS、GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_CONTROL、GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_INCOME、GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_EXPLORED_SECTORS四项相加必须为100%
默认值: GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_KILLS = 25（即使杀敌数无限大，它也只能贡献25%的游戏进度。） GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_CONTROL = 25（控制所有城镇/导弹基地时，它能贡献25%的游戏进度。） GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_INCOME = 50（控制所有矿井并全力生产时，它能贡献50%的游戏进度。） GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_EXPLORED_SECTORS = 0（0 的话探索区域不能增加游戏进度。）

Property.name: GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_EXPLORED_SECTORS
Property.Description_ENG:
This setting controls the maximum number of Progress Points you can get from simply visiting map sectors. Press 'V' in the game to see your current progress value. The number of points you get for exploring a sector is directly adjusted by this value. You will only get all these points if you explore ALL sectors on the map (not including underground sectors). Note that you don't actually need to control those sectors - they simply need to be *visited* at least once. Be sure, that the sum of GAME_PROGRESS_KILLS, GAME_PROGRESS_CONTROL, GAME_PROGRESS_INCOME, GAME_PROGRESS_VISITED has to be 100, otherwise the game will set them to defaut values.
Default Values: GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_KILLS = 25 GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_CONTROL = 25 GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_INCOME = 50 GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_EXPLORED_SECTORS = 0
Property.Description_CHI:
区域探索度，影响游戏进度的有四个因素（杀敌数、控制城镇/导弹基地数、矿井收入、区域探索度）之一 GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_KILLS、GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_CONTROL、GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_INCOME、GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_EXPLORED_SECTORS四项相加必须为100%
默认值: GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_KILLS = 25（即使杀敌数无限大，它也只能贡献25%的游戏进度。） GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_CONTROL = 25（控制所有城镇/导弹基地时，它能贡献25%的游戏进度。） GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_INCOME = 50（控制所有矿井并全力生产时，它能贡献50%的游戏进度。） GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS_FROM_EXPLORED_SECTORS = 0（0 的话探索区域不能增加游戏进度。）

Property.name: ALTERNATE_PROGRESS_CALCULATION
Property.Description_ENG: When activated, will calculate progress in a completely different way. Instead of adding up all points gathered from income, control, kills and exploration, the program will find out which of these four aspects has advanced the MOST, and will set your current progress level based only on that aspect. You can reach 100 progress by doing ANY of these without relying on any of the others. For example, you can reach 100 points by killing lots of enemies, or 100 points by exploring the entire map, or 100 points by maximizing income, or 100 points by controlling all cities - whichever comes first! The four fields will constantly be "competing" with each other to see which one's gained the most points thus far. So if you shift your strategy in mid-game, the progress dependency will automatically change to accomodate you! When activated, this feature disables all four "GAME_PROGRESS_MAX_POINTS" settings above.
Property.Description_CHI: 此设置项决定是否使用HAM提供的另外一种计算游戏进度的途径。在上述四个因素中，每一项都可以达到100%。游戏将当前进度最高的一项看做整个游戏的进度。 例如四项分别是30%，35%，40%，45%，那么游戏进度即为45%。

Property.name: GAME_PROGRESS_MINIMUM
Property.Description_ENG: This is the absolute minimum Progress score you can have, EVER. This will be your starting Progress score, and will remain so until you gain enough Progress Points to surpass this value. At that point, progress will continue to increase normally. If your actual progress falls below this limit, it will instead be held at exactly this value until it can be raised again. You can use this setting to "skip" past the early combat where the foes have pathetic equipment. This value will also affect the inventory at Bobby Rays because it is based off game progress.
Property.Description_CHI: 游戏一开始的进度。This is the absolute minimum Progress score you can have, EVER. This will be your starting Progress score, and will remain so until you gain enough Progress Points to surpass this value. At that point, progress will continue to increase normally. If your actual progress falls below this limit, it will instead be held at exactly this value until it can be raised again. You can use this setting to "skip" past the early combat where the foes have pathetic equipment. This value will also affect the inventory at Bobby Rays because it is based off game progress.

Property.name: GAME_PROGRESS_MODIFIER
Property.Description_ENG: Use this value to increase or decrease Game Progress by a flat amount of points. Note that this cannot decrease your progress below 0 or above 100. A positive value here will make enemies carry more advanced weapons earlier than they should, for the entire duration of the game. It will also increase the availability of advanced weapons from Bobby Ray's. A negative value here will keep enemy (and Bobby Ray) item levels lower for a longer time. However, it will PEREVENT YOU FROM REACHING 100 PROGRESS POINTS (and the weapons associated with that progress level).
Property.Description_CHI: 在当前游戏进度上再加上/减少多少进度。Use this value to increase or decrease Game Progress by a flat amount of points. Note that this cannot decrease your progress below 0 or above 100. A positive value here will make enemies carry more advanced weapons earlier than they should, for the entire duration of the game. It will also increase the availability of advanced weapons from Bobby Ray's. A negative value here will keep enemy (and Bobby Ray) item levels lower for a longer time. However, it will PEREVENT YOU FROM REACHING 100 PROGRESS POINTS (and the weapons associated with that progress level).

Property.name: NUM_KILLS_PER_PROGRESS_POINT_NOVICE
Property.Description_ENG: How many kills are required to win one progress point, on Novice difficulty? The total number of progress points you can get is limited by GAME_PROGRESS_KILLS
Property.Description_CHI: 新手难度下杀死多少敌人能增加一点游戏进度。 The total number of progress points you can get is limited by GAME_PROGRESS_KILLS

Property.name: NUM_KILLS_PER_PROGRESS_POINT_EXPERIENCED
Property.Description_ENG: How many kills are required to win one progress point, on Experienced difficulty? The total number of progress points you can get is limited by GAME_PROGRESS_KILLS
Property.Description_CHI: 老手难度下杀死多少敌人能增加一点游戏进度。 The total number of progress points you can get is limited by GAME_PROGRESS_KILLS

Property.name: NUM_KILLS_PER_PROGRESS_POINT_EXPERT
Property.Description_ENG: How many kills are required to win one progress point, on Expert difficulty? The total number of progress points you can get is limited by GAME_PROGRESS_KILLS
Property.Description_CHI: 专家难度下杀死多少敌人能增加一点游戏进度。 The total number of progress points you can get is limited by GAME_PROGRESS_KILLS

Property.name: NUM_KILLS_PER_PROGRESS_POINT_INSANE
