Property.Description_ENG: How many kills are required to win one progress point, on INSANE difficulty? The total number of progress points you can get is limited by GAME_PROGRESS_KILLS
Property.Description_CHI: 疯狂难度下杀死多少敌人能增加一点游戏进度。 The total number of progress points you can get is limited by GAME_PROGRESS_KILLS

Property.name: GAME_PROGRESS_START_MADLAB_QUEST
Property.Description_ENG: This is the time in percentage, when the Madlab quest should start. Default Value: 35
Property.Description_GER: Dies weist auf den Zeitpunkt hin, ab wann die Madlab-Quest vefügbar wird (an den Spielfortschritt angelehnt). Standardwert: 35
Property.Description_RUS: В процентах устанавливает прогресс, при котором появляется квест на робота.
Property.Description_CHI: 游戏进度到多少时触发机器人任务？

Property.name: GAME_PROGRESS_MIKE_AVAILABLE
Property.Description_ENG: This is the time in percentage, when Mike is available. Default Value: 50
Property.Description_GER: Dies weist auf den Zeitpunkt hin, ab wann Mike im Spiel auftaucht (an den Spielfortschritt angelehnt). Standardwert: 50
Property.Description_RUS: В процентах устанавливает прогресс, при ктором появляется Майк
Property.Description_CHI: 游戏进度到多少时出现Mike？

Property.name: GAME_PROGRESS_IGGY_AVAILABLE
Property.Description_ENG: This is the time in percentage, when Iggy is available. Default Value: 70
Property.Description_GER: Dies weist auf den Zeitpunkt hin, ab wann Iggy vefügbar wird (an den Spielfortschritt angelehnt). Standardwert: 70
Property.Description_RUS: В процентах устанавливает прогресс, при котором появляется Игги
Property.Description_CHI: 游戏进度到多少时出现Iggy？

Section.name: Strategic Event Settings
Section.Description_ENG: This section controls various scripted events that happen on the Strategy Map.
Section.Description_CHI: 战略事件设置

Property.name: TRIGGER_MASSIVE_ENEMY_COUNTERATTACK_AT_DRASSEN
Property.Description_ENG: Can queen send troops to reinforce Drassen like she says she's going to in the Meanwhile...? If you set this to TRUE, this will be really pain in the ass at the beginning of the game ;-)
Property.Description_GER: Darf die Königin Verstärkung nach Drassen schicken, wie sie in der Zwischensequenz ankündigt? Dieses Spielereignis kann einen Nervenzusammenbruch heraufbeschwören, wenn der Wert auf TRUE gesetzt wird ;-)
Property.Description_RUS: Позволяет Дейдране посылать войска для отвоевываания Драссена. Если включите - получите реальный геморой в начале игры.
Property.Description_CHI: 是否要打“Drassen保卫战”（返乡团）？

Property.name: ENABLE_CREPITUS
Property.Description_ENG: This determines whether crepitus/creatures show up in SCI-FI MODE. They can never show up in realistic mode. This option requires a new game in order to work!
Property.Description_GER: Dies bestimmt, ob Monster im Sci-Fi-Modus auftauchen. Jedoch: Sie können nie im realistischen Modus erscheinen. Diese Option wird erst mit dem erstellen eines neuen Spiels wirksam!
Property.Description_RUS: Определяет, показ жуков/монстров в фантастическом режиме (и только в нем). Требует начала новой игры.
Property.Description_CHI: 游戏中会出现异形？

Property.name: WHICH_MINE_SHUTS_DOWN
Property.Description_ENG: This value selects which mine will deplete its ore reserves during the campaign. -1 = JA2 Default: The game will randomly select which mine is depleted. 0 = No mine will be depleted! 1 = San Mona (don't use this!!!) 2 = Drassen 3 = Alma (don't use this!!!) 4 = Cambria 5 = Chitzena 6 = Grumm
Property.Description_CHI: 哪座矿井会被开采完？ -1 = 随机 0 = 无 2 = Drassen 3 = Alma 4 = Cambria 5 = Chitzena 6 = Grumm

Section.name: Strategic Gameplay Settings
Section.Description_ENG: In this section you control the rules for the STRATEGIC portion of the game. Some of these settings can have a profound effect on the way the game is played.
Section.Description_CHI: 战略游戏性设置

Property.name: ALLOW_REINFORCEMENTS
Property.Description_ENG: Determines whether Enemy/Militia groups can assist each other in battle. If set to TRUE, several Enemy/Militia groups can attack a sector from two or more sides, joining forces. This also works when defending. The number of troops that will show up on the TACTICAL map is limited (see the MAX_NUMBER_ settings). If there are more troops than this participating in the attack, they will slowly appear on the screen's edge as their friends are killed off. If set to FALSE (Default JA2), Enemy/Militia groups can only fight each other one group at a time.
Property.Description_CHI: 允许敌人/民兵支援邻近地区？

Property.name: ALLOW_REINFORCEMENTS_ONLY_IN_CITIES
Property.Description_ENG: If this is set to TRUE, Enemy/Militia groups can only move between two CITY sectors if they want to reinforce an attack/defense. "ALLOW_REINFORCEMENTS" must be set to TRUE.
Property.Description_CHI: 只允许在城市里支援邻近地区，不允许在野外支援邻近地区？

Property.name: ENABLE_ALL_TERRORISTS
Property.Description_ENG: This determines whether all the terrorists are available, or whether they're chosen at random (default). This option requires a new game in order to work!
Property.Description_GER: Dies bestimmt, ob alleTerroristen verfügbar sind, oder ob sie zufällig ausgesucht werden. Diese Option wird erst mit dem erstellen eines neuen Spiels wirksam!
Property.Description_RUS: Определяет, будут ли в Арулько все террористы. Требует начала новой игры.
Property.Description_CHI: This determines whether all the terrorists are available, or whether they're chosen at random (default). This option requires a new game in order to work!

Property.name: ENABLE_ALL_WEAPON_CACHES
Property.Description_ENG: This determines whether all the warehouses/weapons caches are available, or whether they're chosen at random (default). This option requires a new game in order to work!
Property.Description_GER: Dies bestimmt, ob alle Waffenlager/Waffenverstecke verfügbar sind, oder ob sie zufällig ausgesucht werden. Diese Option wird erst mit dem erstellen eines neuen Spiels wirksam!
Property.Description_RUS: Определяет, будут ли доступны все склады, или они будут рандомны. Требует начала новой игры.
Property.Description_CHI: This determines whether all the warehouses/weapons caches are available, or whether they're chosen at random (default). This option requires a new game in order to work!

Property.name: VEHICLE_INVENTORY
Property.Description_ENG: Should vehicles have an inventory?
Property.Description_GER: Sollen Fahrzeuge ein Inventar haben?
Property.Description_RUS: Включает инвентарь транспорта
Property.Description_CHI: 汽车上能放物品？

Property.name: HUMVEE_OFFROAD
Property.Description_ENG: If enabled, this feature will allow the HUMVEE jeep to travel off roads. It cannot go everywhere, but can drive through plains, fields, hills, and light forests.
Property.Description_CHI: 悍马能越野？

Property.name: AUTORESOLVE_LUCK_FACTOR
Property.Description_ENG: Controls the importance of luck in determining the results of auto-resolve combat. You can use fractional values here. 1.0 = Luck is mostly irrelevant. Battles will be won based on the respective skills of the participants. 2.0 = JA2 1.13 Default: Luck is just as important as the respective skills of the participants.
Property.Description_RUS: Определяет влияние скрытого параметра удачи в игре
Property.Description_CHI: 自动战斗中的运气因素 2.0 表示运气也很重要 1.0 为最小值，表示运气完全不重要，全看实力。

Property.name: NO_ENEMY_DETECTION_WITHOUT_RECON
Property.Description_ENG: If set to TRUE, enemy units moving through previously-explored sectors are not automatically shown on the strategy map. This allows them to sneak inside your territory even after you've explored a large portion of the map. Militia can detect enemies in sectors adjacent to their location, but mercs cannot. Skyrider can also detect enemies below his position, as in normal JA2. Also, enemies inside previously-explored cities will always appear on the map (as "?"), as in normal JA2. Note that some Facilities can be used to reveal enemies moving in the wilderness.
Property.Description_CHI: 设置为FALSE时，敌人在探索过的地图上移动时，你能看到红色的问号。 设置为TRUE时，你看不到地图上敌人的移动。只有民兵、有侦察技能的人才能看到邻近地区的敌人。或者你要使用A.C.A设施才能看到敌人动向。

Property.name: FACILITY_EVENT_RARITY
Property.Description_ENG: This determines the likelyhood of facilities triggering their built-in effects (if they have any). The chance to trigger an effect is X of Y every hour, where X is defined in the specific facility data, and Y is the value you set here. 1 = Events will always occur, every hour, to every merc applicable. This is very extreme and not recommended. 1000 = Default. Events are relatively rare. 50000 = Unless the values in FacilityTypes.XML are radically changed, it is virtually impossible for events to occur at all. Please remember that some events are BENEFICIAL. Some facilities may lose their entire purpose if their events go untriggered.
Property.Description_CHI: 设施发生效果的概率。调大的话，设施更少发生效果。

Property.name: FACILITY_DANGER_RATE
Property.Description_ENG: Determines the amount of combined skill one needs to qualify for better results (or lesser damage) from facility events. Each event requires a different set of skills. 0 = Facility risk results are always modified for the better, based on character skill. 50 = Default. Characters with more than 50 combined skill will get better results, while characters with less than 50 will get worse results. 100 = Maximum danger. Results from facility risks are usually worse than the default values in FacilityTypes.XML, and the less skills you have the more likely you are to get the worse results. Please note: You cannot use this to turn facility risks off. For that you need to edit the XML and remove all risks or reduce their chances to 0. This setting also doesn't guarantee good/bad results from triggering risks.
Property.Description_CHI: 有的设施可能同时具有正面的和负面的作用。调大此项的话，设施的正面效果会更常发生。

Property.name: ADDITIONAL_REPAIR_MODE
Property.Description_ENG: Activates the new additional repair mode. While the old JA 1.13 repair system goes from soldier to soldier, this algorithm goes through item types, priorizing equipped weapons/armor and highly damaged items. It starts with equipped weapons and armor, then goes to weapons/armor held in inventory and finally ends with items in backpacks. Thus, soldiers first repair all equipped weapons of mercs in the same sector, then all equipped armor, and so forth, always starting with the item with least durability (especially jammed guns). FALSE = 1.13 repair system TRUE = New additional repair system based on priorities
Property.Description_CHI: Activates the new additional repair mode. While the old JA 1.13 repair system goes from soldier to soldier, this algorithm goes through item types, priorizing equipped weapons/armor and highly damaged items. It starts with equipped weapons and armor, then goes to weapons/armor held in inventory and finally ends with items in backpacks. Thus, soldiers first repair all equipped weapons of mercs in the same sector, then all equipped armor, and so forth, always starting with the item with least durability (especially jammed guns). FALSE = 1.13 repair system TRUE = New additional repair system based on priorities

Property.name: ALLOW_SKYRIDER_HOT_LZ
Property.Description_ENG: Set how to handle Skyrider "hot Landing Zone" options. 0 = Don't allow Skyrider to drop off mercs in hot LZ (Vanilla style). 1 = Allow Skyrider to drop off mercs to center of map. 2 = Skyrider drops mercs at map edge from direction he entered the sector.
Property.Description_CHI: Set how to handle Skyrider "hot Landing Zone" options. 0 = Don't allow Skyrider to drop off mercs in hot LZ (Vanilla style). 1 = Allow Skyrider to drop off mercs to center of map. 2 = Skyrider drops mercs at map edge from direction he entered the sector.

Section.name: Laptop Settings
Section.Description_ENG: Use these settings to make changes to the laptop screen.

Property.name: BRIEFING_ROOM
Property.Description_ENG: If set to TRUE, you can browse to the briefing room website on the laptop.

Property.name: ENCYCLOPEDIA
Property.Description_ENG: If set to TRUE, you can browse to the encyclopedia website on the laptop.

Property.name: DISABLE_LAPTOP_TRANSITION
Property.Description_ENG: If disabled, the transition will be skipped when opening/closing the laptop.

Property.name: FAST_WWW_SITES_LOADING
Property.Description_ENG: Fast loading of WWW laptop sites?

Section.name: Bobby Ray Settings
Section.Description_ENG: Here you can change some settings regarding Bobby Ray's on-line gun store. You can also affect shipments coming from Bobby Ray's.
Section.Description_CHI: Bobby Ray 网店设置

Property.name: BOBBY_RAY_TOOLTIPS_SHOW_POSSIBLE_ATTACHMENTS
Property.Description_ENG: When activated, the tooltips for all of Bobby Ray's Guns (and ONLY guns) will show a list of all possible attachments for the gun. "Hidden" attachments are NOT shown.
Property.Description_CHI: 设置为TRUE时，能够在网店上看到武器可用的附件。

Property.name: STEALING_FROM_SHIPMENTS_DISABLED
Property.Description_ENG: If you set this value to TRUE, the chance that items will be stolen from your Bobby Ray shipment is 0 percentage.
Property.Description_GER: Wenn dieser Wert auf TRUE gesetzt wird, ist die Chance, dass Gegenstände der ankommenden Lieferungen gestohlen werden gleich 0 Prozent.
Property.Description_RUS: Позволяет отключить воровство посылок от Боби Рэя (установите False).
Property.Description_CHI: 设置为FALSE时，Pablo可能会从你的网购物品里偷掉一两件。 设置为TRUE时，物品不会失窃。

Property.name: CHANCE_OF_SHIPMENT_LOSS
Property.Description_ENG: Set the chance in percentage of whole shipment lost from Bobby Ray.
Property.Description_GER: Hier können Sie bestimmen wie hoch die Chance ist (in Prozent), dass die gesamte Lieferung von Bobby Ray verloren geht.
Property.Description_RUS: Устанавливает шанс воровства посылок от Боби Рэя в процентах.
Property.Description_CHI: 网购有风险！你从网店订的东西有一定的可能会寄丢！整批都会寄丢！10表示10%的可能性。

Section.name: Item Property Settings
Section.Description_ENG: These settings allow changing the properties of items and how they behave in-game. Some of these settings are simply an easier alternative to massively editing the XML files.
Section.Description_CHI: 这些参数可以改变物品的属性或游戏中的行为，其中一些参数设置省却了玩家修改繁琐的XML的过程

Property.name: EXPLOSIVES_DAMAGE_MODIFIER
Property.Description_ENG: This is a percentage-based modifier for the damage of ALL explosives. Use it if you don't want to edit the XML datafiles. 100 = Normal damage. 200 = Double damage. 50 = Half damage.
Property.Description_CHI: 爆炸物伤害的百分比设定，如果你不想一个个改XML，就用这个吧 100 = 正常伤害 200 = 双倍伤害 50 = 一半伤害

Property.name: MELEE_DAMAGE_MODIFIER
Property.Description_ENG: This is a percentage-based modifier for the damage of ALL melee-weapons. Use it if you don't want to edit the XML datafiles. 100 = Normal damage. 200 = Double damage 50 = Half damage.
Property.Description_CHI: 肉搏武器伤害百分比设定，如果你不想一个个改XML，就用这个吧 100 = 正常伤害 200 = 双倍伤害 50 = 一半伤害

Property.name: GUN_DAMAGE_MODIFIER
Property.Description_ENG: This is a percentage-based modifier for the damage of ALL ranged-weapons. Use it if you don't want to edit the XML datafiles. 100 = Normal damage. 200 = Double damage. 50 = Half damage.
Property.Description_CHI: 远程武器（各种枪械）伤害百分比设定，如果你不想一个个改XML，就用这个吧 100 = 正常伤害 200 = 双倍伤害 50 = 一半伤害

Property.name: GUN_RANGE_MODIFIER
Property.Description_ENG: This is a percentage-based modifiers for the weapon ranges. Use it if you don't want edit the XML datafiles. 100 = Normal range. 200 = Double range. 50 = Half range.
Property.Description_CHI: 远程武器（各种枪械）射程百分比设定，如果你不想一个个改XML，就用这个吧 100 = 正常射程 200 = 双倍射程 50 = 一半射程

Property.name: ENABLE_ARMOR_COVERAGE
Property.Description_ENG: Should the Armor Coverage value be used? If set to TRUE, bullets do not always strike the armor protecting the targeted bodypart - sometimes a bullet can hit in an uncovered spot, bypassing the armor completely. This is defined in the armor item's "Coverage" value. If set to FALSE, bullets always strike the armor protecting the targeted bodypart (if any).
Property.Description_CHI: 是否开启护甲覆盖百分比设定 如果设定为开，子弹有时候会击中未被护甲覆盖的部分，从而完全忽略护甲防护值 如果设定为关，所有子弹都会视如有护甲阻隔

Property.name: DYNAMIC_AMMO_WEIGHT
Property.Description_ENG: If set to TRUE, the weight of an ammo clip is determined by how many bullets are left in it. If set to FALSE, all clips of the same type will always weigh the same, regardless of how many bullets remain inside.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果该值为True，则弹夹重量取决于里面有多少颗子弹 如果该值为False，则所有弹夹重量相同，不管是满满的弹夹还是只剩一颗子弹的弹夹

Property.name: AUTOFIRE_BULLETS_PER_5AP_MODIFIER
Property.Description_ENG: This changes ALL automatic weapons, speeding up or slowing down their rate of fire (the "Bullets Per 5 AP" value). This allows you to have more (or less) autofire-intensive combat, without having to edit all the weapon entries in the XML file.
Property.Description_RUS: Это влияет на ВСЕ автоматическое оружие, увеличивая или уменьшая его скорострельность. Используйте, если не хотите править XML, для повышения интенсивности боя.
Property.Description_CHI: 这项参数对所有自动武器有效，如果你想所有自动武器的射速变高或变低一定数值，就修改这个吧，省却了玩家一个一个修改XML的麻烦

Property.name: STRENGTH_TO_LIFT_HALF_KILO
Property.Description_ENG: This setting tells us how many STRENGTH points we need to lift 0.5 kilograms comfortably. Adjust this value to make inventory weight more (or less) important for gameplay.
Property.Description_CHI: 该值决定了举起0.5公斤的物体所需的力量点数，调整该值会间接改变物品栏大小

Property.name: MORTAR_CTH_DIVISOR
Property.Description_ENG: This is a divisor value applied to the "Chance-to-Hit" of all mortars, after all other calculations have taken place. The formula is: Final CTH = Original CTH divided by X, where X is the value you set here. Note: This is only used if Old Trait System is played
Property.Description_CHI: 该值影响全部迫击炮类武器命中率，在其他因素全部计算完毕之后，我们用所得命中率除该值，得到最终命中率。（注意：仅在旧技能系统下有效）

Property.name: USE_DEFAULT_SLOTS_WHEN_MISSING
Property.Description_ENG: When attachments have not been assigned for NAS, the game can add default slots that differ per item type. It is recommended to play with this set to FALSE when the attachments are assigned properly. This option is best used when playing a XML based mod that does not have the NAS xml fully updated. However when the mod is too different from 1.13, there will be a lot of strange and/or wrong attachments.

Property.name: ATTACHMENT_DROP_RATE
Property.Description_ENG: The chance in percentages that an attachment will have to drop with the item if an NPC dies. Setting this higher than 20% will unbalance your game unless you change MAX_ENEMY_ATTACHMENTS. Inseperable attachments will always drop. Range: 0 - 100%.
Property.Description_CHI: NPC死亡时掉落附件的百分比。当该值设定为20以上时会严重影响游戏平衡。取值范围：0-100

Property.name: MAX_ENEMY_ATTACHMENTS
Property.Description_ENG: The maximum amount of attachments NPC's can get on their gun when they get random equipment. They will usually get less attachments than this value because of randomness. Range: 2 - 30.
Property.Description_CHI: NPC随机选择的武器中所带最大附件数量，范围：2-30

Section.name: Strategic Enemy AI Settings
Section.Description_ENG: In this section you can change the behavior of the Queen's Army, how aggressive she is, how large her army is, etcetera.
Section.Description_CHI: 在这个区您可以修改女王军队的行为，比如军队数量等

Property.name: NEW_AGGRESSIVE_AI
Property.Description_ENG: This new AI is capable of launching massive attacks (with reinforcements) at important sectors. Teams of several dozen enemies will assemble to attack your sector SIMULTANEOUSLY. This is similar to the Drassen Counterattack event, except it happens to every city, possibly several times during the campaign! When set to TRUE, this setting has the potential of making the game considerably harder.
Property.Description_CHI: 新AI会对重要地区发动大规模袭击，类似D城返乡团，不过每个城市基本都会有一次甚至几次

Property.name: INITIAL_GARRISON_PERCENTAGES_NOVICE
Property.Description_ENG: This is the percentage of the "normal" number of enemies, that will be placed on the map at the start of the game. This setting controls NOVICE difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 在开始“新手”难度游戏时有多少敌军在地图上，该值为“一般”敌军数量的百分比，范围：0-500

Property.name: INITIAL_GARRISON_PERCENTAGES_EXPERIENCED
Property.Description_ENG: This is the percentage of the "normal" number of enemies that will be placed on the map at the start of the game. This setting controls EXPERIENCED difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 在开始“老手”难度游戏时有多少敌军在地图上，该值为“一般”敌军数量的百分比，范围：0-500

Property.name: INITIAL_GARRISON_PERCENTAGES_EXPERT
Property.Description_ENG: This is the percentage of the "normal" number of enemies that will be placed on the map at the start of the game. This setting controls EXPERT difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 在开始“专家”难度游戏时有多少敌军在地图上，该值为“一般”敌军数量的百分比，范围：0-500

Property.name: INITIAL_GARRISON_PERCENTAGES_INSANE
Property.Description_ENG: This is the percentage of the "normal" number of enemies that will be placed on the map at the start of the game. This setting controls INSANE difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 在开始“疯狂”难度游戏时有多少敌军在地图上，该值为“一般”敌军数量的百分比，范围：0-500

Property.name: MIN_ENEMY_GROUP_SIZE_NOVICE
Property.Description_ENG: This is the smallest possible size for any enemy group. If ever there are fewer than these many enemies in a sector, they will not move on the STRATEGIC map. This setting controls the NOVICE difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 在进行“新手”难度等级的游戏时，每组敌兵的最少人数，如果某敌人小队小于该最小人数，则该小队在战略地图上不会移动。

Property.name: MIN_ENEMY_GROUP_SIZE_EXPERIENCED
Property.Description_ENG: This is the smallest possible size for any enemy group. If ever there are fewer than these many enemies in a sector, they will not move on the STRATEGIC map. This setting controls the EXPERIENCED difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 在进行“老手”难度等级的游戏时，每组敌兵的最少人数，如果某敌人小队小于该最小人数，则该小队在战略地图上不会移动。

Property.name: MIN_ENEMY_GROUP_SIZE_EXPERT
Property.Description_ENG: This is the smallest possible size for any enemy group. If ever there are fewer than these many enemies in a sector, they will not move on the STRATEGIC map. This setting controls the EXPERT difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 在进行“专家”难度等级的游戏时，每组敌兵的最少人数，如果某敌人小队小于该最小人数，则该小队在战略地图上不会移动。

Property.name: MIN_ENEMY_GROUP_SIZE_INSANE
Property.Description_ENG: This is the smallest possible size for any enemy group. If ever there are fewer than these many enemies in a sector, they will not move on the STRATEGIC map. This setting controls the INSANE difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 在进行“疯狂”难度等级的游戏时，每组敌兵的最少人数，如果某敌人小队小于该最小人数，则该小队在战略地图上不会移动。

Property.name: PERCENT_EXTRA_ELITES_EXPERIENCED
Property.Description_ENG: The percent of troops converted to extra elites in enemy groups, when playing on EXPERIENCED difficulty.
Property.Description_GER: Die prozentuale Zahl an Truppen, welche im Schwierigkeitsgrad Profi zu extra Elitesoldaten umgewandelt werden.
Property.Description_RUS: Процент войск, преобразуемых в элиту во вражеских отрядах на среднем уровне игры.
Property.Description_CHI: 在进行“疯狂”难度等级的游戏时，敌人部队中额外精英的转换百分比

Property.name: PERCENT_EXTRA_ELITES_EXPERT
Property.Description_ENG: The percent of troops converted to extra elites in enemy groups, when playing on EXPERT difficulty.
Property.Description_GER: Die prozentuale Zahl an Truppen, welche im Schwierigkeitsgrad Alter Hase zu extra Elitesoldaten umgewandelt werden.
Property.Description_RUS: Процент войск, преобразуемых в элиту во вражеских отрядах на трудном уровне игры.
Property.Description_CHI: 在进行“专家”难度等级的游戏时，敌人部队中额外精英的转换百分比

Property.name: PERCENT_EXTRA_ELITES_INSANE
Property.Description_ENG: The percent of troops converted to extra elites in enemy groups, when playing on INSANE difficulty.
Property.Description_GER: Die prozentuale Zahl an Truppen, welche im Schwierigkeitsgrad WAHNSINNIG zu extra Elitesoldaten umgewandelt werden.
Property.Description_RUS: Процент войск, преобразуемых в элиту во вражеских отрядах на невозможном уровне игры.
Property.Description_CHI: 在进行“疯狂”难度等级的游戏时，敌人部队中额外精英的转换百分比

Property.name: UNLIMITED_POOL_OF_TROOPS_NOVICE
Property.Description_ENG: If set to TRUE, the queen will have an unlimited number of troops at her disposal. She will never run out of troops, and can create a new unit every time she needs one. If set to FALSE, the queen has a limited number of troops - See also QUEENS_INITIAL_POOL_OF_TROOPS_NOVICE. This setting affects the NOVICE difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果设定此项为开，女王有无限军队，她永远不会无兵可用，而且当她需要的时候马上就能召集一批士兵。 如果设定此项为关，女王只有有限的部队。---其他请参阅QUEENS_INITIAL_POOL_OF_TROOPS_NOVICE

Property.name: UNLIMITED_POOL_OF_TROOPS_EXPERIENCED
Property.Description_ENG: If set to TRUE, the queen will have an unlimited number of troops at her disposal. She will never run out of troops, and can create a new unit every time she needs one. If set to FALSE, the queen has a limited number of troops - See also QUEENS_INITIAL_POOL_OF_TROOPS_EXPERIENCED. This setting affects the EXPERIENCED difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果设定此项为开，女王有无限军队，她永远不会无兵可用，而且当她需要的时候马上就能召集一批士兵。 如果设定此项为关，女王只有有限的部队。---其他请参阅QUEENS_INITIAL_POOL_OF_TROOPS_EXPERIENCED

Property.name: UNLIMITED_POOL_OF_TROOPS_EXPERT
Property.Description_ENG: If set to TRUE, the queen will have an unlimited number of troops at her disposal. She will never run out of troops, and can create a new unit every time she needs one. If set to FALSE, the queen has a limited number of troops - See also QUEENS_INITIAL_POOL_OF_TROOPS_EXPERT. This setting affects the EXPERT difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果设定此项为开，女王有无限军队，她永远不会无兵可用，而且当她需要的时候马上就能召集一批士兵。 如果设定此项为关，女王只有有限的部队。---其他请参阅QUEENS_INITIAL_POOL_OF_TROOPS_EXPERT

Property.name: UNLIMITED_POOL_OF_TROOPS_INSANE
Property.Description_ENG: If set to TRUE, the queen will have an unlimited number of troops at her disposal. She will never run out of troops, and can create a new unit every time she needs one. If set to FALSE, the queen has a limited number of troops - See also QUEENS_INITIAL_POOL_OF_TROOPS_INSANE. This setting affects the INSANE difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果设定此项为开，女王有无限军队，她永远不会无兵可用，而且当她需要的时候马上就能召集一批士兵。 如果设定此项为关，女王只有有限的部队。---其他请参阅QUEENS_INITIAL_POOL_OF_TROOPS_INSANE

Property.name: QUEENS_INITIAL_POOL_OF_TROOPS_NOVICE
Property.Description_ENG: This is the number of troops the queen has at her disposal at the start of the game. This setting affects NOVICE difficulty. If UNLIMITED_POOL_OF_TROOPS_NOVICE = TRUE, this setting is ignored.
Property.Description_CHI: 新手难度游戏开始时女王拥有多少部队？

Property.name: QUEENS_INITIAL_POOL_OF_TROOPS_EXPERIENCED
Property.Description_ENG: This is the number of troops the queen has at her disposal at the start of the game. This setting affects EXPERIENCED difficulty. If UNLIMITED_POOL_OF_TROOPS_EXPERIENCED = TRUE, this setting is ignored.
Property.Description_CHI: 老手难度游戏开始时女王拥有多少部队？

Property.name: QUEENS_INITIAL_POOL_OF_TROOPS_EXPERT
Property.Description_ENG: This is the number of troops the queen has at her disposal at the start of the game. This setting affects EXPERT difficulty. If UNLIMITED_POOL_OF_TROOPS_EXPERT = TRUE, this setting is ignored.
Property.Description_CHI: 专家难度游戏开始时女王拥有多少部队？

Property.name: QUEENS_INITIAL_POOL_OF_TROOPS_INSANE
Property.Description_ENG: This is the number of troops the queen has at her disposal at the start of the game. This setting affects INSANE difficulty. If UNLIMITED_POOL_OF_TROOPS_INSANE = TRUE, this setting is ignored.
Property.Description_CHI: 疯狂难度游戏开始时女王拥有多少部队？

Property.name: QUEEN_POOL_INCREMENT_PER_DIFFICULTY_LEVEL
Property.Description_ENG: Amount of troops that will be added to queens army when the troops pool is empty.
Property.Description_GER: Die Menge an Truppen, welche der Armee der Königin hinzugefügt werden, wenn ihr Nachschub versiegt.
Property.Description_RUS: Количество войск, добавляемое к армии Дейдраны, если войска закончились.
Property.Description_CHI: Amount of troops that will be added to queens army when the troops pool is empty.

Property.name: ENEMY_STARTING_ALERT_LEVEL_NOVICE
Property.Description_ENG: This sets the enemy's starting Alert Level in NOVICE difficulty. The higher their alert level, the more likely they are to spot your mercs in adjacent sectors and try to attack them.
Property.Description_CHI: 新手难度敌兵警戒级别。 首先概念解释：警戒等级 每次一组敌人进入一个新的地区时，敌人都会对周边地区进行一次探查，并有一定几率（取决于警戒等级）能发现邻近地区的玩家的队伍。驻军会定期探查周边地区。 警戒等级低的话，敌人探查到你的几率较小，且侵略性较低，不会在地图上追击你的佣兵。 此设置项决定不同难度下敌人的警戒等级，即成功探查到邻近地区的玩家并追击的几率。

Property.name: ENEMY_STARTING_ALERT_LEVEL_EXPERIENCED
Property.Description_ENG: This sets the enemy's starting Alert Level in EXPERIENCED difficulty. The higher their alert level, the more likely they are to spot your mercs in adjacent sectors and try to attack them.
Property.Description_CHI: 老手难度敌兵警戒级别。 首先概念解释：警戒等级 每次一组敌人进入一个新的地区时，敌人都会对周边地区进行一次探查，并有一定几率（取决于警戒等级）能发现邻近地区的玩家的队伍。驻军会定期探查周边地区。 警戒等级低的话，敌人探查到你的几率较小，且侵略性较低，不会在地图上追击你的佣兵。 此设置项决定不同难度下敌人的警戒等级，即成功探查到邻近地区的玩家并追击的几率。

Property.name: ENEMY_STARTING_ALERT_LEVEL_EXPERT
Property.Description_ENG: This sets the enemy's starting Alert Level in EXPERT difficulty. The higher their alert level, the more likely they are to spot your mercs in adjacent sectors and try to attack them.
Property.Description_CHI: 专家难度敌兵警戒级别。 首先概念解释：警戒等级 每次一组敌人进入一个新的地区时，敌人都会对周边地区进行一次探查，并有一定几率（取决于警戒等级）能发现邻近地区的玩家的队伍。驻军会定期探查周边地区。 警戒等级低的话，敌人探查到你的几率较小，且侵略性较低，不会在地图上追击你的佣兵。 此设置项决定不同难度下敌人的警戒等级，即成功探查到邻近地区的玩家并追击的几率。

Property.name: ENEMY_STARTING_ALERT_LEVEL_INSANE
Property.Description_ENG: This sets the enemy's starting Alert Level in INSANE difficulty. The higher their alert level, the more likely they are to spot your mercs in adjacent sectors and try to attack them.
Property.Description_CHI: 疯狂难度敌兵警戒级别。 首先概念解释：警戒等级 每次一组敌人进入一个新的地区时，敌人都会对周边地区进行一次探查，并有一定几率（取决于警戒等级）能发现邻近地区的玩家的队伍。驻军会定期探查周边地区。 警戒等级低的话，敌人探查到你的几率较小，且侵略性较低，不会在地图上追击你的佣兵。 此设置项决定不同难度下敌人的警戒等级，即成功探查到邻近地区的玩家并追击的几率。

Property.name: ENEMY_ALERT_DECAY_NOVICE
Property.Description_ENG: When an enemy spots and chases a player group, their Alertness Value decreases by this much. This setting affects NOVICE difficulty. See also "ENEMY_STARTING_LEVEL_NOVICE" for the basic Alert Level.
Property.Description_CHI: 新手难度下当敌人成功探查到并追击你的部队时，敌人的警戒等级会下降这个数值。

Property.name: ENEMY_ALERT_DECAY_EXPERIENCED
Property.Description_ENG: When an enemy spots and chases a player group, their Alertness Value decreases by this much. This setting affects EXPERIENCED difficulty. See also "ENEMY_STARTING_LEVEL_EXPERIENCED" for the basic Alert Level.
Property.Description_CHI: 老手难度下当敌人成功探查到并追击你的部队时，敌人的警戒等级会下降这个数值。

Property.name: ENEMY_ALERT_DECAY_EXPERT
Property.Description_ENG: When an enemy spots and chases a player group, their Alertness Value decreases by this much. This setting affects EXPERT difficulty. See also "ENEMY_STARTING_LEVEL_EXPERT" for the basic Alert Level.
Property.Description_CHI: 专家难度下当敌人成功探查到并追击你的部队时，敌人的警戒等级会下降这个数值。

Property.name: ENEMY_ALERT_DECAY_INSANE
Property.Description_ENG: When an enemy spots and chases a player group, their Alertness Value decreases by this much. This setting affects INSANE difficulty. See also "ENEMY_STARTING_LEVEL_INSANE" for the basic Alert Level.
Property.Description_CHI: 疯狂难度下当敌人成功探查到并追击你的部队时，敌人的警戒等级会下降这个数值。

Property.name: NUM_AWARE_BATTLES_NOVICE
Property.Description_ENG: Certain conditions can cause the queen to go into a "full alert" mode. This means that temporarily, the queen's forces will automatically succeed adjacent checks until x number of enemy initiated battles occur. This setting affects NOVICE difficulty.
Property.Description_GER: Bestimmte Umstände können die Königin dazu bringen, in den Modus "Alarmstufe Rot" zu wechseln. Das bedeutet, dass die Streitkräfte der Königin zeitweise automatisch die Umgebungssuche erfolgreich ausführen, bis X vom Feind eingeleitete Kämpfe sich ereignet haben. Diese Einstellung verweist auf den Schwierigkeitsgrad Einsteiger.
Property.Description_RUS: Некоторые условия могут вынудить королеву объявить "полную боевую готоврность", когда отряды врага будут автоматически проходить проверки на "тревогу" в соседнем секторе, пока число начатых боев не достигнет установленного. Это настройки для легкого уровня игры.
Property.Description_CHI: 新手难度下“全面警戒”状态持续到敌人主动对你发起进攻的次数。 在一定的条件下会促使女王会进入“全面警戒”状态。意思是在一段时间内，敌人一定能够成功探查到周边地区的玩家队伍并追击你的队伍。 “全面警戒”状态持续到敌人主动对你发起n次进攻后。n即为要设置的值。

Property.name: NUM_AWARE_BATTLES_EXPERIENCED
Property.Description_ENG: Certain conditions can cause the queen to go into a "full alert" mode. This means that temporarily, the queen's forces will automatically succeed adjacent checks until x number of enemy initiated battles occur. This setting affects EXPERIENCED difficulty.
Property.Description_GER: Bestimmte Umstände können die Königin dazu bringen, in den Modus "Alarmstufe Rot" zu wechseln. Das bedeutet, dass die Streitkräfte der Königin zeitweise automatisch die Umgebungssuche erfolgreich ausführen, bis X vom Feind eingeleitete Kämpfe sich ereignet haben. Diese Einstellung verweist auf den Schwierigkeitsgrad Profi.
Property.Description_RUS: Некоторые условия могут вынудить королеву объявить "полную боевую готоврность", когда отряды врага будут автоматически проходить проверки на "тревогу" в соседнем секторе, пока число начатых боев не достигнет установленного. Это настройки для среднего уровня игры.
Property.Description_CHI: 老手难度下“全面警戒”状态持续到敌人主动对你发起进攻的次数。 在一定的条件下会促使女王会进入“全面警戒”状态。意思是在一段时间内，敌人一定能够成功探查到周边地区的玩家队伍并追击你的队伍。 “全面警戒”状态持续到敌人主动对你发起n次进攻后。n即为要设置的值。

Property.name: NUM_AWARE_BATTLES_EXPERT
Property.Description_ENG: Certain conditions can cause the queen to go into a "full alert" mode. This means that temporarily, the queen's forces will automatically succeed adjacent checks until x number of enemy initiated battles occur. This setting affects EXPERT difficulty.

Das bedeutet, dass die Streitkräfte der Königin zeitweise automatisch die Umgebungssuche erfolgreich ausführen, bis X vom Feind eingeleitete Kämpfe sich ereignet haben. Diese Einstellung verweist auf den Schwierigkeitsgrad Alter Hase.
Property.Description_RUS: Некоторые условия могут вынудить королеву объявить "полную боевую готоврность", когда отряды врага будут автоматически проходить проверки на "тревогу" в соседнем секторе, пока число начатых боев не достигнет установленного. Это настройки для трудного уровня игры.
Property.Description_CHI: 专家难度下“全面警戒”状态持续到敌人主动对你发起进攻的次数。 在一定的条件下会促使女王会进入“全面警戒”状态。意思是在一段时间内，敌人一定能够成功探查到周边地区的玩家队伍并追击你的队伍。 “全面警戒”状态持续到敌人主动对你发起n次进攻后。n即为要设置的值。

Property.name: NUM_AWARE_BATTLES_INSANE
Property.Description_ENG: Certain conditions can cause the queen to go into a "full alert" mode. This means that temporarily, the queen's forces will automatically succeed adjacent checks until x number of enemy initiated battles occur. This setting affects INSANE difficulty.
Property.Description_GER: Bestimmte Umstände können die Königin dazu bringen, in den Modus "Alarmstufe Rot" zu wechseln. Das bedeutet, dass die Streitkräfte der Königin zeitweise automatisch die Umgebungssuche erfolgreich ausführen, bis X vom Feind eingeleitete Kämpfe sich ereignet haben. Diese Einstellung verweist auf den Schwierigkeitsgrad WAHNSINNIG.
Property.Description_RUS: Некоторые условия могут вынудить королеву объявить "полную боевую готоврность", когда отряды врага будут автоматически проходить проверки на "тревогу" в соседнем секторе, пока число начатых боев не достигнет установленного. Это настройки для невозможного уровня игры.
Property.Description_CHI: 疯狂难度下“全面警戒”状态持续到敌人主动对你发起进攻的次数。 在一定的条件下会促使女王会进入“全面警戒”状态。意思是在一段时间内，敌人一定能够成功探查到周边地区的玩家队伍并追击你的队伍。 “全面警戒”状态持续到敌人主动对你发起n次进攻后。n即为要设置的值。

Property.name: BASE_DELAY_IN_MINUTES_BETWEEN_EVALUATIONS_NOVICE
Property.Description_ENG: The base interval (in MINUTES) between the queen's attempts to evaluate her situation (and possibly dispatch troops). Sh can only make one decision at a time. This setting affects NOVICE difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 新手难度下女王决策的基本间隔。单位：分钟

Property.name: BASE_DELAY_IN_MINUTES_BETWEEN_EVALUATIONS_EXPERIENCED
Property.Description_ENG: The base interval (in MINUTES) between the queen's attempts to evaluate her situation (and possibly dispatch troops). Sh can only make one decision at a time. This setting affects EXPERIENCED difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 老手难度下女王决策的基本间隔。单位：分钟

Property.name: BASE_DELAY_IN_MINUTES_BETWEEN_EVALUATIONS_EXPERT
Property.Description_ENG: The base interval (in MINUTES) between the queen's attempts to evaluate her situation (and possibly dispatch troops). Sh can only make one decision at a time. This setting affects EXPERT difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 专家难度下女王决策的基本间隔。单位：分钟

Property.name: BASE_DELAY_IN_MINUTES_BETWEEN_EVALUATIONS_INSANE
Property.Description_ENG: The base interval (in MINUTES) between the queen's attempts to evaluate her situation (and possibly dispatch troops). Sh can only make one decision at a time. This setting affects INSANE difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 疯狂难度下女王决策的基本间隔。单位：分钟

Property.name: EVALUATION_DELAY_VARIANCE_NOVICE
Property.Description_ENG: The interval between the Queen's strategic decisions (see BASE_DELAY_IN_MINUTES_BETWEEN_EVALUATIONS_NOVICE) is not always the same - it is modified by a random variation. This setting determines the maximum possible variation (in MINUTES). This setting affects NOVICE difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 新手难度下在基本间隔的基础上还会有一个随机变数。这个随机变数是多少？

Property.name: EVALUATION_DELAY_VARIANCE_EXPERIENCED
Property.Description_ENG: The interval between the Queen's strategic decisions (see BASE_DELAY_IN_MINUTES_BETWEEN_EVALUATIONS_EXPERIENCED) is not always the same - it is modified by a random variation. This setting determines the maximum possible variation (in MINUTES). This setting affects EXPERIENCED difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 老手难度下在基本间隔的基础上还会有一个随机变数。这个随机变数是多少？

Property.name: EVALUATION_DELAY_VARIANCE_EXPERT
Property.Description_ENG: The interval between the Queen's strategic decisions (see BASE_DELAY_IN_MINUTES_BETWEEN_EVALUATIONS_EXPERT) is not always the same - it is modified by a random variation. This setting determines the maximum possible variation (in MINUTES). This setting affects EXPERT difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 专家难度下在基本间隔的基础上还会有一个随机变数。这个随机变数是多少？

Property.name: EVALUATION_DELAY_VARIANCE_INSANE
Property.Description_ENG: The interval between the Queen's strategic decisions (see BASE_DELAY_IN_MINUTES_BETWEEN_EVALUATIONS_INSANE) is not always the same - it is modified by a random variation. This setting determines the maximum possible variation (in MINUTES). This setting affects INSANE difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 疯狂难度下在基本间隔的基础上还会有一个随机变数。这个随机变数是多少？

Property.name: GRACE_PERIOD_IN_HOURS_AFTER_SECTOR_LIBERATION_NOVICE
Property.Description_ENG: When a player takes control of a sector, enemy reinforcements are not allowed to enter the sector for a limited amount of time. This essentially dumbs down the AI, making it less aggressive. This setting affects NOVICE difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 新手难度下在玩家攻占一个地区后到女王决定进攻并夺回这个地区之间存在着一段时间的延迟。这段延迟（也就是你喘息的机会）是多久？

Property.name: GRACE_PERIOD_IN_HOURS_AFTER_SECTOR_LIBERATION_EXPERIENCED
Property.Description_ENG: When a player takes control of a sector, enemy reinforcements are not allowed to enter the sector for a limited amount of time. This essentially dumbs down the AI, making it less aggressive. This setting affects EXPERIENCED difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 老手难度下在玩家攻占一个地区后到女王决定进攻并夺回这个地区之间存在着一段时间的延迟。这段延迟（也就是你喘息的机会）是多久？

Property.name: GRACE_PERIOD_IN_HOURS_AFTER_SECTOR_LIBERATION_EXPERT
Property.Description_ENG: When a player takes control of a sector, enemy reinforcements are not allowed to enter the sector for a limited amount of time. This essentially dumbs down the AI, making it less aggressive. This setting affects EXPERT difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 专家难度下在玩家攻占一个地区后到女王决定进攻并夺回这个地区之间存在着一段时间的延迟。这段延迟（也就是你喘息的机会）是多久？

Property.name: GRACE_PERIOD_IN_HOURS_AFTER_SECTOR_LIBERATION_INSANE
Property.Description_ENG: When a player takes control of a sector, enemy reinforcements are not allowed to enter the sector for a limited amount of time. This essentially dumbs down the AI, making it less aggressive. This setting affects INSANE difficulty.
Property.Description_CHI: 疯狂难度下在玩家攻占一个地区后到女王决定进攻并夺回这个地区之间存在着一段时间的延迟。这段延迟（也就是你喘息的机会）是多久？

Property.name: GRACE_PERIOD_IN_DAYS_AFTER_PATROL_DESTROYED_NOVICE
Property.Description_ENG: Defines how many days must pass before the queen is willing to refill a defeated patrol group. This setting affects NOVICE difficulty.
Property.Description_GER: Dieser Wert bestimmt, wie viele Tage versteichen müssen, bis die Königin gewillt ist, eine besiegte Patroullie zu ersetzen. Diese Einstellung verweist auf den Schwierigkeitsgrad Einsteiger.
Property.Description_RUS: Устанавливает количество дней, в течении которого Дейдрана не будет посылать войска для восстановления потеряных патрулей на легком уровне игры.
Property.Description_CHI: 新手难度下你击溃一支敌人的巡逻队后，女王要花多久（单位：天）来重建一支巡逻队？

Property.name: GRACE_PERIOD_IN_DAYS_AFTER_PATROL_DESTROYED_EXPERIENCED
Property.Description_ENG: Defines how many days must pass before the queen is willing to refill a defeated patrol group. This setting affects EXPERIENCED difficulty.
Property.Description_GER: Dieser Wert bestimmt, wie viele Tage versteichen müssen, bis die Königin gewillt ist, eine besiegte Patroullie zu ersetzen. Diese Einstellung verweist auf den Schwierigkeitsgrad Profi.
Property.Description_RUS: Устанавливает количество дней, в течении которого Дейдрана не будет посылать войска для восстановления потеряных патрулей на среднем уровне игры.
Property.Description_CHI: 老手难度下你击溃一支敌人的巡逻队后，女王要花多久（单位：天）来重建一支巡逻队？

Property.Description_ENG: Defines how many days must pass before the queen is willing to refill a defeated patrol group. This setting affects EXPERT difficulty.

Property.Description_RUS: Устанавливает количество дней, в течении которого Дейдрана не будет посылать войска для восстановления потеряных патрулей на трудном уровне игры.
Property.Description_CHI: 专家难度下你击溃一支敌人的巡逻队后，女王要花多久（单位：天）来重建一支巡逻队？

Property.name: GRACE_PERIOD_IN_DAYS_AFTER_PATROL_DESTROYED_INSANE
Property.Description_ENG: Defines how many days must pass before the queen is willing to refill a defeated patrol group. This setting affects INSANE difficulty.
Property.Description_GER: Dieser Wert bestimmt, wie viele Tage versteichen müssen, bis die Königin gewillt ist, eine besiegte Patroullie zu ersetzen. Diese Einstellung verweist auf den Schwierigkeitsgrad WAHNSINNIG.
Property.Description_RUS: Устанавливает количество дней, в течении которого Дейдрана не будет посылать войска для восстановления потеряных патрулей на невозможном уровне игры.
Property.Description_CHI: 疯狂难度下你击溃一支敌人的巡逻队后，女王要花多久（单位：天）来重建一支巡逻队？

Property.name: AGGRESSIVE_QUEEN_AI_NOVICE
Property.Description_ENG: If this is set to TRUE, the queen will prefer attacking sectors over strengthening her own defenses. You may also want to set UNLIMITED_POOL_OF_TROOPS_NOVICE to TRUE, to prevent the queen running out of troops. If set to FALSE, she'll take a relatively balanced stance between Attack and Defense. This setting affects NOVICE mode.
Property.Description_CHI: 新手难度下女王是否会以攻为守，不停地进攻你？如果打开的话，记得调高女王的增援部队，或者打开无限部队。否则女王的部队会打光的。

Property.name: AGGRESSIVE_QUEEN_AI_EXPERIENCED
Property.Description_ENG: If this is set to TRUE, the queen will prefer attacking sectors over strengthening her own defenses. You may also want to set UNLIMITED_POOL_OF_TROOPS_EXPERIENCED to TRUE, to prevent the queen running out of troops. If set to FALSE, she'll take a relatively balanced stance between Attack and Defense. This setting affects EXPERIENCED mode.
Property.Description_CHI: 老手难度下女王是否会以攻为守，不停地进攻你？如果打开的话，记得调高女王的增援部队，或者打开无限部队。否则女王的部队会打光的。

Property.name: AGGRESSIVE_QUEEN_AI_EXPERT
Property.Description_ENG: If this is set to TRUE, the queen will prefer attacking sectors over strengthening her own defenses. You may also want to set UNLIMITED_POOL_OF_TROOPS_EXPERT to TRUE, to prevent the queen running out of troops. If set to FALSE, she'll take a relatively balanced stance between Attack and Defense. This setting affects EXPERT mode.
Property.Description_CHI: 专家难度下女王是否会以攻为守，不停地进攻你？如果打开的话，记得调高女王的增援部队，或者打开无限部队。否则女王的部队会打光的。

Property.name: AGGRESSIVE_QUEEN_AI_INSANE
Property.Description_ENG: If this is set to TRUE, the queen will prefer attacking sectors over strengthening her own defenses. You may also want to set UNLIMITED_POOL_OF_TROOPS_INSANE to TRUE, to prevent the queen running out of troops. If set to FALSE, she'll take a relatively balanced stance between Attack and Defense. This setting affects INSANE mode.
Property.Description_CHI: 疯狂难度下女王是否会以攻为守，不停地进攻你？如果打开的话，记得调高女王的增援部队，或者打开无限部队。否则女王的部队会打光的。

Property.name: ENEMY_INVESTIGATE_SECTOR
Property.Description_ENG: If set to TRUE, then the enemies from adjacent sectors of the city will come to investigate what happened when one of the city sectors is taken by player. It will happen only when the tactical view is active. This behavior was deactivated (set to FALSE) in original game.
Property.Description_GER: Wenn dieser Wert auf TRUE gesetzt wird, wird der Feind aus benachbarten Stadtsektoren zwecks Untersuchung in einem Sektor erscheinen, wenn ein Stadtsektor vom Spieler befreit wurde. Dies geschieht nur, wenn der Taktikbildschirm aktiv ist. Dieses Verhalten war im Original deaktiviert (auf FALSE gesetzt).
Property.Description_RUS: Если включен, вражески отряды из соседних с занятими игроком городских секторов будут идти для проверки в захваченный сектор. В оригинальной игре - выключено.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果设置为TRUE的话，在战术界面下，如果你攻下了某个城市中的一个地区，这个城市的其他地区的驻军可能会来到你攻占的地区来看看这里发生了什么事。

Property.name: REASSIGN_PENDING_REINFORCEMENTS
Property.Description_ENG: After the sector is taken by the player, the game will check to see if there are any pending reinforcements for this sector. If REASSIGN_PENDING_REINFORCEMENTS is set to TRUE then their orders will be cancelled and the group reassigned. This is a feature that *dumbs* down the AI, and was activated (set to TRUE) in original to make the game easier.
Property.Description_GER: Nachdem ein Sektor vom Spieler erobert wurde, wird das Spiel prüfen, ob noch Verstärkungen für den Sektor anhängig sind. Falls dieser Wert auf TRUE gesetzt wird, so werden ihre Befehle storniert und die Truppen neu zugeordnet. Diese Funktion schwächt die KI und war im Original abgeschaltet (auf TRUE gesetzt), um das Spiel leichter zu machen.
Property.Description_RUS: После захвата игроком сектора игра проверяла направлены ли в сектор резервы врага и если этот параметр включен - отменяла все приказы. В оригинальной игре эта опция была включена, что упрощало игру.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果打开此项的话，在你攻下一个地区后，系统会检测一下有没有敌人的部队正在赶来支援的。如果有的话，就会取消他们的当前任务（不再赶来了），重新分配任务。这样会使得游戏变简单。

Section.name: Militia Training Settings
Section.Description_ENG: These settings control the training of Town Militia.
Section.Description_CHI: 训练民兵设置

Property.name: MAX_MILITIA_PER_SECTOR
Property.Description_ENG: This defines the maximum size of any Militia group on the Strategic map (including Mobile groups). Also see "MAX_NUMBER_REBELS_IN_TACTICAL" to see how many can actually appear simultaneously in TACTICAL mode.
Property.Description_CHI: 每个地区最多能有多少民兵？

Property.name: NUM_MILITIA_TRAINED_PER_SESSION
Property.Description_ENG: This is the number of Militia trained in a single training session. If LEADERSHIP_AFFECTS_MILITIA_QUANTITY = TRUE, then this is the MAXIMUM possible number of men trained in a single session, although most mercs will train LESS than this amount.
Property.Description_CHI: 一次最多能训练多少民兵？（这只是一次”最多“能训练的数量，具体数量跟领导挂钩，参看下面几项）

Property.name: MIN_LOYALTY_TO_TRAIN_MILITIA
Property.Description_ENG: This is the minimum loyalty a town must have before it allows you to train militia.
Property.Description_GER: Dies ist die Mindestloyalität, die eine Stadt Ihnen entgegen bringen muss, damit Sie Miliz ausbilden können.
Property.Description_RUS: Минимально необходимая для тренировки ополчения лояльность.
Property.Description_CHI: 训练民兵需要的最低忠诚度。

Property.name: MILITIA_TRAINING_RATE
Property.Description_ENG: This controls how fast town militia gets trained. Increase this value to speed up Militia training.
Property.Description_CHI: 训练民兵的速度。越高越快。

Property.name: ALLOW_TRAINING_ELITE_MILITIA
Property.Description_ENG: Allows the training of Elite militia (Dark-Blue Shirts).
Property.Description_GER: Diese Einstellung erlaubt das Trainieren erfahrener Miliz.
Property.Description_RUS: Позволяет тренировать ветеранов ополчения
Property.Description_CHI: 可以训练深蓝民兵吗？

Property.name: ELITE_MILITIA_TRAINING_DELAY
Property.Description_ENG: The ability to train Elite Militia is delayed to this day. "ALLOW_TRAINING_ELITE_MILITIA" must be set to TRUE.
Property.Description_CHI: 从第几天开始能训练深蓝民兵？

Property.name: RPC_BONUS_TO_MILITIA_TRAINING_RATE
Property.Description_ENG: The militia training bonus for RPC (as a percentage of normal training speed). RPCs (Ira, Miguel, etc) train militia a bit faster. 0 = No bonus. 10 = RPCs train militia 10% faster than normal. And so on.
Property.Description_CHI: 本地佣兵训练民兵能快上百分之多少？

Property.name: MINIMUM_LEADERSHIP_TO_TRAIN_MILITIA
Property.Description_ENG: This is the minimum leadership score a character must have to be able to train Town Militia. 0 = no limit.
Property.Description_CHI: 训练民兵最低需要多少领导？

Property.name: LEADERSHIP_AFFECTS_MILITIA_QUANTITY
Property.Description_ENG: When this is activated, a militia trainer's Leadership will determine how many Town Militia are produced in each training session. The exact number of militia you produce depends on how far the character's leadership is above the MINIMUM_LEADERSHIP_TO_TRAIN_MILITIA value, and how far it is below the REQ_LEADERSHIP_FOR_MAX_MILITIA value. Characters cannot train less than 1 militia per session, and they cannot train more than the amount set in the "NUM_MILITIA_TRAINED_PER_SESSION" value. Only the BEST trainer in the sector determines the number of militia produced. Other trainers, if present, reduce the time it takes to train militia (as normal) but do NOT increase the number of men trained!
Property.Description_CHI: 领导影响一次训练民兵的数量？

Property.name: REQ_LEADERSHIP_FOR_MAX_MILITIA
Property.Description_ENG: This sets the minimum Leadership a trainer must have, to be able to train a full squad of Town Militia. The size of a full squad is set in "NUM_MILITIA_TRAINED_PER_SESSION", and is normally set at 10 militia. Trainers with less than this much Leadership will train fewer men. 0 = Any trainer will train a full squad.
Property.Description_CHI: 比如你在NUM_MILITIA_TRAINED_PER_SESSION这一项里设置了10，那你领导要达到60才能一次训练出10个民兵，否则训练不满10个。 0 = 所有人均可训练民兵

Property.name: TEACHER_TRAIT_EFFECT_ON_LEADERSHIP
Property.Description_ENG: This value determines how much the Teacher Trait increases our "effective" leadership for the purposes of determining whether we have reached the required score to train militia. (See also MINIMUM_LEADERSHIP_TO_TRAIN_MILITIA) 100 = no effect. 200 = each level of "TEACHING" will double our effective leadership score. (Expert Teaching = x4!) Note: This is only used if Old Trait System is played
Property.Description_CHI: 该值决定了“教学”技能会增加多少有效“领导”技能，使之达到训练民兵的要求。 100 = 无效 200 = 每级“教学”技能会使“领导”技能翻倍。专家级“教学”技能等于4倍效果！ 请注意，仅在旧技能系统下有效

Section.name: Mobile Militia Training Settings
Section.Description_ENG: These settings control the training of Mobile Militia.
Section.Description_CHI: 以下设定控制着移动民兵的相关选项

Property.name: ALLOW_MOBILE_MILITIA
Property.Description_ENG: Allows creating Mobile Militia groups. These militia can move around the map, fighting any enemies they encounter. They are (normally) more expensive and better trained than Town Militia.
Property.Description_GER: Diese Einstellung erlaubt der Miliz, sich auf der strategischen Karte zu bewegen.
Property.Description_RUS: Позволяет ополчению передвигаться по стратегической карте.
Property.Description_CHI: 允许训练移动民兵，这些民兵会在大地图上移动，与敌人战斗，比一般民兵稍贵。

Property.name: MOBILE_MILITIA_TRAINING_DELAY
Property.Description_ENG: Delay the ability to train Mobile Militia to this day. ALLOW_MOBILE_MILITIA must be set to TRUE, otherwise this value has no effect.
Property.Description_CHI: 推迟训练移动民兵到该天的结束。ALLOW_MOBILE_MILITIA必须设定为开，否则此设定无效

Property.name: NUM_MOBILE_MILITIA_TRAINED_PER_SESSION
Property.Description_ENG: This is the number of Mobile Militia that will be created when a training session is completed.
Property.Description_CHI: 每期训练课程结束后，多少移动民兵会毕业

Property.name: MUST_TRAIN_MOBILE_MILITIA
Property.Description_ENG: This setting determines when and how Mobile Militia are created. If set to TRUE, then Mobile Militia must be trained by your mercs, just like Town Militia. They cost a certain amount of money too (see MILITIA_COST_MULTIPLIER_MOBILE). If set to FALSE, a group of Mobile Militia will be created for FREE once every few hours, in EVERY CITY you control. (see CREATE_MOBILE_MILITIA_SQUAD_EACH_N_HOURS).
Property.Description_GER: Erzwingt das Bezahlen und Trainieren mobiler Miliz.
Property.Description_RUS: Принудительная оплата и тренировка мобильного ополчения
Property.Description_CHI: 此设定决定了移动民兵何时及怎样被训练出来。 如果该设定为开，则需要佣兵像训练其他民兵一样花钱花时间花汗水 （具体请参阅MILITIA_COST_MULTIPLIER_MOBILE） 如果该设定为关，则在你控制的城市里，每隔几小时就会免费训练出一队移动民兵。（具体请参阅CREATE_MOBILE_MILITIA_SQUAD_EACH_N_HOURS）

Property.name: CREATE_MOBILE_MILITIA_SQUAD_EACH_N_HOURS
Property.Description_ENG: Will create a new Mobile Militia squad each N hours (12 for example). This setting only accepts the following values: 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24, 48, 96. Do not use any other values! For this setting to have any effect, MUST_TRAIN_MOBILE_MILITIA must be set to FALSE.
Property.Description_CHI: 训练一个新移动民兵小队需要N小时，N仅能取1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24, 48, 96。若要此设定生效，则MUST_TRAIN_MOBILE_MILITIA必须设定为关。

Property.name: MIN_LEADERSHIP_TO_TRAIN_MOBILE_MILITIA
Property.Description_ENG: This is the minimum leadership required for training Mobile Militia. Characters with less than this much leadership (after TEACHING trait bonuses, if any) will not be able to train Mobile Militia at all. 0 = No minimum limit.
Property.Description_CHI: 训练移动民兵所需最小“领导”技能

Property.name: LEADERSHIP_AFFECTS_MOBILE_MILITIA_QUANTITY
Property.Description_ENG: When this is activated, a militia trainer's Leadership will determine how many Mobile Militia are produced in each training session. The exact number of militia you produce depends on how far the character's leadership is above the MINIMUM_LEADERSHIP_TO_TRAIN_MOBILE_MILITIA value, and how far it is below the REQ_LEADERSHIP_FOR_MAX_MOBILE_MILITIA value. Characters cannot train less than 1 militia per session, and they cannot train more than the amount set in the "NUM_MOBILE_MILITIA_TRAINED_PER_SESSION" value. Only the BEST trainer in the sector determines the number of militia produced. Other trainers, if present, reduce the time it takes to train Mobile militia (as normal) but do NOT increase the number of men trained!
Property.Description_CHI: 当此设定开启时，训练民兵的佣兵的“领导”技能多少将决定一期课程课训练处多少移动民兵。具体可以训练多少取决于该佣兵的“领导”技能超出MINIMUM_LEADERSHIP_TO_TRAIN_MOBILE_MILITIA多少，以及低于REQ_LEADERSHIP_FOR_MAX_MOBILE_MILITIA多少。 并且该人数大于1，小于NUM_MOBILE_MILITIA_TRAINED_PER_SESSION。请注意，“领导”技能仅取最高值，若有其他训练者，则只是减少训练时间。

Property.name: REQ_LEADERSHIP_FOR_MAX_MOBILE_MILITIA
Property.Description_ENG: This is the amount of leadership required for training a full-sized mobile militia group. It only works if LEADERSHIP_AFFECTS_MOBILE_MILITIA_QUANTITY is also activated. Characters with less than this much leadership will train a smaller-than-maximum group. Use NUM_MOBILE_MILITIA_TRAINED_PER_SESSION to determine how many militia are in a "full-sized" group. Also note that the TEACHING trait may have an effect on the leadership value of a merc (see related INI setting). 1 = JA2 Default. All mercs will train a full-sized group.
Property.Description_CHI: 训练一个满员的移动佣兵小队需要的“领导”技能。仅在LEADERSHIP_AFFECTS_MOBILE_MILITIA_QUANTITY设置为开时起作用。如果负责训练的佣兵的“领导”技能小于该值，则会训练出较少的移动民兵。请在NUM_MOBILE_MILITIA_TRAINED_PER_SESSION中设置满员移动民兵小队的人数。 1 = JA2默认，所有佣兵均可训练满员的移动佣兵小队

Property.name: LEADERSHIP_AFFECTS_MOBILE_MILITIA_QUALITY
Property.Description_ENG: If set to TRUE, the quality of newly-trained Mobile Militia depends directly on the Leadership score of the merc who is training them. This only takes into account the best trainer in the sector. A merc with 100 Leadership trains only Elite (dark blue) militia. A merc with very low leadership only trains green militia. A merc with 60 Leadership trains an equal number of Greens, Regulars, and Elites. Please note that the TEACHER trait can help increase the relative leadership score (see TEACHER_TRAIT_EFFECT_ON_LEADERSHIP).
Property.Description_CHI: 如果此项设定为开，新训练出来的移动民兵的质量取决于佣兵的“领导”技能高低，仅取最高值。拥有100“领导”技能的佣兵训练出来的全是精英民兵。“领导”技能60的佣兵会训练出菜鸟，普通，精英民兵各三分之一。 “教学”技能对此设定有帮助（具体请参阅TEACHER_TRAIT_EFFECT_ON_LEADERSHIP）

Property.name: PERCENT_MOBILE_MILITIA_ELITES
Property.Description_ENG: Determine what percent of a newly trained Roaming Militia group will be made up of Elites. If this number is set above 0, at least 1 Elite will be created in every new group. This setting requires LEADERSHIP_AFFECTS_MOBILE_MILITIA_QUALITY to be set to FALSE. PLEASE NOTE that PERCENT_MOBILE_MILITIA_ELITES + PERCENT_ROAMING_MILITIA_REGULARS must be 100 or LESS. If together they are below 100, the remaining militia will be Green.
Property.Description_CHI: 决定了新训练出来的移动民兵中精英民兵的百分比，若想此设定生效，则需关掉LEADERSHIP_AFFECTS_MOBILE_MILITIA_QUALITY这项设定。 请注意，PERCENT_MOBILE_MILITIA_ELITES + PERCENT_ROAMING_MILITIA_REGULARS必须小于等于100，如果两项加起来不足100，则剩下民兵的均为菜鸟。

Property.name: PERCENT_MOBILE_MILITIA_REGULARS
Property.Description_ENG: Determine what percent of a newly trained Roaming Militia group will be made up of Regulars. If this number is set above 0, at least 1 Regular will be created in every new group. This setting requires LEADERSHIP_AFFECTS_MOBILE_MILITIA_QUALITY to be set to FALSE. PLEASE NOTE that PERCENT_MOBILE_MILITIA_ELITES + PERCENT_ROAMING_MILITIA_REGULARS must be 100 or less. If together they are below 100, the remaining militia will be Green.
Property.Description_CHI: 决定了新训练出来的移动民兵中普通民兵的百分比，若想此设定生效，则需关掉LEADERSHIP_AFFECTS_MOBILE_MILITIA_QUALITY这项设定。 请注意，PERCENT_MOBILE_MILITIA_ELITES + PERCENT_ROAMING_MILITIA_REGULARS必须小于等于100，如果两项加起来不足100，则剩下民兵的均为菜鸟。

Section.name: Mobile Militia Movement Settings
Section.Description_ENG: These settings change the way that Mobile Militia move around the map. Naturally, none of these settings are used unless ALLOW_MOBILE_MILITIA is set to TRUE.
Section.Description_GER: In dieser Sektion können Sie die globalen Spieleinstellungen verändern.
Section.Description_RUS: Этот раздел отвечает за глобальные игровые настройки.
Section.Description_CHI: 以下设定控制着移动民兵的活动方式。如果ALLOW_MOBILE_MILITIA设定为关，则以下各设定均无效

Property.name: RESTRICT_ROAMING
Property.Description_ENG: If you wish to use Exploration-Based or Dynamic Roaming Restrictions, this setting must be set to TRUE! If set to FALSE, Mobile Militia will be allowed to go whereever they want on the strategic map.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果你希望移动民兵基于探索过的区域或动态巡逻限制，该设定一定要为开！如果设置为关，移动民兵则可以在地图上四处乱窜

Property.name: ALLOW_MILITIA_MOVEMENT_THROUGH_EXPLORED_SECTORS
Property.Description_ENG: If both this and RESTRICT_ROAMING are set to TRUE, allows Mobile Militia to move through any sectors previously visited by the player.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果该设定和RESTRICT_ROAMING均设定为开，则移动民兵可以自由穿过玩家部队之前探索过的区域

Property.name: ALLOW_DYNAMIC_RESTRICTED_ROAMING
Property.Description_ENG: If both this and RESTRICT_ROAMING are set to TRUE, Roaming Militia movement will be restricted depending on the rules set in DynamicRestrictions.XML. By default, these rules will allow Militia to patrol the outskirts of liberated cities, as well as any strategically-important areas around those cities. The more cities you conquer, the more areas can be patrolled.
Property.Description_CHI: 如果该设定和RESTRICT_ROAMING均设定为开，则民兵的移动范围会限制在DynamicRestrictions.XML所指定的范围内。该文件的默认设定是民兵可以巡逻于被解放城市的外围和地图上的战略要点。越多城市被解放，则民兵巡逻范围越大

Property.name: ALLOW_MILITIA_MOVEMENT_THROUGH_MINOR_CITIES
Property.Description_ENG: When set to TRUE, Mobile Militia can move through "minor" city sectors - ones that do not allow local militia training. This includes Omerta, San Mona, Tixa, Orta, and Estoni.
Property.Description_RUS: При включении, ополчение получает возможность проходить через сектора, где нельзя тренировать ополчение - Сан-Мона, Омерта и т.д.
Property.Description_CHI: 当该设定为开时，移动民兵可以进驻到不能训练民兵的区域，比如Omerta, San Mona, Tixa, Orta等

Property.name: ALLOW_MOBILE_MILITIA_REINFORCE_SAM_GARRISONS
Property.Description_ENG: Determines whether Mobile Militia can automatically move into a liberated SAM site sector (and stay there).
Property.Description_CHI: 决定移动民兵是否可以进驻已解放SAM基地

Property.name: ALLOW_MOBILE_MILITIA_REINFORCE_TOWN_GARRISONS
Property.Description_ENG: Determines whether Mobile Militia can automatically move into a liberated Major City sector (and stay there).
Property.Description_CHI: 决定移动民兵是否可以进驻已解放城市

Section.name: Militia Strength Settings
Section.Description_ENG: These settings control the strength of town or mobile militia in tactial combat and autoresolve.
Section.Description_GER: In dieser Sektion können Sie die Stärke der Milizen verändern.
Section.Description_CHI: 以下设定控制着民兵的精壮程度，也就是在自动战斗中的表现

Property.name: GREEN_MILITIA_AUTORESOLVE_STRENGTH_BONUS
Property.Description_ENG: Novice militia strength bonus Militia overall power during autoresolve battles - abilitiy to hit enemy and not being hit by enemy. Value can also be negative, meaning the militia will be weaker.
Property.Description_CHI: 菜鸟民兵精壮奖励，民兵在自动战斗时候的表现，命中敌人及躲避敌人子弹的能力。负值则表示民兵变弱

Property.name: REGULAR_MILITIA_AUTORESOLVE_STRENGTH_BONUS
Property.Description_ENG: Regular militia strength bonus Militia overall power during autoresolve battles - abilitiy to hit enemy and not being hit by enemy. Value can also be negative, meaning the militia will be weaker.
Property.Description_CHI: 普通民兵精壮奖励，民兵在自动战斗时候的表现，命中敌人及躲避敌人子弹的能力。负值则表示民兵变弱

Property.name: VETERAN_MILITIA_AUTORESOLVE_STRENGTH_BONUS
Property.Description_ENG: Veteran militia strength bonus Militia overall power during autoresolve battles - abilitiy to hit enemy and not being hit by enemy. Value can also be negative, meaning the militia will be weaker.
Property.Description_CHI: 精英民兵精壮奖励，民兵在自动战斗时候的表现，命中敌人及躲避敌人子弹的能力。负值则表示民兵变弱

Property.name: GREEN_MILITIA_APS_BONUS
Property.Description_ENG: Novice militia AP bonus Flat bonus to Militiamen Action Points.
Property.Description_CHI: 菜鸟民兵AP奖励

Property.name: REGULAR_MILITIA_APS_BONUS
Property.Description_ENG: Regular militia AP bonus Flat bonus to Militiamen Action Points.
Property.Description_CHI: 普通民兵AP奖励

Property.name: VETERAN_MILITIA_APS_BONUS
Property.Description_ENG: Veteran militia AP bonus Flat bonus to Militiamen Action Points.
Property.Description_CHI: 精英民兵AP奖励

Property.name: GREEN_MILITIA_CTH_BONUS_PERCENT
Property.Description_ENG: Novice militia CTH bonus Percentual bonus to Militia total precalculated CtH every shot. (100 here means the militia has always CtH doubled.)
Property.Description_CHI: 菜鸟民兵命中率奖励，按百分比计算。100意味着民兵有双倍的命中率

Property.name: REGULAR_MILITIA_CTH_BONUS_PERCENT
Property.Description_ENG: Regular militia CTH bonus Percentual bonus to Militia total precalculated CtH every shot. (100 here means the militia has always CtH doubled.)
Property.Description_CHI: 普通民兵命中率奖励，按百分比计算。100意味着民兵有双倍的命中率

Property.name: VETERAN_MILITIA_CTH_BONUS_PERCENT
Property.Description_ENG: Veteran militia CTH bonus Percentual bonus to Militia total precalculated CtH every shot. (100 here means the militia has always CtH doubled.)
Property.Description_CHI: 精英民兵命中率奖励，按百分比计算。100意味着民兵有双倍的命中率

Property.name: GREEN_MILITIA_DAMAGE_RESISTANCE
Property.Description_ENG: Novice militia damage resistance bonus Normal and energy damage is reduced by this many percents.
Property.Description_CHI: 菜鸟民兵伤害抵抗奖励

Property.name: REGULAR_MILITIA_DAMAGE_RESISTANCE
Property.Description_ENG: Regular militia damage resistance bonus Normal and energy damage is reduced by this many percents.
Property.Description_CHI: 普通民兵伤害抵抗奖励

Property.name: VETERAN_MILITIA_DAMAGE_RESISTANCE
Property.Description_ENG: Veteran militia damage resistance bonus Normal and energy damage is reduced by this many percents.
Property.Description_CHI: 精英民兵伤害抵抗奖励

Property.name: GREEN_MILITIA_EQUIPMENT_QUALITY_MODIFIER
Property.Description_ENG: Novice militia equipment quality modifier Determines bonus to assigned weapon and gear quality (coolness).
Property.Description_CHI: 菜鸟民兵装备等级修正

Property.name: REGULAR_MILITIA_EQUIPMENT_QUALITY_MODIFIER
Property.Description_ENG: Regular militia equipment quality modifier Determines bonus to assigned weapon and gear quality (coolness).
Property.Description_CHI: 普通民兵装备等级修正

Property.name: VETERAN_MILITIA_EQUIPMENT_QUALITY_MODIFIER
Property.Description_ENG: Veteran militia equipment quality modifier Determines bonus to assigned weapon and gear quality (coolness).
Property.Description_CHI: 精英民兵装备等级修正

Section.name: Shopkeeper Inventory Settings
Section.Description_ENG: This section controls the inventories of the merchants in Arulco.
Section.Description_CHI: 在这个区可以调整Arulco的商人们的相关设定

Property.name: TONY_USES_BOBBY_RAYS_SETTING
Property.Description_ENG: Tony uses Bobby Ray's setting (makes his inventory better).
Property.Description_RUS: Тони использует настройки Боби Рэя (улучшеный ассортимент)
Property.Description_CHI: Tony使用BR设置（让他的货更好更多）

Property.name: DEVIN_USES_BOBBY_RAYS_SETTING
Property.Description_ENG: Devin uses Bobby Ray's setting (makes his inventory better).
Property.Description_RUS: Дэвин использует настройки Боби Рэя (улучшеный ассортимент)
Property.Description_CHI: Devin使用BR设置（让他的货更好更多）

Property.name: CHANCE_TONY_AVAILABLE
Property.Description_ENG: This is a chance that Tony will be available at his weapon shop in San Mona. (If the chance does not roll, he will be away for at least a day.) 80 percent is vanilla settings, 100 means Tony will always be home.
Property.Description_CHI: Tony在家的几率

Section.name: Strategic Assignment Settings
Section.Description_ENG: The settings in this section control the behavior of "merc assignments", such as Doctoring, Repairing, and Training.
Section.Description_CHI: 在这个区可以调整“佣兵的任务”相关内容，比如“医疗”、“修理”、“教学”等

Property.name: MINUTES_FOR_ASSIGNMENT_TO_COUNT
Property.Description_ENG: The amount time must be on assignment before it can have any effect. Remember that all assignments make this check at the "FULL" hour. For instance, if the default is used (45), a character can start work at 13:15 and his work takes effect at the next full hour - 14:00. However, if he starts work at 13:16, he fails the check at 14:00 and his work only takes effect at 15:00. If a character goes to sleep/wakes up, his "minutes of work so far" counter is reset to 0.
Property.Description_CHI: 任务进行时间，请记住所有工作均在整点检查。举个例子，如果该值设定为45，某佣兵在13:15开始某项工作，则他的工作在14:00的时候产生效果。如果他13:16开始工作，则他的工作在15:00才会有效果，因为他错过了14:00的检查。 如果该佣兵去睡觉或者刚醒来，则他的“目前工作时间”重置为0

Property.name: MIN_REQUIRED_SKILL_TO_BEGIN_TRAINING
Property.Description_ENG: The minimum skill a character must have to be able to train that skill at all.
Property.Description_GER: Der Mindestwert, der benötigt wird, um eine Söldnereigenschaft zu trainieren.
Property.Description_RUS: Минимальное значение, необходимое для тренировки умения.
Property.Description_CHI: 可以进行“训练”相关任务的最小属性要求

Property.name: MAX_SKILL_ACHIEVABLE_BY_TRAINING
Property.Description_ENG: The maximum level to which a skill can be raised through training.
Property.Description_GER: Der Maximalwert, zu dem eine Söldnereigenschaft trainiert werden kann.
Property.Description_RUS: Максимальное значение, до которого умение может быть натренировано.
Property.Description_CHI: 通过训练某技能所能到达的极限

Property.name: TRAINING_RATE_DIVISOR
Property.Description_ENG: The divisor for the rate of training, both alone and with an instructor. Reduce this to increase the speed of all PRACTICE and STUDY assignments.
Property.Description_CHI: 训练速率除数，降低该值对“自我训练”和“学习”方面的任务的速率有提升效果

Property.name: INSTRUCTED_TRAINING_DIVISOR
Property.Description_ENG: When a merc is being trained by another, we divide the bonus points given by the instructor by this value. The result is used as a bonus to the normal number of points the Student would generate on his own. Decrease this value to speed up Student/Teacher training.
Property.Description_CHI: 当某佣兵被别的佣兵训练时，我们用老师所提供的附加奖励点数除以该值，得到的结果可以认为是学生所能获得的附加奖励点数。降低该值对教学有提速效果

Property.name: TEACHER_TRAIT_BONUS_TO_TRAINING_EFFICIENCY
Property.Description_ENG: The training bonus for each level of teaching skill in percentage points. This also applies to training militia.
Property.Description_GER: Der Trainingsbonus für jedes Level der Fertigkeit Lehren (in Prozent). Wirkt ebenfalls beim Miliztraining.
Property.Description_RUS: Определяет бонус тренеру за каждый уровень умения "обучение" (в процентах)
Property.Description_CHI: 在百分比模式下每级“教学”技能提供的附加奖励，训练民兵也适用

Property.name: MIN_SKILL_REQUIRED_TO_TEACH_OTHER
Property.Description_ENG: The minimum skill rating that is needed for teaching a fellow teammate.
Property.Description_GER: Die Mindesthöhe einer Eigenschaft, um ein Teammitglied unterrichten zu können.
Property.Description_RUS: Минимальный размер умения, необходимый для обучения других.
Property.Description_CHI: 教导队友某技能的最低技能值

Property.name: SYNCHRONIZED_SLEEPING_HOURS_WHEN_TRAINING_TOGETHER
Property.Description_ENG: Controls whether the game tries to synchronize sleeping periods of Trainers and Trainees working together. 0 = No sleep synchornization. 2 = If a Trainer has gone to sleep, all of his students will immediately go to sleep. 3 = If all Students have gone to sleep, the Trainer immediately goes to sleep. 1 = Both options on.
Property.Description_RUS: Контролирует синхронизацию сна учителя и ученика 0 = нет синхронизации. 2 = как только тренер засыпает, ученик тоже ложится спать. 3 = Если все студенты спят, учитель ложится спать. 1 = Обе последних опции.
Property.Description_CHI: 游戏是否同步老师和学生的睡觉时段以便更好的合作 0 = 不同步 2 = 如果老师睡着，则他的所有学生马上去睡觉 3 = 如果全部学生都睡着，则老师马上去睡觉 1 = 以上两功能全部开启

Property.name: SYNCHRONIZED_WAKING_HOURS_WHEN_TRAINING_TOGETHER
Property.Description_ENG: Controls whether the game tries to synchronize waking periods of Trainers and Trainees working together. 0 = No wake synchornization. 2 = If a Trainer has woken up, all of his students will immediately wake up. 3 = If all Students have woken up, the Trainer immediately wakes up. 1 = Both options on.
Property.Description_RUS: Контролирует синхронизацию просыпания учителя и ученика 0 = нет синхронизации. 2 = как только тренер просыпается, ученик тоже просыпается. 3 = Если все студенты просыпаются, учитель просыпается. 1 = Обе последних опции.
Property.Description_CHI: 游戏是否同步老师和学生的清醒时段以便更好的合作 0 = 不同步 2 = 如果老师醒来，则他的所有学生马上醒来 3 = 如果全部学生都醒着，则老师马上醒来 1 = 以上两功能全部开启

Property.name: REST_IF_NO_TRAINING_PARTNER_AVAILABLE
Property.Description_ENG: Controls whether Students and Trainers that have no one to work with go into "resting" mode (temporarily) to conserve/replenish their stamina while they wait. 0 = Disabled. 2 = If a Trainer is awake but all his students are asleep, he will rest and replenish his Stamina, until at least one Student wakes up. 3 = If a Student is awake but his trainer is asleep, he will rest and replenish his Stamina, until his trainer wakes up. He will NOT study alone during his rest! 1 = Both options on.
Property.Description_RUS: Контролирует восстановление стамины в режиме отдыха. 0 = Отключено. 2 = если тренер не спит, хотя все его студенты спят, он отдыхает и восстанавливает стамину, пока кто-нить не проснется. 3 = Если студенты не спят, когда тренер спит, они восстанавливают стамину, пока учитель не проснется. Он не может учить пока они отдыхают! 1 = Обе последних опции.
Property.Description_CHI: 学生或老师在休息模式时是否会恢复精力值 0 = 此功能关闭 2 = 如果老师醒着但是学生睡着了，则老师会恢复精力值，直到至少有一个学生醒来 3 = 如果学生醒着但是老师睡着了，则学生会恢复精力值，直到老师醒来，但是这段期间他不会自学！ 1 = 以上两个功能都开启

Property.name: NATURAL_HEALING_SPEED_DIVISOR_AT_LOW_ACTIVITY_LEVEL
Property.Description_ENG: This is a divisor to the natural hourly healing rate of a character, when he is assigned as "PATIENT" or is currently resting (I.E. assigned to a squad but not traveling).
Property.Description_CHI: 在无任务或成为“病人”的佣兵每小时生命值回复速率除数

Property.name: NATURAL_HEALING_SPEED_DIVISOR_AT_MEDIUM_ACTIVITY_LEVEL
Property.Description_ENG: This is a divisor to the natural hourly healing rate of a character, when he is assigned to a non-combat job ("DOCTOR", "REPAIR", "TRAINING", etcetera). Also applies if the character is inside any vehicle (even when resting).
Property.Description_CHI: 在执行“医疗”、“修理”、“训练”等非战斗任务的佣兵每小时生命值回复速率除数

Property.name: NATURAL_HEALING_SPEED_DIVISOR_AT_HIGH_ACTIVITY_LEVEL
Property.Description_ENG: This is a divisor to the natural hourly healing rate of a character, when he is assigned to a squad and is currently traveling.
Property.Description_CHI: 在行军过程中的佣兵每小时生命值恢复速率除数

Property.name: DOCTORING_RATE_DIVISOR
Property.Description_ENG: When calculating how many Doctoring Points a doctor can generate every hour, we divide the Total number of points he can generate a day by this number. Decrease this to make Doctoring go faster.
Property.Description_GER: Erhöhen Sie diesen Wert, um die Sanitäterpunkte zu verringern - und vice versa. Bei einem Wert von 2400 liegt das theoretische Maximum bei 150 Punkten (= volle Heilungspunkte pro Tag).
Property.Description_RUS: Увеличивает или уменьшает PTS доктора при 2400 теоретический максимум в 150 PTS в день.
Property.Description_CHI: 在计算一个医生每小时可以获得多少医疗点数时，我们用一天他（她）可获得的总数除以该数值，该值越小则治疗越快速

Property.name: HOSPITAL_HEALING_RATE
Property.Description_ENG: How many points of healing each hospital patients gains per hour in the hospital. A top merc doctor can heal about 4 PTS/hour maximum, but that's spread among patients!
Property.Description_GER: Dies bestimmt, wie viele Lebenspunkte jeder Krankenhauspatient im Krankenhaus pro Stunde zurückgewinnt. Ein guter Söldnerarzt kann etwa 4 Punkte pro Stunde heilen, aber das wird auf alle Patienten verteilt!
Property.Description_RUS: Определяет количество здоровья, восстанавливаемое в час каждым пациентом госпиталя.
Property.Description_CHI: 在医院中的病人每小时所获得的治疗点数，一个顶级战地医生每小时最多可以治疗4点，不过还要分散给每个病人！

Property.name: BASE_MEDICAL_SKILL_TO_DEAL_WITH_EMERGENCY
Property.Description_ENG: Base medical skill required to deal with an emergency (when a patient has less than 15 health left).
Property.Description_GER: Basisfähigkeit um mit Notfällen zurecht zu kommen (wenn ein Patient weniger als 15 Lebenspunkte übrig hat).
Property.Description_RUS: Базовый размер умения для оказания помощи при здоровье пациента менее 15 хп.
Property.Description_CHI: 处理紧急事故（患者生命值15以下）时所需的“医疗”技能值

Property.name: MULTIPLIER_FOR_DIFFERENCE_IN_LIFE_VALUE_FOR_EMERGENCY
Property.Description_ENG: This is a multiplier for the minimum medical skill needed for each injury point below 15 health points.
Property.Description_GER: Dies ist ein Multiplikator der benötigten Eigenschaft für jeden Lebenspunkt niedriger als 15.
Property.Description_RUS: Множитель, определяющий необходимый уровень умения для реанимации, за каждый хп меньше 15.
Property.Description_CHI: 在患者生命值15以下时，治疗每点伤害所需的最小“医疗”技能值乘数

Property.name: POINT_COST_PER_HEALTH_BELOW_OKLIFE
Property.Description_ENG: The number of Doctoring Points needed to heal each injury point below 15 health.
Property.Description_GER: Die Zahl der benötigten Einheiten für jeden Punkt niedriger als der Wert von 15 Lebenspunkten.
Property.Description_RUS: Количество PTS необходимых для восстановления каждого хп, меньше 15.
Property.Description_CHI: 患者生命值15以下时，用来治疗每点伤害所需的医疗点数

Property.name: REPAIR_POINT_COST_TO_FIX_WEAPON_JAM
Property.Description_ENG: The cost in Repair Points to unjam a weapon.
Property.Description_GER: Die Kosten, um eine blockierte Waffe wieder funktionsfähig zu machen (in Punkten).
Property.Description_RUS: Стоимость расклинивания оружия в PTS ремонта
Property.Description_CHI: 解决卡弹武器所需的修理点数

Property.name: REPAIR_RATE_DIVISOR
Property.Description_ENG: Increase to reduce repair PTS, or vice versa.
Property.Description_GER: Erhöhen Sie diesen Wert, um die Raparaturpunkte eines Söldners zu verringern - und vice versa.
Property.Description_RUS: Регулирует PTS для ремонта.
Property.Description_CHI: 增加此值减少修理PTS，反之亦然

Property.name: REPAIR_SESSIONS_PER_DAY
Property.Description_ENG: When calculating how many Repair Points a character can generate while assigned to a task, we take the total Repair Points he character can generate daily, and divide them by this number (normally 24, representing 24 hours). A higher value here slows down repair. A lower value speeds it up.
Property.Description_CHI: 在计算一个角色被分配执行修理任务时所能获得修理点数时，我们用他（她）一天所获得的所有修理点数，除以该数值（一般取24，代表24小时）。该值越高则修理越慢，该值越低则修理越快
